Slumdog Millionaire.name: Slumdog Millionaire
Slumdog Millionaire.plot: A teenager from the slums of Mumbai becomes a contestant on the show 'Kaun Banega Crorepati?' When interrogated under suspicion of cheating, he revisits his past, revealing how he had all the answers.

Rachel Getting Married.name: Rachel Getting Married
Rachel Getting Married.plot: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

W..name: W.
W..plot: A chronicle of the life and Presidency of George W. Bush.

Volcano.name: Volcano
Volcano.plot: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

Philadelphia.name: Philadelphia
Philadelphia.plot: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic-small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

Water.name: Water
Water.plot: Set in the late summer in 1947, a group of medics and wounded of PLA chased by enemy are short of water and try to survive in severe environment.

Platoon.name: Platoon
Platoon.plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Nightcrawler.name: Nightcrawler
Nightcrawler.plot: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

Promised Land.name: Promised Land
Promised Land.plot: "Promised Land" tells the story of a group of young unwitting Estonian girls smuggled through Egypt to be auctioned off as prostitutes in Israel, and of their initiation into this trade of flesh, and finally of the accidental freeing of one girl who most fight for her freedom.

War.name: War
War.plot: Indian agent Khalid goes on a mission to hunt and eliminate his former mentor, the country's top agent Kabir who has gone rogue. A deadly war begins.

Lucy.name: Lucy
Lucy.plot: A story about a girl and her dog.

Jack Reacher.name: Jack Reacher
Jack Reacher.plot: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper responsible for a mass shooting.

Raiders of the Lost Ark.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Raiders of the Lost Ark.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

It's a Wonderful Life.name: It's a Wonderful Life
It's a Wonderful Life.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Daredevil.name: Daredevil
Daredevil.plot: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Sherlock Holmes.name: Sherlock Holmes
Sherlock Holmes.plot: Sherlock Holmes is called when series of murders strike the town.

The Wizard of Oz.name: The Wizard of Oz
The Wizard of Oz.plot: Dorothy, heir to the Oz throne, must take it back from the wicked Prime Minister Kruel with the help of three farmhands.

Rugrats Go Wild.name: Rugrats Go Wild
Rugrats Go Wild.plot: The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.

Gravity.name: Gravity
Gravity.plot: Jake trains dogs for underground dog fights while looking after his brother Ben. He is struggling to keep demons at bay but one day hell breaks loose when he kills the brother of mob boss Sal Fortunato, who sends his crew for revenge.

Warcraft.name: Warcraft
Warcraft.plot: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

Star Trek.name: Star Trek
Star Trek.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

Chicago.name: Chicago
Chicago.plot: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

London.name: London
London.plot: An inspiring tale through London by pictures narrated by Paul Scofield.

Brooklyn.name: Brooklyn
Brooklyn.plot: An Irish immigrant lands in 1950s Brooklyn, where she quickly falls into a romance with a local. When her past catches up with her, however, she must choose between two countries and the lives that exist within.

Robin Hood.name: Robin Hood
Robin Hood.plot: A Terrytoons animated short. Paul Terry and Frank Mozer take on the story of Robin Hood with singing and sword battles. Fanny Zilch is held in tower and sends a note to Robin Hood to rescue her.

Soldier.name: Soldier
Soldier.plot: A man returns from the War in Iraq, but unfortunately he brought some demons with him.

Madagascar.name: Madagascar
Madagascar.plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

Hard Candy.name: Hard Candy
Hard Candy.plot: Hayley's a smart, charming teenage girl. Jeff's a handsome, smooth fashion photographer. An Internet chat, a coffee shop meet-up, an impromptu fashion shoot back at Jeff's place. Jeff thinks it's his lucky night. He's in for a surprise.

Bloody Sunday.name: Bloody Sunday
Bloody Sunday.plot: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

Restoration.name: Restoration
Restoration.plot: CK Erwin is a man who's lost his family as well as his will to live. But, when he takes a job as a mechanic at a small Auto Restore shop, he is soon involved with a new ragtag family who needs him every bit as much as he needs them. Especially feisty Samantha "Sam" Collins, a high school wrestler, who needs a private coach for her last shot at Finals this year.

The World Is Not Enough.name: The World Is Not Enough
The World Is Not Enough.plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Gladiator.name: Gladiator
Gladiator.plot: Tommy Riley has moved with his dad to Chicago from a 'nice place'. He keeps to himself, goes to school. However, after a street fight he is noticed and quickly falls into the world of illegal underground boxing - where punches can kill.

Unforgiven.name: Unforgiven
Unforgiven.plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Scarface.name: Scarface
Scarface.plot: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

Tomorrow Never Dies.name: Tomorrow Never Dies
Tomorrow Never Dies.plot: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce a war between China and the United Kingdom.

Taxi Driver.name: Taxi Driver
Taxi Driver.plot: Mangal drives a taxi by day, then drinks at night, listens to his singer girlfriend Sylvie and then goes into a drunken stupor - and wakes up with a hangover. One day, while assisting another taxi driver, Mangal comes to the assistance of a damsel in distress who is being molested by two thugs. Mangal gallants rescues her and attempts to take her to her destination, to no avail, as the person she is looking for has moved. The next day, Mangal and the young woman, Mala, again attempt to seek Ratanlal, a music director, but the entire day is spent in vain. Mala lives in Mangal's tiny apartment and both become attracted to each other. When Mala finds out about Sylvie, she leaves him. He goes in her search, but finds that she has become a famous singer with the help of her music director friend. Will Mangal ever get a chance to tell about his love for Mala? What will Sylvie's reaction be?

Superman Returns.name: Superman Returns
Superman Returns.plot: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

Life of Brian.name: Life of Brian
Life of Brian.plot: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

There Will Be Blood.name: There Will Be Blood
There Will Be Blood.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Shrek 2.name: Shrek 2
Shrek 2.plot: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

The Sky Crawlers.name: The Sky Crawlers
The Sky Crawlers.plot: The Kildren, a group of eternally young fighter pilots, experience the sudden loss of innocence as they battle the enemy in astonishing dogfights above the clouds.

Spirited Away.name: Spirited Away
Spirited Away.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Toy Story 3.name: Toy Story 3
Toy Story 3.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

The Rocky Horror Picture Show.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
The Rocky Horror Picture Show.plot: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind.name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind.plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Princess Mononoke.name: Princess Mononoke
Princess Mononoke.plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Castle in the Sky.name: Castle in the Sky
Castle in the Sky.plot: Christina and Francis, like Gaudi embodied in two people, are on an uncompromising quest to achieve immortality. Outside of any artistic community and against current trends of housing market, they are following their heart and building a castle to last centuries. Their determination to make life meaningful through this artistic venture is a testament to the human spirit and unwavering creativity of these two people.

Redline.name: Redline
Redline.plot: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

Ponyo.name: Ponyo
Ponyo.plot: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

The Incredibles.name: The Incredibles
The Incredibles.plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

The Call.name: The Call
The Call.plot: In the fall of 1987, a group of small-town friends must survive the night in the home of a sinister couple after a tragic accident brings them to the couple's door.

Louie.name: Louie
Louie.plot: Louie Evans has become a Boston legend by riding around the city on his tricycle and yelling what some people call a 'siren noise.' Who is he? Why does he ride? Interviews with the employees of Back Bay Bicycles, the store that does complimentary repairs for Louie's bike, and Louie himself outline the mysterious 'trike rider's life as a dedicated bicyclist and as a compassionate, misunderstood person.

The Virgin Queen.name: The Virgin Queen
The Virgin Queen.plot: A Lord save the queen from a countess's assassination plot.

The Company.name: The Company
The Company.plot: A young ballet dancer is poised to become the principal performer in a group of ballet dancers.

Into the Storm.name: Into the Storm
Into the Storm.plot: After finding a broken surfboard on his local beach, Jhonny Guerrero, a teenager from one of Peru's toughest barrios, sets his heart on becoming a pro-surfer. With his father in prison for armed robbery and a mother struggling to feed and clothe his younger brother, the sea is his escape. When Jhonny is spotted by Peru's most successful surf champion, Sofia Mulanovich, he is taken under her wing and given a chance to succeed. Yet the pressure to do so weighs hard. Without his dad around, the lure of his friends and the risks of life in the barrios threatens to jeopardize everything he's worked for. When he's injured outside a nightclub in a drive by shooting, Jhonny is forced to decide once and for all which path to take.

I Spy.name: I Spy
I Spy.plot: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

Anger Management.name: Anger Management
Anger Management.plot: Dunno Zuka is a Rockabilly man who have an iguana pets called Nanas, when his iguana bites him, he turns angry and make him flying with rocket from toilet, then landed on the red genie island.

Without a Trace.name: Without a Trace
Without a Trace.plot: Estranged New Yorker (Kate Nelligan) turns to the police after her son disappears.

Starsky & Hutch.name: Starsky & Hutch
Starsky & Hutch.plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

Veronica Mars.name: Veronica Mars
Veronica Mars.plot: Years after walking away from her past as a young private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown, just in time for her high school reunion, in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

21 Jump Street.name: 21 Jump Street
21 Jump Street.plot: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

Buffy the Vampire Slayer.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Buffy the Vampire Slayer.plot: Flighty teenage girl Buffy Summers learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Dollhouse.name: Dollhouse
Dollhouse.plot: A young African American woman who struggles financially while doing food delivery as her second source of income, When she encounters him she finds herself trapped and manipulated. He won't stop until he finds a way to make her love him.

Alcatraz.name: Alcatraz
Alcatraz.plot: A group of prisoners, led by an armed robber and a gangster, attempt to escape from the infamous Alcatraz Island.

The Odyssey.name: The Odyssey
The Odyssey.plot: The film consists of 24 continuous shorts by 24 groups of filmmakers telling the complete story of THE ODYSSEY, Homer's epic in 24 chapters. The story begins at the end of a war, the invasion of Troy by the Greeks, and chronicles the 10-year journey home of one warrior, Odysseus. Having offended Poseidon, the God of the Sea, Odysseus is thwarted at every turn in his voyage, and even passes through the realm of the dead before reaching Ithaka, his kingdom. The epic hints at what it might mean to travel to wage war, to then try to return to the point of departure, and to have both left behind and carried home chaos.

The Walking Dead.name: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead.plot: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

True Blood.name: True Blood
True Blood.plot: Ray Trueblood, member of a street gang, is framed by an enemy of a rival gang, Billy "Spider" Masters. Ray is accused of killing a cop and he has to escape leaving behind his little brother, Donny. Ten years later Ray returns to his neighborhood to take his brother with him, but things are worse than he could expect: his brother, now 18 years old, hates him and is a member of Billy Masters' gang. Furthermore, Billy Masters is looking for revenge and... the police are still after Ray for the murder of the police officer.

The Nanny.name: The Nanny
The Nanny.plot: A wealthy couple hire a young girl from Finland to take care of their newborn. These new parents should be in a state of bliss, so why does it seem like they are trying to kill each other?

Lost.name: Lost
Lost.plot: A young man decides to commit suicide when his life suddenly changes. As death starts kicking in, he flashes back to times in his life that cause him to want to live -- is it too late?

Door to Door.name: Door to Door
Door to Door.plot: Door to Door tells the story of two life long stoner friends on a mission to pay their rent.

Get Smart.name: Get Smart
Get Smart.plot: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

The Dead Zone.name: The Dead Zone
The Dead Zone.plot: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee future events.

Max Payne.name: Max Payne
Max Payne.plot: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective and an assassin, who will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Pearl Harbor.name: Pearl Harbor
Pearl Harbor.plot: A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.plot: A young author suffering from writer's block sets out to sabotage his best friend, a successful but egotistical fellow wordsmith.

Doctor Zhivago.name: Doctor Zhivago
Doctor Zhivago.plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Saving Grace.name: Saving Grace
Saving Grace.plot: Grace is a young nurse who lives a life of pain and anguish. Her addiction to heroin has forced the authorities to take away her beloved daughter Jessica. But she seems to find solace when approached by an odd survivalist named Clayton.

Speed.name: Speed
Speed.plot: A police car is in hot pursuit of Angry Kid, who speeds down the street on his bicycle, his little sister (or a doll) strapped on behind him. As the Kid eludes the coppers, it becomes a matter of pride that they catch him, to avoid being a laughingstock at the station house. Somehow the Kid gets hold of a police radio, taunting his Javert over the airwaves. Will the boys in blue catch the kid with the orange hair?

Troy.name: Troy
Troy.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

Elizabeth.name: Elizabeth
Elizabeth.plot: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

Superman.name: Superman
Superman.plot: Superman comes to Earth as a child and grows up to be his home's first superhero with his first major challenge being to oppose The Spider Lady.

Batman.name: Batman
Batman.plot: The very first serial to adapt the comic book character of the Batman. In it, the Batman is a secret U.S. government agent, attempting to defeat the schemes of Japanese agent Dr. Daka operating in Los Angeles at the height of World War II.

World Trade Center.name: World Trade Center
World Trade Center.plot: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

X-Men.name: X-Men
X-Men.plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

Thor.name: Thor
Thor.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Blade Runner.name: Blade Runner
Blade Runner.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Annie Hall.name: Annie Hall
Annie Hall.plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Yes.name: Yes
Yes.plot: Going all over Scotland, an artist is creating artwork in the public space.

Æon Flux.name: Æon Flux
Æon Flux.plot: Æon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

The Aftermath.name: The Aftermath
The Aftermath.plot: An astronaut battles mutant cannibals after returning from space to find Earth ravaged by nuclear and biological war.

Count Dracula.name: Count Dracula
Count Dracula.plot: Count Dracula, a vampire who regains his youth by drinking the blood of maidens, is pursued in London and Transylvania by Professor Van Helsing, Jonathan Harker and Quincey Morris.

The Ten Commandments.name: The Ten Commandments
The Ten Commandments.plot: In this animated adaptation of the Bible story Moses hears the voice of God from a burning bush, which inspires him to confront Egypt's pharaoh and demand freedom for the Israelite slaves. The pharaoh agrees after a series of horrific plagues, and Moses leads the Israelites through the parted Red Sea into the harsh freedom of the desert. There he ascends Mount Sinai and returns with the Ten Commandments.

An Early Frost.name: An Early Frost
An Early Frost.plot: A lovely summer by the river is broken by the Great War. After it, nothing is the same. Everybody lives, but not everybody loves. The story of a man who didn't have the courage to stand for the one he loved.

The Fugitive.name: The Fugitive
The Fugitive.plot: Anti-Catholic and anti-cleric policies in the Mexican state of Tabasco lead the revolutionary government to persecute the state's last remaining priest.

The Legend of Tarzan.name: The Legend of Tarzan
The Legend of Tarzan.plot: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

Get Real.name: Get Real
Get Real.plot: Set in the 1980s, David is an aloof nerd who meets an unlikely group of friends: a jock, a popular girl, a punk, and a rebel. Through road trips, roller skating and parties, the group bonds, and David's dark past starts to reveal itself.

The Life and Death of Peter Sellers.name: The Life and Death of Peter Sellers
The Life and Death of Peter Sellers.plot: The feature adaptation of Roger Lewis' book about the actor best remembered as Inspector Clouseau in the Pink Panther movies.

The Equalizer.name: The Equalizer
The Equalizer.plot: What is justice? Jan Tucker, one of the world's most sought after private detectives discusses the moral ambiguity involved with his profession, and how he works with deep-pocketed criminals to finance his fight against injustice. Jan was instrumental in uncovering the wide use of false testimony by LAPD using jailhouse informants during the 90's.

Tin Man.name: Tin Man
Tin Man.plot: A young man, born deaf, invents a computer so he can hear and speak with others.

Truman.name: Truman
Truman.plot: Julián receives an unexpected visit from his friend Tomás, who lives in Canada. The two men, accompanied by Julián's faithful dog, Truman, will share emotional and surprising moments prompted by Julián's complicated situation.

Where the Heart Is.name: Where the Heart Is
Where the Heart Is.plot: A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

The Three Stooges.name: The Three Stooges
The Three Stooges.plot: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry, and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

Rush.name: Rush
Rush.plot: In a post-nuclear holocaust world, a survivor roams the desert, fighting bandits and the forces of an evil warlord.

Iron Man.name: Iron Man
Iron Man.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Adventureland.name: Adventureland
Adventureland.plot: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.

Ultraviolet.name: Ultraviolet
Ultraviolet.plot: A park ranger and his girlfriend run into a young man in the middle of Death Valley desert. He shoots the ranger, kidnaps the girl and starts playing psycho-sexual games with her. The wounded ranger gets a shotgun and goes after them.

Catwoman.name: Catwoman
Catwoman.plot: Catwoman attempts to track down a mysterious cargo shipment that is linked to a Gotham City crime boss called Rough Cut.

WALL·E.name: WALL·E
WALL·E.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Warlock.name: Warlock
Warlock.plot: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

Black Knight.name: Black Knight
Black Knight.plot: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Deadpool.name: Deadpool
Deadpool.plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Jason Bourne.name: Jason Bourne
Jason Bourne.plot: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

Ant-Man.name: Ant-Man
Ant-Man.plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, pull off a plan that will save the world.

Green Lantern.name: Green Lantern
Green Lantern.plot: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

Spectre.name: Spectre
Spectre.plot: A cryptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organisation named SPECTRE. With a new threat dawning, Bond learns the terrible truth about the author of all his pain in his most recent missions.

Casablanca.name: Casablanca
Casablanca.plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Lincoln.name: Lincoln
Lincoln.plot: As the Civil War rages on, U.S President Abraham Lincoln struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on his decision to emancipate the slaves.

Palo Alto.name: Palo Alto
Palo Alto.plot: An unflinching portrait of adolescent lust, boredom, and self-destruction that centers around a shy young girl on the cusp of an illicit relationship with her soccer coach.

300.plot: In the ancient battle of Thermopylae, King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fight against Xerxes and his massive Persian army.

Celebrity.name: Celebrity
Celebrity.plot: The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.

Prison.name: Prison
Prison.plot: The spirit of a long-dead prisoner returns for revenge, haunting the prison's new governor.

Wolf.name: Wolf
Wolf.plot: Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.plot: A Marine flyer and his flight school mentor fall for the same beautiful nurse.

Riddick.name: Riddick
Riddick.plot: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

Hellboy.name: Hellboy
Hellboy.plot: Caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, Hellboy battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

Maleficent.name: Maleficent
Maleficent.plot: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child could be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

Predator.name: Predator
Predator.plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

Wild.name: Wild
Wild.plot: A chronicle of one woman's 1,100-mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.

Fury.name: Fury
Fury.plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

Tombstone.name: Tombstone
Tombstone.plot: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

Insomnia.name: Insomnia
Insomnia.plot: Arthur (Dennis Haysbert) is a man whose life is coming apart. Kept awake at night by the voices of those who torment him, he switches on his radio and tunes in a talk show. Soon he is calling and trying to match wits with the glib host. Enraged, Arthur is propelled into a series of events that led to tragedy.

Yogi Bear.name: Yogi Bear
Yogi Bear.plot: A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo and Ranger Smith.

King Kong.name: King Kong
King Kong.plot: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

Mama.name: Mama
Mama.plot: Ever since surviving a domestic violence attack, Kim Addison has found the courage to take matters into her own hands. After learning MMA training in order to learn self-defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. She has since set out to help others who have been victims of bullying and abuse just like her. Kim's personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13-year-old Logan Chauvin. Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies. He has been training vigorously with Kim to overcome his experience and is now getting ready for his first real MMA fight. Although Kim has done everything in her power to train Logan to stand up to bullies at school, there is very little she can do to protect him from his first real MMA opponent.

The Terminator.name: The Terminator
The Terminator.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

Seabiscuit.name: Seabiscuit
Seabiscuit.plot: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

Ted.name: Ted
Ted.plot: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted or his girlfriend, Lori.

Finding Neverland.name: Finding Neverland
Finding Neverland.plot: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

Amadeus.name: Amadeus
Amadeus.plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Tripwire.name: Tripwire
Tripwire.plot: A terrorist (Warner) and an FBI agent (Knox) fight out a personal feud with one another.

American Pie.name: American Pie
American Pie.plot: Crooks find out that the rich sisters they've kidnapped are too hot to handle.

Her.name: Her
Her.plot: We live in an era of online dating, open relationships, diverse sexuality preferences and female empowerment but what affects do our generational attributes have on modern dating experiences? This experiential docu-narrative discusses the differences of dating for young single and young committed women today. Interviews express emotions and beliefs which are visually interpreted by male creatives

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.plot: When Silence speaks so much louder than words...

Young Guns.name: Young Guns
Young Guns.plot: An outsider's look on gun ownership in New Hampshire and the rise of laws to control it.

The Calling.name: The Calling
The Calling.plot: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.

Forsaken.name: Forsaken
Forsaken.plot: In a rural town where football is war and the quarterback is king, comes a tense re imagining of MACBETH with a bloody twist to prove that Lady and King Macbeth didn't kill for power - They killed for love.

The Rugrats Movie.name: The Rugrats Movie
The Rugrats Movie.plot: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

The Amazing Spider-Man 2.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
The Amazing Spider-Man 2.plot: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

The Dark Knight.name: The Dark Knight
The Dark Knight.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Titanic.name: Titanic
Titanic.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

The Last Unicorn.name: The Last Unicorn
The Last Unicorn.plot: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

The Godfather.name: The Godfather
The Godfather.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

The Red Violin.name: The Red Violin
The Red Violin.plot: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

From Dusk Till Dawn.name: From Dusk Till Dawn
From Dusk Till Dawn.plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

The Pianist.name: The Pianist
The Pianist.plot: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

The River Wild.name: The River Wild
The River Wild.plot: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

The Bucket List.name: The Bucket List
The Bucket List.plot: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

The Terminal.name: The Terminal
The Terminal.plot: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

The Invasion.name: The Invasion
The Invasion.plot: As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

The Book of Eli.name: The Book of Eli
The Book of Eli.plot: A drifter fights his way across a ravaged, post-apocalyptic America while protecting a sacred book that holds the secrets to humanity's salvation.

The Aviator.name: The Aviator
The Aviator.plot: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

The Matrix Reloaded.name: The Matrix Reloaded
The Matrix Reloaded.plot: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

Once Upon a Time in America.name: Once Upon a Time in America
Once Upon a Time in America.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Cars 2.name: Cars 2
Cars 2.plot: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

Toy Story 2.name: Toy Story 2
Toy Story 2.plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

1984.plot: In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

The Great Debaters.name: The Great Debaters
The Great Debaters.plot: A drama based on the true story of Melvin B. Tolson, a professor at Wiley College Texas. In 1935, he inspired students to form the school's first debate team, which went on to challenge Harvard in the national championship.

The Covenant.name: The Covenant
The Covenant.plot: Four young men who belong to a New England supernatural legacy are forced to battle an elusive fifth power.

The Nanny Diaries.name: The Nanny Diaries
The Nanny Diaries.plot: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

Rise of the Planet of the Apes.name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
Rise of the Planet of the Apes.plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

Van Helsing.name: Van Helsing
Van Helsing.plot: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

District 9.name: District 9
District 9.plot: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

From Dusk till Dawn.name: From Dusk till Dawn
From Dusk till Dawn.plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Avatar.name: Avatar
Avatar.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

I, Robot.name: I, Robot
I, Robot.plot: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

Ex Machina.name: Ex Machina
Ex Machina.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

Suicide Squad.name: Suicide Squad
Suicide Squad.plot: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

The Mask.name: The Mask
The Mask.plot: A young archaeologist thinks he is cursed by an Aztec mask that makes him have strange nightmares. Before committing suicide, he sends the mask to his psychiatrist, who soon plunges into the mask's nightmarish world.

Watchmen.name: Watchmen
Watchmen.plot: In a version of 1985 where superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach on the trail of a conspiracy that will change the course of history.

In the Company of Men.name: In the Company of Men
In the Company of Men.plot: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

Like Crazy.name: Like Crazy
Like Crazy.plot: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

Sex, Lies, and Videotape.name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
Sex, Lies, and Videotape.plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

Insidious.name: Insidious
Insidious.plot: Times are tough for talented, twenty-one year old filmmaker, Donny Rocconi. He grew up in New York City, a place where either you learn fast, or lose everything. Estranged from his mother, and never knowing his dead father, Donny sets out to collect on debts owed, and is dragged deep into a seductive ambush that turns his world upside down. Donny reaches out for help from a "connected" Mulberry Street café owner, Gigetto, who has more problems than just the Russian mob. Insidious is a compelling and riveting story of desperation and betrayal, as Donny faces a fight for truth, love, and life itself. Insidious has a strong ensemble of New York City acting talent, and their multiple adult story lines are centered in their emotional and financial relationships.

Under the Same Moon.name: Under the Same Moon
Under the Same Moon.plot: After his grandmother passes away, a young Mexican boy illegally travels across the border to search for his undocumented mother living and working in the U.S.

Man on Wire.name: Man on Wire
Man on Wire.plot: A look at tightrope walker Philippe Petit's daring, but illegal, high-wire routine performed between New York City's World Trade Center's twin towers in 1974, what some consider, "the artistic crime of the century".

Timecrimes.name: Timecrimes
Timecrimes.plot: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

The Divide.name: The Divide
The Divide.plot: A short film exploring Spring Break culture through social media and the dating app Tinder.

Hobo with a Shotgun.name: Hobo with a Shotgun
Hobo with a Shotgun.plot: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

Oldboy.name: Oldboy
Oldboy.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

The Kids Are All Right.name: The Kids Are All Right
The Kids Are All Right.plot: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.

Take Shelter.name: Take Shelter
Take Shelter.plot: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

The Wackness.name: The Wackness
The Wackness.plot: It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.

Incendies.name: Incendies
Incendies.plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Freeheld.name: Freeheld
Freeheld.plot: New Jersey police lieutenant Laurel Hester and her registered domestic partner Stacie Andree battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

Hesher.name: Hesher
Hesher.plot: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

A Serious Man.name: A Serious Man
A Serious Man.plot: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

Harry Brown.name: Harry Brown
Harry Brown.plot: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

Woman on Top.name: Woman on Top
Woman on Top.plot: After being cheated on by an insecure man, Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco and finds success as the host of a cooking show.

The Wind That Shakes the Barley.name: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
The Wind That Shakes the Barley.plot: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

Volver.name: Volver
Volver.plot: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

World's Greatest Dad.name: World's Greatest Dad
World's Greatest Dad.plot: When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.

Womb.name: Womb
Womb.plot: A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.

Black Swan.name: Black Swan
Black Swan.plot: When tragedy strikes Detective Sam Baker, his world crumbles all around him. Numbing himself off from the rest of society he tries to solve a horrific murder, but ends up being involved as a prime suspect.

Funny Games.name: Funny Games
Funny Games.plot: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

In Bruges.name: In Bruges
In Bruges.plot: After a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

American Beauty.name: American Beauty
American Beauty.plot: Part of the March of Time series, this episode (Volume 12, Number 2) focuses entirely on the beauty industry in the USA. With spending of over $1 billion (in 1945) on cosmetic products, it has evolved into a major commercial enterprise. Packaging has proved to be a very important factor in sales and some $50 million per year is spent on advertising. The FDA look out for harmful products and Federal Trade Commission keeps an eye out for misleading claims. Spas and country resorts, where you can rest and relax, are gaining popularity for those who can afford it as are slenderizing salons and gymnasiums. Hairstyling has become an even bigger business. It's not only women who spend money on beauty products as some $300 million per year is spent by men.

Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon.name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon.plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Pan's Labyrinth.name: Pan's Labyrinth
Pan's Labyrinth.plot: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

United 93.name: United 93
United 93.plot: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Dark City.name: Dark City
Dark City.plot: Gamblers who "took" an out-of-town sucker in a crooked poker game feel shadowy vengeance closing in on them.

Taking Woodstock.name: Taking Woodstock
Taking Woodstock.plot: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

Midnight in Paris.name: Midnight in Paris
Midnight in Paris.plot: A story filled with joyful celebrations as it follows a group of high schoolers in Flint, Michigan. Focusing on 6 students and their families during the week leading up to prom. Bringing a community together as they celebrate the ending of a chapter and the beginning of a new one.

Micmacs.name: Micmacs
Micmacs.plot: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

Frozen.name: Frozen
Frozen.plot: Fearless optimist Anna teams up with rugged mountain man Kristoff and his loyal reindeer Sven in an epic journey to find Anna's sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom of Arendelle in eternal winter.

Our Idiot Brother.name: Our Idiot Brother
Our Idiot Brother.plot: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

Vicky Cristina Barcelona.name: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
Vicky Cristina Barcelona.plot: Two friends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

We Own the Night.name: We Own the Night
We Own the Night.plot: A New York City nightclub manager tries to save his brother and father from Russian Mafia hitmen.

Kiss Kiss Bang Bang.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Kiss Kiss Bang Bang.plot: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Dancer in the Dark.name: Dancer in the Dark
Dancer in the Dark.plot: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

The Young Victoria.name: The Young Victoria
The Young Victoria.plot: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger.name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger.plot: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute. Meanwhile, Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

Fair Game.name: Fair Game
Fair Game.plot: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

Blue Valentine.name: Blue Valentine
Blue Valentine.plot: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

Source Code.name: Source Code
Source Code.plot: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.

The Beaver.name: The Beaver
The Beaver.plot: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

The Fifth Element.name: The Fifth Element
The Fifth Element.plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

I Love You Phillip Morris.name: I Love You Phillip Morris
I Love You Phillip Morris.plot: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

Super.name: Super
Super.plot: Ryan is young and full of imaginative enthusiasm. He loves superheroes and spends his days moving from one adventure to the next with his two best friends. After watching a film that encourages his superhero dreams, Ryan decides that he too has what it takes to save the world, and decides to test his powers by "flying" off the balcony of his apartment. However, Ryan's spirit - and imagination - will not be crushed, and his adventure will continue on.

What Just Happened.name: What Just Happened
What Just Happened.plot: A professor relocates from the United States of America to Nigeria to take up a visiting professor job at the University of Ibadan and in search of love. She attempts to take a road trip from Lagos to Ibadan in southwest Nigeria, and that's when all hell is let loose, from getting robbed, arrested and lost. The movie is a narrative as Professor Oghogho (Ufuoma McDermott) is shown narrating her ordeal as a testimony in a church.

The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus.name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus.plot: Having made a deal with the Devil himself for immortality many millennia ago, the now decrepit mystic Doctor Parnassus fights for the freedom of his only daughter's soul.

O Brother, Where Art Thou?.name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
O Brother, Where Art Thou?.plot: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Over the Hedge.name: Over the Hedge
Over the Hedge.plot: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

Hollywood Ending.name: Hollywood Ending
Hollywood Ending.plot: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

Kung Fu Panda.name: Kung Fu Panda
Kung Fu Panda.plot: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

Velvet Goldmine.name: Velvet Goldmine
Velvet Goldmine.plot: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

Let Me In.name: Let Me In
Let Me In.plot: Family members lose their father to a violent murder in their house, but the murderer isn't caught. The family returns to the home years later, only to discover that the criminal was living in a hidden room the entire time.

Babel.name: Babel
Babel.plot: Babel tells the story of the Babels, a strange breed of four-foot-tall creatures who once coexisted happily with human beings on planet Earth. However, when the humans built a huge tower to taunt God, he became angry and drove the Babels underground, while scattering the humans to the corners of the Earth and giving them different languages to keep them separate. Thousands of years later, three Babels are searching underground for the Babel Stone presented to them by God when they lose the map -- which is soon snapped up by a dog, who presents it to his master, an advertising man named Patrick. The Babels are desperate to recover the map, and they recruit Patrick's son David to help them find it (and the Babel Stone) before the evil Nemrod can steal the stone and claim its powers.

The Tree of Life.name: The Tree of Life
The Tree of Life.plot: A woman from Los Angeles travels to Italy to trace the roots of her Italian Jewish ancestors.

Inglourious Basterds.name: Inglourious Basterds
genre: German military administration in occupied France during World War II
Inglourious Basterds.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Moonrise Kingdom.name: Moonrise Kingdom
Moonrise Kingdom.plot: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

Get Low.name: Get Low
Get Low.plot: A movie spun out of equal parts folk tale, fable and real-life legend about the mysterious, 1930s Tennessee hermit who famously threw his own rollicking funeral party... while he was still alive.

Zero Effect.name: Zero Effect
Zero Effect.plot: The world's greatest detective Daryl Zero aided by his associate Steve Arlo investigates a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!

The Town.name: The Town
The Town.plot: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold an assistant manager hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her.

Easy A.name: Easy A
Easy A.plot: When Olive lies to her best friend about losing her virginity to one of the college boys, a girl overhears their conversation. Soon, her story spreads across the entire school like wildfire.

Drive.name: Drive
Drive.plot: It is 1952. Dad has gone to war. Mom is entertaining a stranger in the corn. Justine tries to prevent her mother from making a terrible mistake. She may be young but she is wise.

Mulholland Drive.name: Mulholland Drive
Mulholland Drive.plot: After a car wreck on Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

The Greatest.name: The Greatest
The Greatest.plot: Muhammad Ali plays himself in a reconstruction of the events that brought him to fame.

Be Kind Rewind.name: Be Kind Rewind
Be Kind Rewind.plot: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

Moulin Rouge!.name: Moulin Rouge!
Moulin Rouge!.plot: A poor Bohemian poet in 1890s Paris falls for a beautiful courtesan and nightclub star coveted by a jealous duke.

Ocean's Thirteen.name: Ocean's Thirteen
Ocean's Thirteen.plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

Nowhere Boy.name: Nowhere Boy
Nowhere Boy.plot: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Cry.name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Cry.plot: Indiana Jones becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

Dogma.name: Dogma
Dogma.plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

The Ice Storm.name: The Ice Storm
The Ice Storm.plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

Sin City.name: Sin City
Sin City.plot: Sin City tells the story of Philip (Kunle Remi ) and Julia (Yvonne Nelson), a couple high up on the ladder of success and living their dream. Their marriage seems perfect except they can't seem to get to spend time with each other owing to Philips' frequent trips. Finally when they decide to spend time together and go away for a few days, only to find their relationship tested in unexpected ways.

127 Hours.name: 127 Hours
127 Hours.plot: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

Up in the Air.name: Up in the Air
Up in the Air.plot: "Up in the Air" is a documentary about dance world legend Louis Johnson, 84, and his accomplishments in an era of racial discrimination.

Shrek.name: Shrek
Shrek.plot: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

Jennifer's Body.name: Jennifer's Body
Jennifer's Body.plot: A newly-possessed high-school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

Snow Angels.name: Snow Angels
Snow Angels.plot: A drama that interweaves the life of a teenager, with his old baby sitter, her estranged husband, and their daughter.

Southland Tales.name: Southland Tales
Southland Tales.plot: During a three-day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

The King's Speech.name: The King's Speech
The King's Speech.plot: The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

Restless.name: Restless
Restless.plot: For Ari, nothing feels like anything. He doesn't do relationships, doesn't do attachments. There's only sex. That is until he meets Tiina. Together with Tiina and her closest circle of friends, this could be their last summer of freedom.

Red Riding Hood.name: Red Riding Hood
Red Riding Hood.plot: Grandma is babysitting her two grandkids. The girl wants to go out, but grandma asks them to hear a story first. The kids accept if they can change aspects of the story such as replacing the wolf with a werewolf. Is there a catch?

The Apostle.name: The Apostle
The Apostle.plot: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

The Piano Teacher.name: The Piano Teacher
The Piano Teacher.plot: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

The Pledge.name: The Pledge
The Pledge.plot: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

The Informers.name: The Informers
The Informers.plot: One week in L.A. in 1983, featuring movie executives, rock stars, a vampire and other morally challenged characters in adventures laced with sex, drugs and violence.

The Guard.name: The Guard
The Guard.plot: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an uptight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

Crash.name: Crash
Crash.plot: In the aftermath of a car crash, Maggie awaits rescue. When help arrives, matters take a turn for the worse.

Psycho.name: Psycho
Psycho.plot: In Gus Van Sant's remake of Alfred Hitchcock's classic, young female bank employee Marion Crane steals money from her boss in Phoenix, flees town, and arrives at Fairvale, California's rundown Bates Motel, which has secrets of its own.

Requiem for a Dream.name: Requiem for a Dream
Requiem for a Dream.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep..

Mystic River.name: Mystic River
Mystic River.plot: The tragic murder of a 19-year-old girl reunites three childhood friends still living in Boston--the victim's gangster father, a detective, and the disturbed man they both suspect of killing her.

The Messenger.name: The Messenger
The Messenger.plot: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

We Need to Talk About Kevin.name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
We Need to Talk About Kevin.plot: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

A Beautiful Mind.name: A Beautiful Mind
A Beautiful Mind.plot: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

No Country for Old Men.name: No Country for Old Men
No Country for Old Men.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Never Let Me Go.name: Never Let Me Go
Never Let Me Go.plot: An American reporter stationed in post-war Moscow marries a ballet dancer, but their relationship is threatened by the country's political volatility.

A Clockwork Orange.name: A Clockwork Orange
A Clockwork Orange.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

The Sweeney.name: The Sweeney
The Sweeney.plot: A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.

Made.name: Made
Made.plot: The story of the relationship between a young single mother and an insecure rock star.

The Border.name: The Border
The Border.plot: A corrupt border Agent decides to clean up his act when an impoverished woman's baby is put up for sale on the black market.

The Glass House.name: The Glass House
The Glass House.plot: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

The Fifth Estate.name: The Fifth Estate
The Fifth Estate.plot: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Zoom.name: Zoom
Zoom.plot: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

Thunderbirds.name: Thunderbirds
Thunderbirds.plot: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

Groundhog Day.name: Groundhog Day
Groundhog Day.plot: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

Jack-O.name: Jack-O
Jack-O.plot: A long long time ago a wizard was put to death, but he swore vengeance on the townsfolk that did him in, particularly Arthur Kelly's family. Arthur had done the final graces on him when he came back to life as Mr. Jack the Pumpkin Man. The Kellys proliferated through the years, and when some devil-may-care teens accidentally unleash Jack-O, young Sean Kelly must stop him somehow as his suburban world is accosted and the attrition rate climbs.

The Birdcage.name: The Birdcage
The Birdcage.plot: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

Used Cars.name: Used Cars
Used Cars.plot: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

The Wildest Dream.name: The Wildest Dream
The Wildest Dream.plot: Uses astonishing visuals to tell the intersecting stories of George Mallory, the first man to attempt a summit of Mount Everest, and Conrad Anker, the mountaineer who finds Mallory's frozen remains 75 years later.

Tarnation.name: Tarnation
Tarnation.plot: Filmmaker Jonathan Caouette's documentary on growing up with his schizophrenic mother -- a mixture of snapshots, Super-8 film, answering machine messages, video diaries, early short films, and more - culled from nineteen years of his life.

Hoop Dreams.name: Hoop Dreams
Hoop Dreams.plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

Bend It Like Beckham.name: Bend It Like Beckham
Bend It Like Beckham.plot: Two ambitious girls, despite their parents' wishes, have their hearts set on careers in professional football.

The Iron Lady.name: The Iron Lady
The Iron Lady.plot: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

White Squall.name: White Squall
White Squall.plot: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

The Tuxedo.name: The Tuxedo
The Tuxedo.plot: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

The Player.name: The Player
The Player.plot: The Player is a 2018 romantic melange that deals with a well-known playboy whose way with the ladies leads to a murder-for-hire.

Isn't She Great.name: Isn't She Great
Isn't She Great.plot: Bette Midler and Nathan Lane star in this comedy about Jacqueline Susann, the ambitious woman of dubious talent who wrote Valley of the Dolls, a best-selling novel that became a sensation.

Mean Streets.name: Mean Streets
Mean Streets.plot: In New York City's Little Italy, a devoutly Catholic mobster must reconcile his desire for power, his feelings for his epileptic lover, and his devotion to his troublesome friend.

The Kingdom.name: The Kingdom
The Kingdom.plot: A team of U.S. government agents are sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

Moneyball.name: Moneyball
Moneyball.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

The Country Bears.name: The Country Bears
The Country Bears.plot: Beary Barrington goes on an adventure to save Country Bear Hall by getting the Country Bears back together for a reunion concert.

Natural Born Killers.name: Natural Born Killers
Natural Born Killers.plot: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

The People Speak.name: The People Speak
The People Speak.plot: A look at America's struggles with war, class, race and women's rights. based on Howard Zinn's "A People's History of the United States."

The Simpsons Movie.name: The Simpsons Movie
The Simpsons Movie.plot: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

Jack and Jill.name: Jack and Jill
Jack and Jill.plot: Marvin Willert and Josie McCale work together at Sellex, an electronics company. When Marvin finally asks Josie on a date, she discovers that Marvin has built a television screen saver that blocks all commercial breaks, live or in rerun. Seeing an opportunity for both of them, Josie suggests that they team together to sell his invention. But first, she must get him fired from the company. Her idea is to have him pretend to sexually harass her. Then, away from the company, and over a reasonable amount of time in a secluded location, he will pretend to invent the apparatus he's already invented. The problem is, in order to steal the invention away from the rightful company, they must lie to the company, lie to his parents, and lie to her friend. In a beautiful lake cabin she rented for their adventure, they await the results of their larceny. Unfortunately, reality catches up with them in more ways than one.

The Loss of a Teardrop Diamond.name: The Loss of a Teardrop Diamond
The Loss of a Teardrop Diamond.plot: A rebellious socialite defies social conventions for a once-in-a-lifetime shot at true love, only to see her hopes shattered after a priceless diamond vanishes into thin air. Adapted from a long-lost Tennessee Williams screenplay.

Hot Tub Time Machine.name: Hot Tub Time Machine
Hot Tub Time Machine.plot: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

Lake of Fire.name: Lake of Fire
Lake of Fire.plot: A graphic documentary on both sides of the abortion debate.

Wings of Desire.name: Wings of Desire
Wings of Desire.plot: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

American Gangster.name: American Gangster
American Gangster.plot: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Undercover Brother.name: Undercover Brother
Undercover Brother.plot: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

Looking for Richard.name: Looking for Richard
Looking for Richard.plot: Al Pacino's deeply-felt rumination on Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews and an in-depth analysis of "Richard III."

Terror in the Aisles.name: Terror in the Aisles
Terror in the Aisles.plot: Horror film legends Donald Pleasance and Nancy Allen serve as the hosts and narrators for a compilation of scenes from many science fiction, crime drama, and horror movies of the 1930s through the 1980s.

All Together Now.name: All Together Now
All Together Now.plot: An optimistic high schooler with musical aspirations must learn to accept help from her friends to overcome her personal hardships and fulfill her dreams.

The House Bunny.name: The House Bunny
The House Bunny.plot: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the Playboy Mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

Jackie Brown.name: Jackie Brown
Jackie Brown.plot: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the ATF for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the illegal arms dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

Pauly Shore Is Dead.name: Pauly Shore Is Dead
Pauly Shore Is Dead.plot: Hollywood's Pauly Shore loses everything, fakes his own death, and gets caught.

Wayne's World 2.name: Wayne's World 2
Wayne's World 2.plot: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

Frankenweenie.name: Frankenweenie
Frankenweenie.plot: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

Who Killed the Electric Car?.name: Who Killed the Electric Car?
Who Killed the Electric Car?.plot: A documentary that investigates the birth and death of the electric car, as well as the role of renewable energy and sustainable living in the future.

Live Free or Die Hard.name: Live Free or Die Hard
Live Free or Die Hard.plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

Definitely, Maybe.name: Definitely, Maybe
Definitely, Maybe.plot: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

The Cable Guy.name: The Cable Guy
The Cable Guy.plot: A designer makes a grievious mistake when he rejects the friendship of a borderline cable guy.

Freakonomics.name: Freakonomics
Freakonomics.plot: A collection of documentaries that explores the hidden side of human nature through the use of the science of economics.

Stuck on You.name: Stuck on You
Stuck on You.plot: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

Zero Dark Thirty.name: Zero Dark Thirty
Zero Dark Thirty.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

This Must Be the Place.name: This Must Be the Place
This Must Be the Place.plot: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during W.W.II.

The Dictator.name: The Dictator
The Dictator.plot: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

Battleship.name: Battleship
Battleship.plot: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

Exit Through the Gift Shop.name: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Exit Through the Gift Shop.plot: Following the style of some of the world's most prolific street artists, an amateur filmmaker makes a foray into the art world.

Triumph of the Will.name: Triumph of the Will
Triumph of the Will.plot: The infamous propaganda film of the 1934 Nazi Party rally in Nuremberg, Germany.

The Doors.name: The Doors
The Doors.plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

A Bridge Too Far.name: A Bridge Too Far
A Bridge Too Far.plot: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

The Queen.name: The Queen
The Queen.plot: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

Brüno.name: Brüno
Brüno.plot: Flamboyant, gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.

Forrest Gump.name: Forrest Gump
Forrest Gump.plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

The Rum Diary.name: The Rum Diary
The Rum Diary.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

The Secret.name: The Secret
The Secret.plot: A stranger enters into and forever alters the life of a couple. He claims to be pursued by certain authorities who intend to prevent him from disclosing a secret that only he holds, whence the title. Is he lying, or insane - or is he telling the truth? Who, if anyone, is after him? And what *is* - the secret?

The Condemned.name: The Condemned
The Condemned.plot: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.
