XXX.name: XXX
XXX.plot: The US government recruits extreme sports athlete Xander Cage to infiltrate a Russian criminal ring, which is plotting the destruction of the world.

The Brave One.name: The Brave One
The Brave One.plot: A young boy named Leonardo adopts a bull after saving it during a storm, but their friendship is soon threatened by the legal owners of the animal who claim ownership of it and ship it off to the bullring to face a legendary bullfighter.

Shit Year.name: Shit Year
Shit Year.plot: An actress finds herself adrift after she quits performing.

Strange Behavior.name: Strange Behavior
Strange Behavior.plot: A scientist is experimenting with teenagers and turning them into murderers.

The Last Kiss.name: The Last Kiss
The Last Kiss.plot: Michael, at 30, has a great job, still have his four best friends, and has a beautiful girlfriend, but his life seems predictable. Until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.

Foolproof.name: Foolproof
Foolproof.plot: Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.

Young Guns II.name: Young Guns II
Young Guns II.plot: Billy the Kid and his band of outlaws are pursued across New Mexico territory by Sheriff Pat Garrett, who the young gunslingers must face-off with if they are to reach the safety of the border.

The Man from Earth.name: The Man from Earth
The Man from Earth.plot: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

Safety Not Guaranteed.name: Safety Not Guaranteed
Safety Not Guaranteed.plot: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

Airplane!.name: Airplane!
Airplane!.plot: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.

The Man from Snowy River.name: The Man from Snowy River
The Man from Snowy River.plot: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, he takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

The Words.name: The Words
The Words.plot: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

The Pallbearer.name: The Pallbearer
The Pallbearer.plot: A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town.

Kites.name: Kites
Kites.plot: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

MacGruber.name: MacGruber
MacGruber.plot: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

Swimfan.name: Swimfan
Swimfan.plot: A high school senior with a promising swimming career has a one-night stand with consequences.

She's All That.name: She's All That
She's All That.plot: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

Saw III.name: Saw III
Saw III.plot: Jigsaw abducts a doctor in order to keep himself alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen named Jeff through a brutal test.

Saw VI.name: Saw VI
Saw VI.plot: Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.

Zack and Miri Make a Porno.name: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
Zack and Miri Make a Porno.plot: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

Mindhunters.name: Mindhunters
Mindhunters.plot: A group of FBI trainees are taken to a remote island for simulation training. However, once there, they realize that they are being hunted by a serial killer, who might be someone amidst them.

Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins.name: Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins
Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins.plot: Dr. R.J. Stevens is a talk-show host who visits his family in the Deep South. While there he reunites with his brother Otis, his sister Betty, his cousin/rival Clyde, and his childhood love interest Lucinda Allen.

Rob Roy.name: Rob Roy
Rob Roy.plot: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

The Jacket.name: The Jacket
The Jacket.plot: A rower recounts an eerie encounter at the waterfront.

The Replacement Killers.name: The Replacement Killers
The Replacement Killers.plot: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

Looper.name: Looper
Looper.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

Step Up Revolution.name: Step Up Revolution
Step Up Revolution.plot: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's real estate development plans.

The Social Network.name: The Social Network
The Social Network.plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Invictus.name: Invictus
Invictus.plot: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

Man on Fire.name: Man on Fire
Man on Fire.plot: A wealthy businessman whose wife has divorced him, is bitter about the divorce, and prevents his ex-wife from seeing their child. She takes him to court, and a judge tries to determine what will be best for the child.

Step Brothers.name: Step Brothers
Step Brothers.plot: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

The Matrix.name: The Matrix
The Matrix.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Tears of the Sun.name: Tears of the Sun
Tears of the Sun.plot: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

Now You See Me.name: Now You See Me
Now You See Me.plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

Surrogates.name: Surrogates
Surrogates.plot: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

Safe House.name: Safe House
Safe House.plot: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

The Campaign.name: The Campaign
The Campaign.plot: An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

The Green Hornet.name: The Green Hornet
The Green Hornet.plot: A newspaper publisher and his Korean servant fight crime as vigilantes who pose as a notorious masked gangster and his aide.

The Matrix Revolutions.name: The Matrix Revolutions
The Matrix Revolutions.plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

Red Corner.name: Red Corner
Red Corner.plot: Aaron Ramos coaches Tyler Hogan, a 16-year-old boy from London. During his time at London Fight Factory Aaron has become a support for Tyler inside and outside of the gym. As part of their yearly training, Aaron takes thirty students out to Koh Samui, an island in Thailand to train at Superpro Samui. This is Tyler's first time visiting the country and he will have to encounter the humidity and intense boot camp the Thai team has to offer. Upon his return, Tyler's brother Jake helps him train towards the biggest fight of his life, a 5 round decision bout at Nemesis Gym.

Wildcats.name: Wildcats
Wildcats.plot: Rookie high school football coach Molly McGrath has a harder time than she expected trying to whip her tough inner-city team members into shape.

Why Do Fools Fall in Love.name: Why Do Fools Fall in Love
Why Do Fools Fall in Love.plot: Three women each claim to be the widow of 1950s doo-wop singer Frankie Lymon, claiming legal rights to his estate.

Gangster Squad.name: Gangster Squad
Gangster Squad.plot: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

Miss Congeniality.name: Miss Congeniality
Miss Congeniality.plot: Gracie Hart, a tomboyish detective, is made to infiltrate the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant after her department learns that the event is under threat from an anonymous bomber.

Charlie Wilson's War.name: Charlie Wilson's War
Charlie Wilson's War.plot: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

Pineapple Express.name: Pineapple Express
Pineapple Express.plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

Four Christmases.name: Four Christmases
Four Christmases.plot: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Gone in 60 Seconds.name: Gone in 60 Seconds
Gone in 60 Seconds.plot: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

Norbit.name: Norbit
Norbit.plot: A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

Welcome to the Punch.name: Welcome to the Punch
Welcome to the Punch.plot: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

The Lost Boys.name: The Lost Boys
The Lost Boys.plot: In a juvenile reform center, a place governed by the prohibition of physical contact, Joe and William fall in love. To love each other, they will have to break the law.

While You Were Sleeping.name: While You Were Sleeping
While You Were Sleeping.plot: A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority ticket booth operator is mistaken for the fiancée of a comatose patient.

The Good Thief.name: The Good Thief
The Good Thief.plot: A work of Real Lyrical Beauty, Beautiful Cinematography, Superb Acting, Highly Recommended -Philadelphia Festival of World Cinema_Shot on the streets of Philadelphia, Saint Christopher depicts the constant struggle between good and evil, with definitive religious implications, embodied in a young man battling his destructive forces in order to fulfill his destiny. Charismatic Christopher Doogan has lead a troubled life. As he returns home from prison hoping to put the pies of his life back together and atone for his past mistakes, he discovers that his destiny is irrevocably intertwined with his reckless past. Refusing to give up Christopher finds strength to move on in unexpected places. _www.goodthief.com

The Ghost and the Darkness.name: The Ghost and the Darkness
The Ghost and the Darkness.plot: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

Gentlemen Broncos.name: Gentlemen Broncos
Gentlemen Broncos.plot: A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.

Bridesmaids.name: Bridesmaids
Bridesmaids.plot: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

Friends with Kids.name: Friends with Kids
Friends with Kids.plot: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels.plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

You Can Count on Me.name: You Can Count on Me
You Can Count on Me.plot: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

Starter for 10.name: Starter for 10
Starter for 10.plot: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

Crazy Heart.name: Crazy Heart
Crazy Heart.plot: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

Lockout.name: Lockout
Lockout.plot: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the President's daughter from an outer-space prison taken over by violent inmates.

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.plot: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

Shark Tale.name: Shark Tale
Shark Tale.plot: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

Saw V.name: Saw V
Saw V.plot: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

The Notorious Bettie Page.name: The Notorious Bettie Page
The Notorious Bettie Page.plot: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

Summer of Sam.name: Summer of Sam
Summer of Sam.plot: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

She Hate Me.name: She Hate Me
She Hate Me.plot: Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.

Face/Off.name: Face/Off
Face/Off.plot: To foil a terrorist plot, FBI agent Sean Archer assumes the identity of the criminal Castor Troy who murdered his son through facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

Con Air.name: Con Air
Con Air.plot: Newly-paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner-transport plane when the passengers seize control.

Project X.name: Project X
Project X.plot: Three high-school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.

Bruce Almighty.name: Bruce Almighty
Bruce Almighty.plot: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

The Break-Up.name: The Break-Up
The Break-Up.plot: A couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment as each tries to keep their luxurious condo from the other.

Amelia.name: Amelia
Amelia.plot: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

The Patriot.name: The Patriot
The Patriot.plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

Reservoir Dogs.name: Reservoir Dogs
Reservoir Dogs.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

The Avengers.name: The Avengers
The Avengers.plot: A British journalist working in Norway during WWII finds himself hunted by the Germans when he's tasked with a secret combat mission, while the daughter of a Norwegian sea captain helps the Brits combat the Nazi menace.

Machine Gun Preacher.name: Machine Gun Preacher
Machine Gun Preacher.plot: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

The Crazies.name: The Crazies
The Crazies.plot: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

Collateral.name: Collateral
Collateral.plot: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

THX 1138.name: THX 1138
THX 1138.plot: In the 25th century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

The Incredible Hulk.name: The Incredible Hulk
The Incredible Hulk.plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

The Illusionist.name: The Illusionist
The Illusionist.plot: The journey of a magician performing illusions to amaze and humour.

The World's End.name: The World's End
The World's End.plot: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from twenty years earlier unwittingly become humanity's only hope for survival.

Fast Five.name: Fast Five
Fast Five.plot: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

Walking Tall.name: Walking Tall
Walking Tall.plot: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

Fast & Furious 6.name: Fast & Furious 6
Fast & Furious 6.plot: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries, but Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

The Scorpion King.name: The Scorpion King
The Scorpion King.plot: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

Training Day.name: Training Day
Training Day.plot: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

Set It Off.name: Set It Off
Set It Off.plot: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

Hotel for Dogs.name: Hotel for Dogs
Hotel for Dogs.plot: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.

Iron Man 3.name: Iron Man 3
Iron Man 3.plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

The Daytrippers.name: The Daytrippers
The Daytrippers.plot: When she discovers a love letter written to her husband by an unknown paramour, the distraught Eliza turns to her tight-knit Long Island family for advice.

Wrath of the Titans.name: Wrath of the Titans
Wrath of the Titans.plot: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

Batman Returns.name: Batman Returns
Batman Returns.plot: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

Million Dollar Baby.name: Million Dollar Baby
Million Dollar Baby.plot: Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.

Why Did I Get Married Too?.name: Why Did I Get Married Too?
Why Did I Get Married Too?.plot: Four couples struggle to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.

Superbad.name: Superbad
Superbad.plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Bound.name: Bound
Bound.plot: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

Harsh Times.name: Harsh Times
Harsh Times.plot: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Takers.name: Takers
Takers.plot: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

This Christmas.name: This Christmas
This Christmas.plot: A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.

The Devil's Advocate.name: The Devil's Advocate
The Devil's Advocate.plot: An exceptionally-adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss--the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

The Burning Plain.name: The Burning Plain
The Burning Plain.plot: A drama with a two-tiered storyline concerning a mother and daughter who try to form a bond after the young woman's difficult childhood.

Prometheus.name: Prometheus
Prometheus.plot: Prometheus is a contemporary quest story set in end-of-millennium Britain and continental Europe. It asks what humanity has made of Prometheus' gift of fire - energy, technology, expertise, but also destruction, pollution and war.

Young Adult.name: Young Adult
Young Adult.plot: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

White House Down.name: White House Down
White House Down.plot: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

Dinner for Schmucks.name: Dinner for Schmucks
Dinner for Schmucks.plot: After he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their special guests, a rising executive questions the merits of his invitation just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.

The Republic of Love.name: The Republic of Love
The Republic of Love.plot: A thrice-divorced radio host and a commitment-shy art curator fall in love, but their relationship is affected by the experiences of their friends and families.

Capote.name: Capote
Capote.plot: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

Extraordinary Measures.name: Extraordinary Measures
Extraordinary Measures.plot: A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.

Journey to the Center of the Earth.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Journey to the Center of the Earth.plot: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

Full Frontal.name: Full Frontal
Full Frontal.plot: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

Death Proof.name: Death Proof
Death Proof.plot: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

Django Unchained.name: Django Unchained
Django Unchained.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

The Others.name: The Others
The Others.plot: On their last day of classes, three high-school misfits plan the ultimate senior prank.

True Romance.name: True Romance
True Romance.plot: In Detroit, a pop-culture nerd steals cocaine from his new wife's pimp and tries to sell it in Hollywood, prompting the mobsters who own the drugs to pursue the couple.

Planet Terror.name: Planet Terror
Planet Terror.plot: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

Scary Movie.name: Scary Movie
Scary Movie.plot: A paranoid teenage nerd comes to believe that an escaped lunatic may be hiding in the neighborhood Halloween house of horrors, and slowly starts to descend into madness.

Gangs of New York.name: Gangs of New York
Gangs of New York.plot: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher; his father's killer.

Grindhouse.name: Grindhouse
Grindhouse.plot: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the '60s and '70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

Levity.name: Levity
Levity.plot: After two decades in prison for murder, a man is released on parole and returns to his hometown seeking redemption.

Lost in Translation.name: Lost in Translation
Lost in Translation.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

Rushmore.name: Rushmore
Rushmore.plot: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

Zombieland.name: Zombieland
Zombieland.plot: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

Cadillac Records.name: Cadillac Records
Cadillac Records.plot: Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.

Soul Men.name: Soul Men
Soul Men.plot: Though it's been about twenty years since they have spoken with one another, two estranged soul-singing legends agree to participate in a reunion performance at the Apollo Theater to honor their recently deceased band leader.

Mr. 3000.name: Mr. 3000
Mr. 3000.plot: Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

Tropic Thunder.name: Tropic Thunder
Tropic Thunder.plot: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

Good Will Hunting.name: Good Will Hunting
Good Will Hunting.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Rain Man.name: Rain Man
Rain Man.plot: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.

The Interpreter.name: The Interpreter
The Interpreter.plot: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

Michael Clayton.name: Michael Clayton
Michael Clayton.plot: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

Knocked Up.name: Knocked Up
Knocked Up.plot: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

Being John Malkovich.name: Being John Malkovich
Being John Malkovich.plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Pretty in Pink.name: Pretty in Pink
Pretty in Pink.plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

American Wedding.name: American Wedding
American Wedding.plot: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

Zoolander.name: Zoolander
Zoolander.plot: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

The Royal Tenenbaums.name: The Royal Tenenbaums
The Royal Tenenbaums.plot: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

Out of Sight.name: Out of Sight
Out of Sight.plot: Teenage/secret agent/musical comedy about Big Daddy, who's been "driven mad by rock'n'roll," so he plans to sabotage a music fair with a bomb. Secret agent Homer comes to the rescue aided by his girlfriend Sandra along with Marvin. The sinister villains belong to the crime syndicate F.L.U.S.H. Featuring the musical groups The Turtles, Gary Lewis and the Playboys, The Astronauts, The Knickerbockers, and Freddie and the Dreamers.

Hancock.name: Hancock
Hancock.plot: Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.

Grandma's Boy.name: Grandma's Boy
Grandma's Boy.plot: A meek young man must find the courage within when a rogue tramp menaces his home town.

Here Comes the Boom.name: Here Comes the Boom
Here Comes the Boom.plot: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

The Waterboy.name: The Waterboy
The Waterboy.plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

Hotel Transylvania.name: Hotel Transylvania
Hotel Transylvania.plot: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

Grown Ups.name: Grown Ups
Grown Ups.plot: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

The Longest Yard.name: The Longest Yard
The Longest Yard.plot: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

American Dreamz.name: American Dreamz
American Dreamz.plot: Scott Hercman realizes what it feels like to make dreams come true.

Mr. Bean's Holiday.name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
Mr. Bean's Holiday.plot: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.

The Last Samurai.name: The Last Samurai
The Last Samurai.plot: Following the trail of a samurai ancestor, two Japanese businessmen on a quest for spiritual fulfillment arrive in Africa with a group of tourists, only to get kidnapped by the local guerrilla leader. A tough mercenary must rescue them.

MegaMind.name: MegaMind
MegaMind.plot: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

Stepmom.name: Stepmom
Stepmom.plot: A terminally ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

Real Steel.name: Real Steel
Real Steel.plot: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

Young Sherlock Holmes.name: Young Sherlock Holmes
Young Sherlock Holmes.plot: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

Cowboys & Aliens.name: Cowboys & Aliens
Cowboys & Aliens.plot: A spaceship arrives in 1873 Arizona to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. All that stands in their way: a posse of cowboys and natives.

The Legend of Zorro.name: The Legend of Zorro
The Legend of Zorro.plot: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

Jurassic World.name: Jurassic World
Jurassic World.plot: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

The Goonies.name: The Goonies
The Goonies.plot: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

The Mask of Zorro.name: The Mask of Zorro
The Mask of Zorro.plot: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

Transformers.name: Transformers
Transformers.plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

Jurassic Park III.name: Jurassic Park III
Jurassic Park III.plot: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

The Pink Panther 2.name: The Pink Panther 2
The Pink Panther 2.plot: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

The Big Year.name: The Big Year
The Big Year.plot: Two bird enthusiasts try to defeat the cocky, cutthroat world record holder in a year-long bird-spotting competition.

Traitor.name: Traitor
Traitor.plot: When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer, Samir Horn.

Think Like A Man.name: Think Like A Man
Think Like A Man.plot: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

Public Enemies.name: Public Enemies
Public Enemies.plot: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Monster House.name: Monster House
Monster House.plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

The Perfect Storm.name: The Perfect Storm
The Perfect Storm.plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Furry Vengeance.name: Furry Vengeance
Furry Vengeance.plot: In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.

The Ice Harvest.name: The Ice Harvest
The Ice Harvest.plot: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

Fun with Dick and Jane.name: Fun with Dick and Jane
Fun with Dick and Jane.plot: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

A Good Day to Die Hard.name: A Good Day to Die Hard
A Good Day to Die Hard.plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

The Assassination of Jesse James by the.name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
The Assassination of Jesse James by the.plot: Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Your Sister's Sister.name: Your Sister's Sister
Your Sister's Sister.plot: Iris invites her friend Jack to stay at her family's island getaway after his brother's death. Jack's drunken encounter with Iris' sister Hannah at their remote cabin kicks off a revealing stretch of days.

Back to the Future.name: Back to the Future
Back to the Future.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Back to the Future Part III.name: Back to the Future Part III
Back to the Future Part III.plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

The Last Airbender.name: The Last Airbender
The Last Airbender.plot: Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

Men in Black II.name: Men in Black II
Men in Black II.plot: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

The Pacifier.name: The Pacifier
The Pacifier.plot: Having recovered from wounds received in a failed rescue operation, Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

Scream 2.name: Scream 2
Scream 2.plot: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

Scream 4.name: Scream 4
Scream 4.plot: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.

Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.plot: A dramatization of the July 20, 1944 assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Adolf Hitler during World War II.

The Road to El Dorado.name: The Road to El Dorado
The Road to El Dorado.plot: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

There's Something About Mary.name: There's Something About Mary
There's Something About Mary.plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

Armageddon.name: Armageddon
Armageddon.plot: In the near future, 10 men are voted as the 10 who could lead the world; on the list is leading Hong Kong scientist Dr. Ken.

The Princess and the Frog.name: The Princess and the Frog
The Princess and the Frog.plot: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

Hollywood Homicide.name: Hollywood Homicide
Hollywood Homicide.plot: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Pulp Fiction.name: Pulp Fiction
Pulp Fiction.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Syriana.name: Syriana
Syriana.plot: A politically charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved in and affected by it.

Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy.name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy.plot: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

What If....name: What If...
What If....plot: Under the Athenian night sky, before the silent threat of an imminent socio-economic crisis, a young man goes for a stroll and meets the love of his life. Does fate govern one's existence? What would have happened if he stayed in, instead?

Wreck-It Ralph.name: Wreck-It Ralph
Wreck-It Ralph.plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

Collateral Damage.name: Collateral Damage
Collateral Damage.plot: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

Arthur Christmas.name: Arthur Christmas
Arthur Christmas.plot: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a misplaced present to a young girl in less than two hours on Christmas Day.

Stuart Little 2.name: Stuart Little 2
Stuart Little 2.plot: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

The Spiderwick Chronicles.name: The Spiderwick Chronicles
The Spiderwick Chronicles.plot: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

Rise of the Guardians.name: Rise of the Guardians
Rise of the Guardians.plot: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

Kung Fu Panda 2.name: Kung Fu Panda 2
Kung Fu Panda 2.plot: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

Men in Black.name: Men in Black
Men in Black.plot: The stooges become doctors at a large hospital where they disrupt patients and staff alike.

Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade.plot: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.plot: In 1935, Indiana Jones is tasked by Indian villagers with reclaiming a rock stolen from them by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

The Land Before Time.name: The Land Before Time
The Land Before Time.plot: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

More American Graffiti.name: More American Graffiti
More American Graffiti.plot: Told in four different New Year's Eves in the mid 1960s, John, Terry, Debbie, Steve and Laurie deal with adulthood, the Vietnam war, peace rallies, and relationships.

Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

Bobby.name: Bobby
Bobby.plot: A film which marks the 50th anniversary of England's victory in the 1966 World Cup, and uncovers the truth behind the man who led them to it - Bobby is a portrait of a footballing icon. Bobby Moore fought many battles besides those witnessed by millions on the football field. Behind the glory lies the story of a man who faced highs and lows with the same strength and bravery. But he died young, cruelly shunned by the game and by the very people who owed him so much. The story is told by his two wives, his friends and fans, including Pele, Sir Geoff Hurst, Harry Redknapp, Ray Davies, Ray Winstone and Russell Brand, and more than 30 others, whose words are mixed with previously unseen archive footage.

Back to the Future Part II.name: Back to the Future Part II
Back to the Future Part II.plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

Evan Almighty.name: Evan Almighty
Evan Almighty.plot: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

50 First Dates.name: 50 First Dates
50 First Dates.plot: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

Scream.name: Scream
Scream.plot: Melis dedicates herself to raising her son. At one point her body becomes associated with weapons testing which means nuclear experiments. This revelation causes a great stir in the village.

Donnie Darko.name: Donnie Darko
Donnie Darko.plot: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

The Amazing Spider-Man.name: The Amazing Spider-Man
The Amazing Spider-Man.plot: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

Little Fockers.name: Little Fockers
Little Fockers.plot: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker, have what it takes?

Uptown Girls.name: Uptown Girls
Uptown Girls.plot: A grown-up woman who kept her childish instincts and behavior starts working as the nanny of an 8-year-old girl who actually acts like an adult. But everything ends right-side up.

The Fighter.name: The Fighter
The Fighter.plot: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

The Golden Compass.name: The Golden Compass
The Golden Compass.plot: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Bram Stoker's Dracula.name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
Bram Stoker's Dracula.plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

Sorority Row.name: Sorority Row
Sorority Row.plot: A group of sorority sisters try to cover up the death of their house-sister after a prank gone wrong, only to be stalked by a serial killer.

Fanboys.name: Fanboys
Fanboys.plot: In the year 1999, a group of rebels enlists the aid of a young Star Wars fan to steal a copy of The Phantom Menace to aid their cause. But are their motives as noble as they appear?

Scream 3.name: Scream 3
Scream 3.plot: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

Spider-Man 2.name: Spider-Man 2
Spider-Man 2.plot: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a former brilliant scientist named Otto Octavius.

Spider-Man 3.name: Spider-Man 3
Spider-Man 3.plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Army of Darkness.name: Army of Darkness
Army of Darkness.plot: When Ash Williams is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead in order to return home.

The Evil Dead.name: The Evil Dead
The Evil Dead.plot: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

Iron Man 2.name: Iron Man 2
Iron Man 2.plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

School for Scoundrels.name: School for Scoundrels
School for Scoundrels.plot: A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda.

Funny People.name: Funny People
Funny People.plot: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.

I Love You, Man.name: I Love You, Man
I Love You, Man.plot: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

This Is the End.name: This Is the End
This Is the End.plot: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

Point Break.name: Point Break
Point Break.plot: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

Proof of Life.name: Proof of Life
Proof of Life.plot: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

Monsters, Inc..name: Monsters, Inc.
Monsters, Inc..plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

Ratatouille.name: Ratatouille
Ratatouille.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

Monsters University.name: Monsters University
Monsters University.plot: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski and James P. "Sully" Sullivan during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

Dance Flick.name: Dance Flick
Dance Flick.plot: Street dancer Thomas Uncles is from the wrong side of the tracks, but his bond with the beautiful Megan White might help the duo realize their dreams as they enter in the mother of all dance battles.

Romance & Cigarettes.name: Romance & Cigarettes
Romance & Cigarettes.plot: This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

The Duchess.name: The Duchess
The Duchess.plot: A chronicle of the life of 18th-century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was revered for her extravagant political and personal life.

Thank You for Smoking.name: Thank You for Smoking
Thank You for Smoking.plot: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

Old School.name: Old School
Old School.plot: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

What's Eating Gilbert Grape.name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
What's Eating Gilbert Grape.plot: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

Finding Nemo.name: Finding Nemo
Finding Nemo.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Brokeback Mountain.name: Brokeback Mountain
Brokeback Mountain.plot: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

Be Cool.name: Be Cool
Be Cool.plot: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

Get Shorty.name: Get Shorty
Get Shorty.plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

I Don't Know How She Does It.name: I Don't Know How She Does It
I Don't Know How She Does It.plot: A comedy centered on the life of Kate Reddy, a finance executive who is the breadwinner for her husband and two kids.

The Game.name: The Game
The Game.plot: Trying to figure out the game of life, one becomes lost in his own field of dreams.

Whiteout.name: Whiteout
Whiteout.plot: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica as the sun is about to set for six months.

Bee Season.name: Bee Season
Bee Season.plot: Wife and mother Miriam begins a downward emotional spiral as her husband avoids their collapsing marriage by immersing himself in his 11-year-old daughter's quest to become a spelling-bee champion.

The Proposal.name: The Proposal
The Proposal.plot: Young loving couple holds a romantic dinner where Ethan makes an offer to Erin to marry him. This evening will inspire Erin to write a new composition

True Grit.name: True Grit
True Grit.plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

End of Days.name: End of Days
End of Days.plot: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

War Horse.name: War Horse
War Horse.plot: Based on Michael Morpurgo's novel and adapted for the stage by Nick Stafford, War Horse takes audiences on an extraordinary journey from the fields of rural Devon to the trenches of First World War France.

The Talented Mr. Ripley.name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
The Talented Mr. Ripley.plot: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

Kick-Ass.name: Kick-Ass
Kick-Ass.plot: A semi-reboot of the Kick-Ass franchise focusing on Patience Lee picking up the mantle of Kick-Ass from David Lizewsk.

The Rules of Attraction.name: The Rules of Attraction
The Rules of Attraction.plot: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

Blood Work.name: Blood Work
Blood Work.plot: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

End of Watch.name: End of Watch
End of Watch.plot: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

Black Hawk Down.name: Black Hawk Down
Black Hawk Down.plot: An in depth look at the troubled US intervention in Somalia. We reconstruct the most devastating battles between marines and Somalis using US army broadcasts.

The Third Wheel.name: The Third Wheel
The Third Wheel.plot: A man accidentally hits a homeless person with his car and then can't seem to get rid of him the rest of the night.

Tangled.name: Tangled
Tangled.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Horton Hears a Who!.name: Horton Hears a Who!
Horton Hears a Who!.plot: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

The Mist.name: The Mist
The Mist.plot: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

Tell No One.name: Tell No One
Tell No One.plot: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

The English Patient.name: The English Patient
The English Patient.plot: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

Shutter Island.name: Shutter Island
Shutter Island.plot: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

The Cider House Rules.name: The Cider House Rules
The Cider House Rules.plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

The Polar Express.name: The Polar Express
The Polar Express.plot: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

In Her Shoes.name: In Her Shoes
In Her Shoes.plot: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

Cold Mountain.name: Cold Mountain
Cold Mountain.plot: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

The Godfather Part II.name: The Godfather Part II
The Godfather Part II.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

The Bourne Supremacy.name: The Bourne Supremacy
The Bourne Supremacy.plot: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

The Bourne Identity.name: The Bourne Identity
The Bourne Identity.plot: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Dear John.name: Dear John
Dear John.plot: A girl who is stalked by a psychotic manic hides out with transvestites who aren't at all what they seem.

Sense and Sensibility.name: Sense and Sensibility
Sense and Sensibility.plot: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

The Perks of Being a Wallflower.name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
The Perks of Being a Wallflower.plot: Charlie, a 15-year-old introvert, enters high school and is nervous about his new life. When he befriends his seniors, he learns to cope with his friend's suicide and his tumultuous past.

The Time Traveler's Wife.name: The Time Traveler's Wife
The Time Traveler's Wife.plot: Henry DeTamble, a librarian, possesses a unique gene that lets him involuntarily travel through time. His wife, Claire Abshire, finds it difficult to cope with it.

The Help.name: The Help
The Help.plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

The Kite Runner.name: The Kite Runner
The Kite Runner.plot: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.

Angels & Demons.name: Angels & Demons
Angels & Demons.plot: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

2012.plot: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

The Great Dictator.name: The Great Dictator
The Great Dictator.plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Eraserhead.name: Eraserhead
Eraserhead.plot: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

12 Angry Men.name: 12 Angry Men
12 Angry Men.plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Rocky.name: Rocky
Rocky.plot: Shankar a union leader looses his life in accident at work site while he was fighting with his boss Ratanlal for rights of workers,Ratanlal decides to agree on Shankar's demands after his death with due respect.But JD and Ram Avtar aren't happy with his decision and kill him unlike Shankar.Shankar's friend Robert Dsouza decides to support his family but JD starts to eye Shankar's widow Parvati and tries to molest her,while trying to save his mother Shankar's son Rakesh hurts himself and goes in trauma.Rakesh whenever sees his mother gets the same vision and looses his control so Robert and his wife Katy decide to adopt him and name him Rocky Dsouza.Years later Rocky has grown up to be a handsome guy and falls in love with Renu daughter of Ratanlal while on trip to Srinagar but Renu mistakes him to be RD son of JD until the truth is out.Rocky and Renu fall in love and RD tries to creates hurdles where Rocky also finds that JD was responsible for spoiling their life and killing his father.

The Best Years of Our Lives.name: The Best Years of Our Lives
The Best Years of Our Lives.plot: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Once Upon a Time in the West.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
Once Upon a Time in the West.plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Patton.name: Patton
Patton.plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

Schindler's List.name: Schindler's List
Schindler's List.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

The Sting.name: The Sting
The Sting.plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.plot: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. After considering their options, they escape to South America.

The Deer Hunter.name: The Deer Hunter
The Deer Hunter.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Goodfellas.name: Goodfellas
Goodfellas.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Touch of Evil.name: Touch of Evil
Touch of Evil.plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

Young Frankenstein.name: Young Frankenstein
Young Frankenstein.plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

Raging Bull.name: Raging Bull
Raging Bull.plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

Night of the Living Dead.name: Night of the Living Dead
Night of the Living Dead.plot: A group of strangers must survive an onslaught from the undead that lasts through the night, all while trying to get along, as they wait for help to arrive.

Hoosiers.name: Hoosiers
Hoosiers.plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

The French Connection.name: The French Connection
The French Connection.plot: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Apocalypse Now.name: Apocalypse Now
Apocalypse Now.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Fast Times at Ridgemont High.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
Fast Times at Ridgemont High.plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

North by Northwest.name: North by Northwest
North by Northwest.plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

This Is Spinal Tap.name: This Is Spinal Tap
This Is Spinal Tap.plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

Tootsie.name: Tootsie
Tootsie.plot: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

Dances with Wolves.name: Dances with Wolves
Dances with Wolves.plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Jaws.name: Jaws
Jaws.plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

In Cold Blood.name: In Cold Blood
In Cold Blood.plot: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest.plot: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Pontypool.name: Pontypool
Pontypool.plot: A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.

Stone.name: Stone
Stone.plot: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.plot: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

What's Your Number?.name: What's Your Number?
What's Your Number?.plot: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

Skyfall.name: Skyfall
Skyfall.plot: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

JFK.name: JFK
genre: John F. Kennedy assassination conspiracy theories
JFK.plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

You Only Live Twice.name: You Only Live Twice
You Only Live Twice.plot: James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.

Wild Wild West.name: Wild Wild West
Wild Wild West.plot: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

GoldenEye.name: GoldenEye
GoldenEye.plot: When a powerful secret defense system is stolen, James Bond is assigned to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using it.

East of Eden.name: East of Eden
East of Eden.plot: Two brothers in 1910s California struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor as an old secret about their long-absent mother comes to light.

Spun.name: Spun
Spun.plot: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

Blow Out.name: Blow Out
Blow Out.plot: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Red Dawn.name: Red Dawn
Red Dawn.plot: A Claustrophobic experience which involves a Mexican middle class family into the atrocities made by wild and heartless army forces whose main objective seems to be students who do not permit the 1968's Olimpic games' to develop normally.

Kingdom of Heaven.name: Kingdom of Heaven
Kingdom of Heaven.plot: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

Minority Report.name: Minority Report
Minority Report.plot: John works with the PreCrime police which stop crimes before they take place, with the help of three 'PreCogs' who can foresee crimes. Events ensue when John finds himself framed for a future murder.

Ghostbusters.name: Ghostbusters
Ghostbusters.plot: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

The Spirit.name: The Spirit
The Spirit.plot: A pencil test for a proposed animated film based on the character "The Spirit" created by Will Eisner.

The Hours.name: The Hours
The Hours.plot: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

The Puffy Chair.name: The Puffy Chair
The Puffy Chair.plot: Josh Sagers drives cross-country on a mission to deliver his father's birthday gift - a giant purple LazyBoy.

Clerks.name: Clerks
Clerks.plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

Better Luck Tomorrow.name: Better Luck Tomorrow
Better Luck Tomorrow.plot: A group of over-achieving East Asian American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extracurricular criminal activities.

Twin Falls Idaho.name: Twin Falls Idaho
Twin Falls Idaho.plot: Conjoined twins have their relationship tested when a woman takes interest in one of them.

The Station Agent.name: The Station Agent
The Station Agent.plot: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

Half Nelson.name: Half Nelson
Half Nelson.plot: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

Interview with the Assassin.name: Interview with the Assassin
Interview with the Assassin.plot: Almost forty years after the John F. Kennedy assassination, an ex-Marine named Walter Ohlinger has come forward with a startling claim.

Friday the 13th Part 2.name: Friday the 13th Part 2
Friday the 13th Part 2.plot: Five years after the events of the first film, a summer camp next to the infamous Camp Crystal Lake is preparing to open, but the legend of Jason is weighing heavy on the proceedings.

Trucker.name: Trucker
Trucker.plot: A trucker, leading a life free of depth and on the way to nowhere, is forced to make a decision about her aggressive loner 11-year-old son whom she openly deserted ten years previously.

Session 9.name: Session 9
Session 9.plot: Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.

Run Lola Run.name: Run Lola Run
Run Lola Run.plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

The Lives of Others.name: The Lives of Others
The Lives of Others.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Before Sunset.name: Before Sunset
Before Sunset.plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

My Own Private Idaho.name: My Own Private Idaho
My Own Private Idaho.plot: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

The Eclipse.name: The Eclipse
The Eclipse.plot: On 11 August 1999, most of Europe was engrossed in the total solar eclipse, which momentarily enveloped the Earth in darkness. But in Serbia, people were busy barricading themselves in their homes and shelters for fear of the dark. Filmmaker Natasa Urban returns to the eclipse as motif and metaphor in her paradoxically evocative and thoughtful film about her own upbringing during the war in the former Yugoslavia, to which she travels back in THE ECLIPSE to collect stories and anecdotes from her family and acquaintances. A cotton curtain in the wind on a spring day, a lush forest floor. The war is far away - or is it? Shot on analogue 16mm film with an artist's eye for how traces of the past remain deposited in the present - both physically and mentally - Urban creates a rich, existential work of imagery with a quiet, philosophical weight that is rare and precious. As when her father wanders the lush landscapes while you hear him reading from his journals about the wanderings he took while the war was still going on.

Tsotsi.name: Tsotsi
Tsotsi.plot: Six days in the violent life of a young Johannesburg gang leader.

The History Boys.name: The History Boys
The History Boys.plot: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

Thumbsucker.name: Thumbsucker
Thumbsucker.plot: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

You Kill Me.name: You Kill Me
You Kill Me.plot: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hitman befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.

Sexy Beast.name: Sexy Beast
Sexy Beast.plot: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

Redacted.name: Redacted
Redacted.plot: The devastating reconstruction of the rape and murder of a 15-year-old Iraqi girl by American soldiers in Samarra in 2006.

Heavenly Creatures.name: Heavenly Creatures
Heavenly Creatures.plot: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

Shaun of the Dead.name: Shaun of the Dead
Shaun of the Dead.plot: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Spring Breakers.name: Spring Breakers
Spring Breakers.plot: Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying, drinking, and taking drugs, they are arrested, only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

Eve's Bayou.name: Eve's Bayou
Eve's Bayou.plot: What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father, and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies, and mystic forces.

Memento.name: Memento
Memento.plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Winter in Wartime.name: Winter in Wartime
Winter in Wartime.plot: In German-occupied Netherlands, a teenage boy gets involved in the Dutch resistance after coming to the aid of a wounded RAF pilot.

The Business of Strangers.name: The Business of Strangers
The Business of Strangers.plot: Two businesswomen bond and reveal their inner natures while getting carried away on a revenge attack against an accused rapist.

The Return of the Living Dead.name: The Return of the Living Dead
The Return of the Living Dead.plot: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

Layer Cake.name: Layer Cake
Layer Cake.plot: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

Shame.name: Shame
Shame.plot: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

Wah-Wah.name: Wah-Wah
