Wah-Wah.plot: Ralph witnesses the disintegration of his parents' marriage through adultery and alcohol during the last gasp of the British Empire in Swaziland in 1969. Ralph finds his new step-mother is the only one who understands his inner turmoil.

Outside Providence.name: Outside Providence
Outside Providence.plot: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

House of 1000 Corpses.name: House of 1000 Corpses
House of 1000 Corpses.plot: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

Action Jackson.name: Action Jackson
Action Jackson.plot: In order to escape crime and clutches of a ruthless mafia, a Bangkok based hit man seeks the help of his lookalike, a Mumbai based goon.

Very Bad Things.name: Very Bad Things
Very Bad Things.plot: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

Wrong Turn.name: Wrong Turn
Wrong Turn.plot: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.

Friday After Next.name: Friday After Next
Friday After Next.plot: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

September Dawn.name: September Dawn
September Dawn.plot: A love story set during a tense encounter between a wagon train of settlers and a renegade Mormon group.

Frailty.name: Frailty
Frailty.plot: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

The Life Before Her Eyes.name: The Life Before Her Eyes
The Life Before Her Eyes.plot: A woman's survivor's guilt from a Columbine-like event 15 years ago causes her present-day idyllic life to fall apart.

Stoker.name: Stoker
Stoker.plot: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.

The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys.name: The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys
The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys.plot: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

Stir of Echoes.name: Stir of Echoes
Stir of Echoes.plot: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

In the Land of Blood and Honey.name: In the Land of Blood and Honey
In the Land of Blood and Honey.plot: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

Find Me Guilty.name: Find Me Guilty
Find Me Guilty.plot: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

The Butterfly Effect.name: The Butterfly Effect
The Butterfly Effect.plot: In the summer of 2011, 30 Palestinian, Israeli, and Canadian University Students gathered on Canada's West Coast to participate in a Unique dialogue and filmmaking experience. Living and learning together for four weeks, they broke down barriers and created short films about the conflict. This is one of those films. THE BUTTERFLY EFFECT 'A discussion of social problems facing today's global community, with a focus on how these actions create ripple effects around the world.'

Downfall.name: Downfall
Downfall.plot: Thrust back into the life he thought he'd abandoned forever, Lance Summer is torn between his new life and his drug influenced past, the latter which could prove his Downfall.

Vampire in Brooklyn.name: Vampire in Brooklyn
Vampire in Brooklyn.plot: A Caribbean vampire seduces a Brooklyn police officer who has no idea that she is half-vampire.

Urban Legend.name: Urban Legend
Urban Legend.plot: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

The Hurt Locker.name: The Hurt Locker
The Hurt Locker.plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Nowhere to Run.name: Nowhere to Run
Nowhere to Run.plot: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

War, Inc..name: War, Inc.
War, Inc..plot: A corporation hires a professional assassin to pose as its trade show representative who must organize the wedding of a Middle Eastern pop star, which will allow him the opportunity to kill a Middle Eastern politician.

Not Another Teen Movie.name: Not Another Teen Movie
Not Another Teen Movie.plot: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

Slither.name: Slither
Slither.plot: A car thief gets out on parole from a penitentiary and intends to go straight. Nonetheless, he ends up in a wild goose chase for stolen cash, together with a small-time bandleader and his wife, and a friendly free-spirited woman.

The Thirteenth Floor.name: The Thirteenth Floor
The Thirteenth Floor.plot: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.

City of Ghosts.name: City of Ghosts
City of Ghosts.plot: A documentary that follows the efforts of "Raqqa Is Being Slaughtered Silently," a handful of anonymous activists who banded together after their homeland was taken over by ISIS in 2014. With deeply personal access, this is the story of a brave group of citizen journalists as they face the realities of life undercover, on the run, and in exile, risking their lives to stand up against one of the greatest evils in the world today.

The Wraith.name: The Wraith
The Wraith.plot: In a small town in Arizona, a mysterious man/spirit descends from the sky and manifests in a sports car and targets a local violent road-racing gang of motor heads, headed by a ruthless bully who'll do anything to get what he wants.

House on Haunted Hill.name: House on Haunted Hill
House on Haunted Hill.plot: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

The Baader Meinhof Complex.name: The Baader Meinhof Complex
The Baader Meinhof Complex.plot: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings, and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

A Dangerous Method.name: A Dangerous Method
A Dangerous Method.plot: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

Undisputed.name: Undisputed
Undisputed.plot: When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

Kung Fu Hustle.name: Kung Fu Hustle
Kung Fu Hustle.plot: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

Vampires.name: Vampires
Vampires.plot: Belgium's vampire community invites a documentary crew to film one of their families: husband, wife, and two teen children - Georges, Bertha, Sampson, and Grace. The teens have problems: Sampson wants to sleep with the community leader's wife (the only sexual taboo) and Grace wears pink and wants to be human. The family eats (they keep a young woman for snacks, and the police drop off immigrants for them), visits their community school, chats with a coffin maker, goes to parties, and looks down their nose at a childless vampire couple who live in their basement. We learn of the vampire code, forced exile in Canada, and the fate of Sampson and Grace.

Eye for an Eye.name: Eye for an Eye
Eye for an Eye.plot: When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.

The Stepfather.name: The Stepfather
The Stepfather.plot: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

The Sitter.name: The Sitter
The Sitter.plot: A group of young-adult friends decide to take acid together during a global pandemic as an homage to their high school days.

Kiss of the Dragon.name: Kiss of the Dragon
Kiss of the Dragon.plot: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Freddy vs. Jason.name: Freddy vs. Jason
Freddy vs. Jason.plot: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.

The Passion of the Christ.name: The Passion of the Christ
The Passion of the Christ.plot: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

Original Sin.name: Original Sin
Original Sin.plot: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

Lucky Number Slevin.name: Lucky Number Slevin
Lucky Number Slevin.plot: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

Rendition.name: Rendition
Rendition.plot: When a terrorist bombing in North Africa kills 19 incl. an American, an Egyptian chemical engineer flying from South Africa to his wife in USA, is arrested upon arriving USA. He disappears. His wife asks senator for help.

Die Hard.name: Die Hard
Die Hard.plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Virtuosity.name: Virtuosity
Virtuosity.plot: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

The Cabin in the Woods.name: The Cabin in the Woods
The Cabin in the Woods.plot: Five college friends head out to a remote cabin for a getaway, but things don't go as planned when they start getting killed. They soon discover that there is more to the cabin than it seems.

Vacation.name: Vacation
Vacation.plot: Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.

The Watcher.name: The Watcher
The Watcher.plot: David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations using his forensic knowledge to gain entry when she's quite alone, subdues her and administers a long, torturous death. Joel Campbell got so frustrated by his failure to capture Griffin in Los Angeles, that he quit the FBI, moved to Chicago, and remains in psychiatric therapy, unable to function normally. Then he realizes, when opening his mail very late, that a new murder victim is Griffin's, and the killer sent him pictures of her. Campbell reports this to the police, but is unwilling to join them in the search, suggesting Griffin is too slick and clever; yet he won't get out of it that easily.

Untraceable.name: Untraceable
Untraceable.plot: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

Virgin Territory.name: Virgin Territory
Virgin Territory.plot: Young Florentines take refuge from the black plague and engage in bawdy adventures and lusty exchanges.

The Thing.name: The Thing
The Thing.plot: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

The Warlords.name: The Warlords
The Warlords.plot: China, 1860s: Having his army slaughtered, General Qingyun joins 2 bandit leaders in raids on rebels and in blood oath. They form a Qing loyal army with eyes on rebel held Suzhou and Nanjing.

Get Rich or Die Tryin'.name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
Get Rich or Die Tryin'.plot: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

Predators.name: Predators
Predators.plot: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

Apocalypto.name: Apocalypto
Apocalypto.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

Final Destination 5.name: Final Destination 5
Final Destination 5.plot: Death returns to claim the lucky survivors of a deadly bridge collapse in this fifth frightening installment in the series.

8 Mile.name: 8 Mile
8 Mile.plot: Follows a young rapper in the Detroit area, struggling with every aspect of his life; he wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

Lord of War.name: Lord of War
Lord of War.plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

Bangkok Dangerous.name: Bangkok Dangerous
Bangkok Dangerous.plot: The story is of a deaf-mute hitman and his partner who are based in Bangkok. He is friends with his partner's girlfriend who is a stripper at a local club. They go about their assassination business as usual as the boss climbs the underworld ladder and forms new alliances. Flashbacks explain how he got to this point in his life. He forms a relationship with a young woman from the pharmacy who is caring and innocent. The hunts continue as treachery begins. A big name hit makes him realize that good people are hurt by his actions. The first rule of assassination closes in on him as he strikes revenge.

Turbulence.name: Turbulence
Turbulence.plot: After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a flight attendant must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.

Alien 3.name: Alien 3
Alien 3.plot: Returning from LV-426, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on the maximum-security prison Fiorina 161, where she discovers that she has unwittingly brought along an unwelcome visitor.

The Relic.name: The Relic
The Relic.plot: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

Shooter.name: Shooter
Shooter.plot: They watch. They wait. And they work for four seconds. Three rough and ready paparazzi are joined on a stakeout by a young, ambitious intern. Alliances and friendship develop, shift and ultimately dissolve in the harsh glare of the only thing that really matters: getting the shot.

Hudson Hawk.name: Hudson Hawk
Hudson Hawk.plot: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

The Missing.name: The Missing
The Missing.plot: Blending elements of 30's film noir and 50's science fiction, 'The Missing' tells the story of Sam Baxter; a private eye hired to find a dead man. In the midst of the investigation Sam uncovers a startling conspiracy that leads him to believe we may not be alone in the universe.

The Long Kiss Goodnight.name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
The Long Kiss Goodnight.plot: Samantha Caine lives in a small town with her daughter. Eight years ago she emerged, two months pregnant, from a nearby river with no memory of her past or who she is. However, she's getting closer to finding out about her past.

Hart's War.name: Hart's War
Hart's War.plot: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

The Siege.name: The Siege
The Siege.plot: Walker is compromised and sent to a Reassignment Center, where he falls in with Elda and Juliet to survive.

Die Hard 2.name: Die Hard 2
Die Hard 2.plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

Dredd.name: Dredd
Dredd.plot: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

Hollow Man.name: Hollow Man
Hollow Man.plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

Die Hard with a Vengeance.name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
Die Hard with a Vengeance.plot: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

The Expendables 2.name: The Expendables 2
The Expendables 2.plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

Windtalkers.name: Windtalkers
Windtalkers.plot: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

The 13th Warrior.name: The 13th Warrior
The 13th Warrior.plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

The Wolfman.name: The Wolfman
The Wolfman.plot: An eight minute abridgment of the 1941 feature, The Wolf Man, released in the 1960's to the 16mm home movie market.

Your Highness.name: Your Highness
Your Highness.plot: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

The Happening.name: The Happening
The Happening.plot: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

All the Real Girls.name: All the Real Girls
All the Real Girls.plot: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

Friends with Benefits.name: Friends with Benefits
Friends with Benefits.plot: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

To Rome with Love.name: To Rome with Love
To Rome with Love.plot: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

Flatliners.name: Flatliners
Flatliners.plot: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

Two Can Play That Game.name: Two Can Play That Game
Two Can Play That Game.plot: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

Road to Perdition.name: Road to Perdition
Road to Perdition.plot: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Trees Lounge.name: Trees Lounge
Trees Lounge.plot: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".

School Daze.name: School Daze
School Daze.plot: Schoolchildren claim "Nancy" comic books are educational.

Amélie.name: Amélie
Amélie.plot: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

Gothika.name: Gothika
Gothika.plot: A psychiatrist awakens as a patient in a mental institution, with no memory of the murder she's accused of committing. As she tries to regain her memory, a vengeful spirit manipulates her.

RoboCop.name: RoboCop
RoboCop.plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

Saving Private Ryan.name: Saving Private Ryan
Saving Private Ryan.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

The International.name: The International
The International.plot: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

Next Day Air.name: Next Day Air
Next Day Air.plot: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes 10 people's lives forever.

The Perez Family.name: The Perez Family
The Perez Family.plot: In 1980, USA opens to Cuban refugees. Once in Miami, Dorita tries to create a Perez "family" of 3 to get a sponsor. She wants Juan to be her "husband" - plus a "son" or "dad".

Machete Kills.name: Machete Kills
Machete Kills.plot: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

Everything Put Together.name: Everything Put Together
Everything Put Together.plot: The story of a Californian couple expecting a child and their group of friends confronted with the tragedy of a big loss.

My Cousin Vinny.name: My Cousin Vinny
My Cousin Vinny.plot: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

Blood Diamond.name: Blood Diamond
Blood Diamond.plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

Pollock.name: Pollock
Pollock.plot: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

From Paris with Love.name: From Paris with Love
From Paris with Love.plot: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

Immortals.name: Immortals
Immortals.plot: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

A Nightmare on Elm Street.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
A Nightmare on Elm Street.plot: The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

The Big Lebowski.name: The Big Lebowski
The Big Lebowski.plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Stand by Me.name: Stand by Me
Stand by Me.plot: Timon enthusiastically serenades Pumbaa with the title song, completely oblivious to the myriad of painful catastrophes that befall the poor warthog as he does so.

Escape from New York.name: Escape from New York
Escape from New York.plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

Wanderlust.name: Wanderlust
Wanderlust.plot:
This is the story of a child who lives through the adventures of London, Jules Vernes and Kipling. Unfortunately, as the years pass, the child who dreamt of adventures slowly became caught up in adult life.

As he enters his thirties, though Florent had built a career and was at the head of a start-up valued at several million euros, a sudden bankruptcy completely turns his life upside down. He decides to take a break and sets off for a bike tour of Iceland.

After a month of wandering around the icy terrain, he climbs up the Snaefellsjokull volcano, the very volcano made famous by Jules Verne's Journey to the Center of the Earth. It was there, as he followed in the footsteps of Professor Lidenbrock, that he decided that Paris was no longer for him. He wanted to reconnect with his childhood dream, that of becoming an explorer.

This is the beginning of a flamboyant odyssey during which our young adventurer sets out to discover the most unexplored territories the world has to offer. It is thanks to this story, this life of wandering, that he learns to let go of all that he knew before. Florent speaks of a feeling of freedom washing over him when he connects with this wild nature, encouraging him to leave his old life behind.

Built around extraordinary adventures, the film focuses on the spiritual quest of an adult who decides to follow his childhood dreams and takes a look at the realities of our somewhat crazy world which dreams of widespread abundance.

Original title : Wanderlust, Le chemin de l'insouciance.

A Few Good Men.name: A Few Good Men
A Few Good Men.plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

Bad Boys II.name: Bad Boys II
Bad Boys II.plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

The Order.name: The Order
The Order.plot: A young priest is sent to Rome to investigate the troubling death of the head of his order.

Safe Men.name: Safe Men
Safe Men.plot: Two bad singers are mistaken for top safe-crackers at a bar; a gangster boss orders them to break into three safes or else.

Olympus Has Fallen.name: Olympus Has Fallen
Olympus Has Fallen.plot: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

RocknRolla.name: RocknRolla
RocknRolla.plot: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

The American.name: The American
The American.plot: The life story of American Leonard Bernstein who began conducting for the New York Philharmonic at the age of 25.

The Good German.name: The Good German
The Good German.plot: While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation that involves his former mistress and his driver.

Constantine.name: Constantine
Constantine.plot: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

Pretty Woman.name: Pretty Woman
Pretty Woman.plot: Nightclub hostess Mimin is hired to impersonate her lookalike Hsin, an office worker who was murdered.

The Usual Suspects.name: The Usual Suspects
The Usual Suspects.plot: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

Seven Psychopaths.name: Seven Psychopaths
Seven Psychopaths.plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

The Last Stand.name: The Last Stand
The Last Stand.plot: Tip Douglas is sent after cattle rustlers, the same rustlers that murdered his father. Posing as a notorious outlaw, he is able to join the gang. Learning that the gang's boss Thorn Evans killed his father, he and sidekick Pepper set a trap when he learns of their next raid.

Panic Room.name: Panic Room
Panic Room.plot: Leah Altman (Emma Meyer, A Lethal History) has just moved into her new house, and finds herself fleeing for her life, and hiding in the panic room, when three burglars break into her house to steal a fortune left behind, but it's in the panic room she's hiding in.

Law Abiding Citizen.name: Law Abiding Citizen
Law Abiding Citizen.plot: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

The Wrestler.name: The Wrestler
The Wrestler.plot: Frank Bass takes a stand and defends what he thinks is right. Gamblers and money-grubbing conspire to corrupt the industry. Frank's efforts climax as he promotes an over-the-hill champion in the final matches of his career.

Lethal Weapon 3.name: Lethal Weapon 3
Lethal Weapon 3.plot: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

Frida.name: Frida
Frida.plot: The most prominent female painter of Latin America, Frida Kahlo, is agonizing in her Coyoacán home. She evokes memories of her childhood, of the streetcar accident that caused her terrible pain and affliction, her friendship with Trotsky and painter Alfaro Siqueiros, her marriage to Diego Rivera, her miscarriage, her political commitment, her love affairs and the anticipated exhibition of her works.

25th Hour.name: 25th Hour
25th Hour.plot: Taha (played by Amin Tarakh) returns to the country after many years of war and captivity in the war. But he realizes that everything has changed, even his family has changed, he does not know that there is a truth behind these bitter facts.

American History X.name: American History X
American History X.plot: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

Random Hearts.name: Random Hearts
Random Hearts.plot: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

Hot Fuzz.name: Hot Fuzz
Hot Fuzz.plot: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

Tin Cup.name: Tin Cup
Tin Cup.plot: A washed-up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the U.S. Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

Boogie Nights.name: Boogie Nights
Boogie Nights.plot: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

Whipped.name: Whipped
Whipped.plot: Three egotistical swingers, who think they're God's gift to women, end up having their friendships tested when all three of them pick up and start dating the same woman.

The Warrior's Way.name: The Warrior's Way
The Warrior's Way.plot: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

The Number 23.name: The Number 23
The Number 23.plot: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, as more and more similarities between himself and his literary alter ego seem to arise.

Children of Men.name: Children of Men
Children of Men.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

Heist.name: Heist
Heist.plot: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Man on the Moon.name: Man on the Moon
Man on the Moon.plot: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

A Fistful of Dollars.name: A Fistful of Dollars
A Fistful of Dollars.plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Gran Torino.name: Gran Torino
Gran Torino.plot: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.

The Machinist.name: The Machinist
The Machinist.plot: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

I Think I Love My Wife.name: I Think I Love My Wife
I Think I Love My Wife.plot: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.

Due Date.name: Due Date
Due Date.plot: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

Side Effects.name: Side Effects
Side Effects.plot: The Pandemic has been going on for awhile now but it might be coming to an end with the help of 3 homeless men... But against their will

Magic Mike.name: Magic Mike
Magic Mike.plot: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch
Sucker Punch.plot: A young girl institutionalized by her abusive stepfather retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.

Swept Away.name: Swept Away
Swept Away.plot: A trip into the Mediterranean sea becomes a trip into the discovery of how society's frameworks of the rich and poor are delicate and temporary.

The Place Beyond the Pines.name: The Place Beyond the Pines
The Place Beyond the Pines.plot: Two men and their sons must deal with the unforeseen consequences of their actions.

Burn After Reading.name: Burn After Reading
Burn After Reading.plot: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Snatch.name: Snatch
Snatch.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

12 Monkeys.name: 12 Monkeys
12 Monkeys.plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Horrible Bosses.name: Horrible Bosses
Horrible Bosses.plot: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

Monster's Ball.name: Monster's Ball
Monster's Ball.plot: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

Love Actually.name: Love Actually
Love Actually.plot: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Pushing Tin.name: Pushing Tin
Pushing Tin.plot: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.

Caddyshack.name: Caddyshack
Caddyshack.plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

Wild Things.name: Wild Things
Wild Things.plot: Amanda Stuart, a park ranger turned sculptural artist, probes the boundaries of an ancient conflict between rural communities and wild dogs.

The Players Club.name: The Players Club
The Players Club.plot: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

The Watch.name: The Watch
The Watch.plot: Follow the story of 4 different characters, on their post apocalyptic everyday living. Their misjudgment, and decisions can have being yours - Four different scenarios, Four different life, One unique goal. Survive.

Changing Lanes.name: Changing Lanes
Changing Lanes.plot: A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

Dazed and Confused.name: Dazed and Confused
Dazed and Confused.plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

Mallrats.name: Mallrats
Mallrats.plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

The Expendables.name: The Expendables
The Expendables.plot: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

Total Recall.name: Total Recall
Total Recall.plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

True Lies.name: True Lies
True Lies.plot: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

The Juror.name: The Juror
The Juror.plot: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

Donnie Brasco.name: Donnie Brasco
Donnie Brasco.plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

The Untouchables.name: The Untouchables
The Untouchables.plot: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

Smokin' Aces.name: Smokin' Aces
Smokin' Aces.plot: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

Final Destination.name: Final Destination
Final Destination.plot: After getting a premonition about a plane crash on his school trip, Alex, a student saves a few of his classmates. However, their situation gets complicated when death starts chasing them.

Straw Dogs.name: Straw Dogs
Straw Dogs.plot: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

The Departed.name: The Departed
The Departed.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

The Life of David Gale.name: The Life of David Gale
The Life of David Gale.plot: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

Little Miss Sunshine.name: Little Miss Sunshine
Little Miss Sunshine.plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

The Change-Up.name: The Change-Up
The Change-Up.plot: Dave Lockwood and his loving wife Jamie have three kids. Bachelor Mitch Planko is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are hanging out together, lightning strikes and the two buddies switch bodies.

Jerry Maguire.name: Jerry Maguire
Jerry Maguire.plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

Inside Man.name: Inside Man
Inside Man.plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Born on the Fourth of July.name: Born on the Fourth of July
genre: Opposition to United States involvement in the Vietnam War
Born on the Fourth of July.plot: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country for which he fought.

Once Upon a Time in Mexico.name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Once Upon a Time in Mexico.plot: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou.name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou.plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a legendary shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

The Mechanic.name: The Mechanic
The Mechanic.plot: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

The Last House on the Left.name: The Last House on the Left
The Last House on the Left.plot: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.

Alfie.name: Alfie
Alfie.plot: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

Arbitrage.name: Arbitrage
Arbitrage.plot: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

In the Valley of Elah.name: In the Valley of Elah
In the Valley of Elah.plot: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

Vanilla Sky.name: Vanilla Sky
Vanilla Sky.plot: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

The Hunting Party.name: The Hunting Party
The Hunting Party.plot: A ruthless rancher and his gang use extremely long-range rifles to kill the men who kidnapped his infidel wife.

The Way of the Gun.name: The Way of the Gun
The Way of the Gun.plot: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother carrying a baby for a powerful, shady man.

Forgetting Sarah Marshall.name: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
Forgetting Sarah Marshall.plot: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaiian vacation in order to deal with the recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know, Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex - and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

Pain & Gain.name: Pain & Gain
Pain & Gain.plot: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

The Color of Money.name: The Color of Money
The Color of Money.plot: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

That's My Boy.name: That's My Boy
That's My Boy.plot: The greatest player in Ridgefield College history uses his influence and reputation to get his only son, a sickly, uncoordinated nerd, on the college football team with comic results.

Conspiracy Theory.name: Conspiracy Theory
Conspiracy Theory.plot: While filming in southern Nevada, a television crew discovers a terrifying truth lurking beneath the waters of Lake Mead.

I Heart Huckabees.name: I Heart Huckabees
I Heart Huckabees.plot: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

This Is 40.name: This Is 40
This Is 40.plot: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

Argo.name: Argo
Argo.plot: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

We Were Soldiers.name: We Were Soldiers
We Were Soldiers.plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

The Quick and the Dead.name: The Quick and the Dead
The Quick and the Dead.plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

Chain Letter.name: Chain Letter
Chain Letter.plot: A maniac murders teens when they refuse to forward chain mail.

Smilla's Sense of Snow.name: Smilla's Sense of Snow
Smilla's Sense of Snow.plot: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

Stay Alive.name: Stay Alive
Stay Alive.plot: Stay Alive's informal and interactive approach to exploring Suicide Prevention will touch those in deep distress. As its unique perspectives inform those who love and support these individuals. And engage everyone who wants to better understand the human condition.

The Hunted.name: The Hunted
The Hunted.plot: Three hikers hike the Appalachian Trail as they encounter something strange. One of them unknowingly gets infected with an unknown virus that begins to change him. They encounter an eccentric police officer who apparently has something to hide. Along the trail, they find an abandoned campsite that has been completely torn to shreds. Even in the nearby towns, the people seem isolated and terrified. With the illness taking its toll, the towns people start to hunt them down in this chase for survival.

Chasing Amy.name: Chasing Amy
Chasing Amy.plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

Three Kings.name: Three Kings
Three Kings.plot: Three Kings is a modern documentary that focuses on three triathletes from the same small town training for the triathlon World Championships. One of the athletes, Bill Chaffey, was training for his first Olympic distance triathlon when he was involved in a horrendous accident that left him a paraplegic. For four years he trained himself in the disciplines of wheelchair and hand cycle racing to complete his dream of completing a triathlon and representing Australia in a World event while remaining just one of the boys.

Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead.name: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead.plot: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

What Planet Are You From?.name: What Planet Are You From?
What Planet Are You From?.plot: A human-looking alien from a highly advanced but emotionless all-male society is sent to Earth to impregnate a woman and bring the child back to their planet. The alien ends up falling in love there. A suspicious F.A.A. Agent targets him.

Street Kings.name: Street Kings
Street Kings.plot: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the death of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

The Hangover Part II.name: The Hangover Part II
The Hangover Part II.plot: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

The Astronaut's Wife.name: The Astronaut's Wife
The Astronaut's Wife.plot: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

The Thomas Crown Affair.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
The Thomas Crown Affair.plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

Wag the Dog.name: Wag the Dog
Wag the Dog.plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

Evil Dead II.name: Evil Dead II
Evil Dead II.plot: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

Escape from L.A..name: Escape from L.A.
Escape from L.A..plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

When Harry Met Sally....name: When Harry Met Sally...
When Harry Met Sally....plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Deconstructing Harry.name: Deconstructing Harry
Deconstructing Harry.plot: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

Get Him to the Greek.name: Get Him to the Greek
Get Him to the Greek.plot: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

Eyes Wide Shut.name: Eyes Wide Shut
Eyes Wide Shut.plot: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

Johnny Mnemonic.name: Johnny Mnemonic
Johnny Mnemonic.plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

Braveheart.name: Braveheart
Braveheart.plot: Chief Standing Rock's tribe has a treaty protecting their fishing grounds, but a canning corporation is violating the treaty through intimidation and force. The tribe is divided as to how to handle the threat. Standing Rock's son, Braveheart, is sent to college to study law so that he can protect their rights, but others in the tribe, led by the hot-tempered Ki-Yote, want to provoke a more violent confrontation.

Retribution.name: Retribution
Retribution.plot: Idealistic Louisville prosecutor Marissa Danvers makes a personal and heartfelt connection with Callie Hollins, a 15-year old girl who went years of sexual abuse at the hands of Mr. Monty, the owner of a group home for troubled teens. Promising she will deliver justice, Marissa takes Monty to trial, but loses hope in her crusade against a broken corrupt system. Five years later, she puts into motion a brutally violent plan for retribution, assembling Monty's now-grown victims on a mission of vengeance.

Sleepers.name: Sleepers
Sleepers.plot: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

The Shawshank Redemption.name: The Shawshank Redemption
The Shawshank Redemption.plot: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

Waiting to Exhale.name: Waiting to Exhale
Waiting to Exhale.plot: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

Notes on a Scandal.name: Notes on a Scandal
Notes on a Scandal.plot: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

Graduation Day.name: Graduation Day
Graduation Day.plot: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

Ordinary People.name: Ordinary People
Ordinary People.plot: Documentary about an average day during the Blitz.

The Constant Gardener.name: The Constant Gardener
The Constant Gardener.plot: A widower's transcontinental quest to find answers about his wife's death leads him to explosive secrets.

The Fury.name: The Fury
The Fury.plot: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from a shadowy secret government agency.

Shattered.name: Shattered
Shattered.plot: With the help of a sarcastic computer hacker Stevie Morris, two detectives, Veronica Heart and Jane Lyon engage in an impossible task of taking down a Russian crime boss lady who has the police department on her payroll and she has a unique way of taking out those who work against her. Meanwhile, boss of the two detectives, Captain Peter Smith holds a secret that could put both detectives in grave danger.

The Hollow.name: The Hollow
The Hollow.plot: A teenage boy is tourmented by an evil spirit living in the debths of his house.

Under the Volcano.name: Under the Volcano
Under the Volcano.plot: A day in the life of a self-destructive British consul in Mexico on the eve of World War II.

The Negotiator.name: The Negotiator
The Negotiator.plot: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

The Score.name: The Score
The Score.plot: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth with his lover when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist that comes with a large payout.

Terms of Endearment.name: Terms of Endearment
Terms of Endearment.plot: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughter's family problems.

Hannibal Rising.name: Hannibal Rising
Hannibal Rising.plot: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

Women in Love.name: Women in Love
Women in Love.plot: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

My Soul to Take.name: My Soul to Take
My Soul to Take.plot: A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.

Creepshow 2.name: Creepshow 2
Creepshow 2.plot: Three macabre tales from the latest issue of a boy's favorite comic book, dealing with a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and an undying hitchhiker.

Creepshow.name: Creepshow
Creepshow.plot: Five grisly tales from a kid's comic book about a murdered father rising from his grave, a bizarre meteor, a vengeful husband, a mysterious crate's occupant, and a plague of cockroaches.

The Revenant.name: The Revenant
The Revenant.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Wonder Boys.name: Wonder Boys
Wonder Boys.plot: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

The End of the Affair.name: The End of the Affair
The End of the Affair.plot: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

Wanted.name: Wanted
Wanted.plot: Jay, a Korean studying acting down-under, is the identical double of a wanted criminal named Sunny Chow. He becomes mixed up with police and gangsters after playing Sunny on a Australian "reality" TV crime show.

Flags of Our Fathers.name: Flags of Our Fathers
Flags of Our Fathers.plot: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

Revolutionary Road.name: Revolutionary Road
Revolutionary Road.plot: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

Disclosure.name: Disclosure
Disclosure.plot: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

True Believer.name: True Believer
True Believer.plot: A cynical former civil liberties attorney now reduced to "specializing" in defending drug dealers becomes transformed by an eight-year-old murder case.

Night Watch.name: Night Watch
Night Watch.plot: A fantasy-horror set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

The Amityville Horror.name: The Amityville Horror
The Amityville Horror.plot: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

The Dark Half.name: The Dark Half
The Dark Half.plot: A writer's fictional alter ego wants to take over his life...at any price.

Dreamcatcher.name: Dreamcatcher
Dreamcatcher.plot: Takes us into a hidden world of prostitution and sexual trafficking through the eyes of one of its survivors, Brenda Myers-Powell.

Watchers.name: Watchers
Watchers.plot: A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.

Trainspotting.name: Trainspotting
Trainspotting.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

The Exorcist.name: The Exorcist
The Exorcist.plot: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

The Bone Collector.name: The Bone Collector
The Bone Collector.plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

Starship Troopers.name: Starship Troopers
Starship Troopers.plot: Humans, in a fascist militaristic future, wage war with giant alien bugs.

Girl, Interrupted.name: Girl, Interrupted
Girl, Interrupted.plot: A directionless teenager, Susanna, is rushed to Claymoore, a mental institution, after a supposed suicide attempt. There, she befriends a group of troubled women who deeply influence her life.

The Prince of Tides.name: The Prince of Tides
The Prince of Tides.plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

American Psycho.name: American Psycho
American Psycho.plot: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

The Green Mile.name: The Green Mile
The Green Mile.plot: A tale set on death row, where gentle giant John Coffey possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul Edgecombe, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

The World According to Garp.name: The World According to Garp
The World According to Garp.plot: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

Red Dragon.name: Red Dragon
Red Dragon.plot: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

V for Vendetta.name: V for Vendetta
V for Vendetta.plot: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

Patriot Games.name: Patriot Games
Patriot Games.plot: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

Misery.name: Misery
Misery.plot: The story takes place in Ohrid, at the end of XI century. Slavic population gives resistance to Byzantium and the Christian dogma leads to the persecutions and murders. The villages are plagued with outbreak of smallpox, and all the people with the symptoms were thrown into the lime. The film follows the fate of Abraham's family as the story of survival in the Balkan intersections.

The Silence of the Lambs.name: The Silence of the Lambs
The Silence of the Lambs.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Fight Club.name: Fight Club
Fight Club.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Outlander.name: Outlander
Outlander.plot: A British nurse visiting Scotland in 1945 stumbles upon a time portal that transports her to the 18th Century.

Into the Wild.name: Into the Wild
Into the Wild.plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Pocketful of Miracles.name: Pocketful of Miracles
Pocketful of Miracles.plot: New York bootlegger Dave the Dude and his girlfriend Elizabeth "Queenie" Martin try to turn boozy street beggar Apple Annie into a society lady when Annie learns that her daughter Louise is marrying the son of a Spanish count.

WarGames.name: WarGames
WarGames.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

The Tigger Movie.name: The Tigger Movie
The Tigger Movie.plot: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

Tora! Tora! Tora!.name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Tora! Tora! Tora!.plot: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

Never Say Never Again.name: Never Say Never Again
Never Say Never Again.plot: James Bond is called upon to try to recover nuclear bombs stolen by Spectre, but he will have to get rid of a professional assassin, hired especially to eliminate him.

We Are Marshall.name: We Are Marshall
We Are Marshall.plot: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

The Kid.name: The Kid
The Kid.plot: A distraught mother abandons her baby boy. An unsuspecting tramp finds the child and cares for him. A father's love drives him to protect the kid.

Superman II.name: Superman II
Superman II.plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

Mommie Dearest.name: Mommie Dearest
Mommie Dearest.plot: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

The Sixth Sense.name: The Sixth Sense
The Sixth Sense.plot: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

Spaceballs.name: Spaceballs
Spaceballs.plot: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

The Trouble with Harry.name: The Trouble with Harry
The Trouble with Harry.plot: Harry's dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.

John Carter.name: John Carter
John Carter.plot: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

Last Action Hero.name: Last Action Hero
Last Action Hero.plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

Days of Thunder.name: Days of Thunder
Days of Thunder.plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

The Majestic.name: The Majestic
The Majestic.plot: In 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

A Bug's Life.name: A Bug's Life
A Bug's Life.plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

The Sword in the Stone.name: The Sword in the Stone
The Sword in the Stone.plot: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

The Yearling.name: The Yearling
The Yearling.plot: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

1900.plot: The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth-century Italy as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

The Sun Also Rises.name: The Sun Also Rises
The Sun Also Rises.plot: Jiang Wen stars in his third directorial work that boasts a stellar cast including Joan Chen, Anthony Wong and Jaycee Chan. A polyptych of interconnected stories in different time-zones, shifting between a Yunnan village, a campus, and the Gobi Desert.

Antwone Fisher.name: Antwone Fisher
Antwone Fisher.plot: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

Flash Gordon.name: Flash Gordon
Flash Gordon.plot: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.

Eragon.name: Eragon
Eragon.plot: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

Tracker.name: Tracker
Tracker.plot: Part romantic comedy, part gritty crime drama, part ghost story;

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.plot: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

Twilight.name: Twilight
Twilight.plot: The film focuses on the circumstances of a young Lieutenant in the Red Army, Grigori Anokhin, played by Yuri Tarasov, who is stuck in a sanatorium but eager to return to the front in order "to kill the Fascists", as he says. Traumatized by witnessing the massacre of his comrades, he has taken to drink, and he is ready to exact revenge. His attempts to return to the front, however, are frustrated, when he is assigned a different mission. With a team of soldiers unfit for duty at the front, he is ordered to take a group of fifteen German prisoners and their commanding officer to the remote village of Polumgla to construct a radio tower for use as an airplane beacon. With the ability to communicate only in rudimentary phrases and left to their own devices far away from the war, the villagers, soldiers, and the German prisoners slowly begin to coexist peacefully. The film ends with a detachment of NKVD soldiers arriving and declaring that the war is over, and that the radio tower the German prisoners of war have been working on for a year is no longer of any use. All of the German prisoners of war, many of whom have become intimate with the village women, are marched off into the woods and executed.

Beowulf (975).name: Beowulf (975)
Beowulf (975).plot: In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.

Shark Night.name: Shark Night
Shark Night.plot: A weekend at a lake house in the Louisiana Gulf turns into a nightmare for seven vacationers as they are subjected to shark attacks.

Rocky IV.name: Rocky IV
Rocky IV.plot: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

Tron.name: Tron
Tron.plot: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

Silent Running.name: Silent Running
Silent Running.plot: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

Wolf Creek.name: Wolf Creek
Wolf Creek.plot: Three backpackers stranded in the Australian outback are plunged inside a hellish nightmare of insufferable torture by a sadistic psychopathic local.

Six-String Samurai.name: Six-String Samurai
Six-String Samurai.plot: In the post-apocalyptic world of 1990s Nevada, a rock 'n' roll samurai on his way to Lost Vegas takes a young orphan boy under his protection as Death and his metalhead Horsemen chase after them.

Whale Rider.name: Whale Rider
Whale Rider.plot: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

Lucky Break.name: Lucky Break
Lucky Break.plot: Under the leadership of a small-time bank robber, British inmates hatch a plan to escape by staging a musical.

The Devil's Rejects.name: The Devil's Rejects
The Devil's Rejects.plot: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

Prefontaine.name: Prefontaine
Prefontaine.plot: Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young.

Shutter.name: Shutter
Shutter.plot: Tells the interior saga of a beautiful but disturbed young woman whose obsession with photography becomes more of an expression than observation.

Bring It On.name: Bring It On
Bring It On.plot: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

In the Cut.name: In the Cut
In the Cut.plot: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

Time Bandits.name: Time Bandits
Time Bandits.plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

Amen..name: Amen.
Amen..plot: During WWII SS officer Kurt Gerstein tries to inform Pope Pius XII about Jews being sent to extermination camps. Young Jesuit priest Riccardo Fontana helps him in the difficult mission to inform the world.

When a Stranger Calls.name: When a Stranger Calls
When a Stranger Calls.plot: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

Home Alone.name: Home Alone
Home Alone.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas Eve.

Zulu.name: Zulu
Zulu.plot: Policemen Ali Sokhela and Brian Epkeen investigate the brutal murder of a young white woman, apparently provoked by the availability of a new illegal drug and somehow connected to the disappearance of black street children.

The White Countess.name: The White Countess
The White Countess.plot: In 1930s Shanghai, a blind American diplomat develops a curious relationship with a young Russian refugee who works odd--and sometimes illicit--jobs to support members of her dead husband's aristocratic family.

The Family Stone.name: The Family Stone
The Family Stone.plot: An uptight, liberal businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

Vampires Suck.name: Vampires Suck
Vampires Suck.plot: In this spoof of vampire-themed movies, teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. She and her friends wrestle with endless dramas that crescendo at the prom.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III.plot: When journalist April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the Turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

Cloverfield.name: Cloverfield
Cloverfield.plot: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

Kundun.name: Kundun
Kundun.plot: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

Like Mike.name: Like Mike
Like Mike.plot: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "MJ" inside them.

Remember the Titans.name: Remember the Titans
Remember the Titans.plot: In 1971 Virginia high school football was everything to the people of Alexandria. But when the school board was forced to integrate an all-black school with an all-white one, the very foundation of football's tradition was put to the test.

In Time.name: In Time
In Time.plot: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Will Salas is accused of murder and on the run with a hostage.

The Blind Side.name: The Blind Side
The Blind Side.plot: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

The Rite.name: The Rite
The Rite.plot: American seminary student Michael Kovak travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

Red Cliff.name: Red Cliff
Red Cliff.plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

Just Visiting.name: Just Visiting
Just Visiting.plot: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

The Interview.name: The Interview
The Interview.plot: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.

Into the Blue.name: Into the Blue
Into the Blue.plot: Four divers cross paths with drug smugglers in the Bahamas.

Christmas with the Kranks.name: Christmas with the Kranks
Christmas with the Kranks.plot: With their daughter, Blair, away in Peru, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

Flyboys.name: Flyboys
Flyboys.plot: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

Jingle All the Way.name: Jingle All the Way
Jingle All the Way.plot: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

What Dreams May Come.name: What Dreams May Come
What Dreams May Come.plot: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

The Day the Earth Stood Still.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
The Day the Earth Stood Still.plot: An alien lands in Washington, D.C. and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

Unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
Unstoppable.plot: Unstoppable: Icons of the 20th Century features intimate and revealing interviews with five famous women whose extraordinary accomplishments were threatened by the discovery of their sexuality: Tennis pioneer Billie Jean King, tennis superstar Martina Navratilova, Vietnam veteran Col. Margarethe Cammermeyer, former California State Senator and child actor Sheila Kuehl, and 'Married ... With Children' actress Amanda Bearse. Their stories are woven together to provide an insightful look at their lives and how they impacted our world at a pivotal time in history.

The Wolverine.name: The Wolverine
The Wolverine.plot: A rancher stands up for an employee unjustly accused of cattle rustling.

The Day After Tomorrow.name: The Day After Tomorrow
The Day After Tomorrow.plot: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

2 Fast 2 Furious.name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
