2 Fast 2 Furious.plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

Red Eye.name: Red Eye
Red Eye.plot: Four friends set out to document a local legend in West Virginia. Will their passion cross the line? Or will it bleed through?

The Shaggy Dog.name: The Shaggy Dog
The Shaggy Dog.plot: A man tries to live a normal life despite the fact that he sometimes turns into a sheepdog.

Waking Life.name: Waking Life
Waking Life.plot: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

The Man in the Iron Mask.name: The Man in the Iron Mask
The Man in the Iron Mask.plot: Despotic King Louis XIV discovers he has a twin brother who has grown up under the tutelage of his foster father, the patriotic musketeer D'Artagnan.

The Santa Clause 2.name: The Santa Clause 2
The Santa Clause 2.plot: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

The Fast and the Furious.name: The Fast and the Furious
The Fast and the Furious.plot: A trucker framed for murder breaks out of jail, takes a young woman hostage, and enters her sports car in cross-border road race hoping to get to Mexico before the police catch him.

Top Gun.name: Top Gun
Top Gun.plot: A gunslinger returns to his hometown to warn of an impending outlaw gang attack, but he's met with hatred and fear for his previous killings.

You've Got Mail.name: You've Got Mail
You've Got Mail.plot: Book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet, both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

Full Metal Jacket.name: Full Metal Jacket
Full Metal Jacket.plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Cutthroat Island.name: Cutthroat Island
Cutthroat Island.plot: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

Rudy.name: Rudy
Rudy.plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

Romeo + Juliet.name: Romeo + Juliet
Romeo + Juliet.plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

The Bounty.name: The Bounty
The Bounty.plot: A tour around Sydney Harbour aboard the replica of the ship used in the 1985 Mel Gibson film. The first Kinopanorama 3-strip film ever shot in Australia.

Peggy Sue Got Married.name: Peggy Sue Got Married
Peggy Sue Got Married.plot: Peggy Sue, on the verge of a divorce, faints at her 25th high school reunion, and wakes up to find herself back in 1960, leading her to try to spot and correct the mistakes that led to disappointments and an unhappy marriage.

National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation.name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation.plot: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

The Dirty Dozen.name: The Dirty Dozen
The Dirty Dozen.plot: They spend every waking moment training, playing, competing in the dirt. Take a look into the high octane lives of twelve professional off-road motorcycle riders in the most grueling, gnarly and incredible tracks and trails on the planet.

The Truman Show.name: The Truman Show
The Truman Show.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

Juno.name: Juno
Juno.plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes a selfless decision regarding the unborn child.

Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow.name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow.plot: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

Aladdin.name: Aladdin
Aladdin.plot: What would you do if you were granted your greatest wish? How would that change you? Aladdin had the perfect life, loving parents, and his whole life ahead of him. But that all changed when he found himself living on the streets finding ways to survive each day. Even with the cards stacked against him, he stayed true to the Christian values instilled by his loving mother. Little did he know how a random act of kindness would change the course of his life forever. In one unexpected moment, Aladdin found himself face to face with the woman of his dreams. Too bad she was completely out of his league. Comedy and musical numbers ensue as their paths continue to cross. It is said that there is NO GREATER gift than love, but can their love survive the test? Be careful. Things are not always the way they seem. Story by: Vitaliy Versace Screenplay by: Christina Sussmann.

Treasure Planet.name: Treasure Planet
Treasure Planet.plot: Jim Hawkins is a teenager who finds the map of a great treasure hidden by a space pirate. Together with some friends, he sets off in a large spaceship, shaped like a caravel, on his quest.

Hotel Rwanda.name: Hotel Rwanda
Hotel Rwanda.plot: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

The Family Man.name: The Family Man
The Family Man.plot: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.

Galaxy Quest.name: Galaxy Quest
Galaxy Quest.plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

Space Cowboys.name: Space Cowboys
Space Cowboys.plot: When retired engineer Frank Corvin is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

Man of Steel.name: Man of Steel
Man of Steel.plot: An odd morality tale of a film that falls into three distinct parts. It opens in a steel town where a group of workers oppose the forces of capitalism, then switches to a wilderness adventure and culminates with the story of a number of teens who experiment with booze and drugs but are made to see the error of their ways when they find religion. A Christian movie that does not seem to have reached a wide audience, as it is not listed in The Great Canadian Guide To Movies and TV, which can be found on line.

The New World.name: The New World
The New World.plot: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

Batman Begins.name: Batman Begins
Batman Begins.plot: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

A.I. Artificial Intelligence.name: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
A.I. Artificial Intelligence.plot: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

She's the Man.name: She's the Man
She's the Man.plot: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

Disaster Movie.name: Disaster Movie
Disaster Movie.plot: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

Lady in the Water.name: Lady in the Water
Lady in the Water.plot: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Terminator Salvation.name: Terminator Salvation
Terminator Salvation.plot: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

Star Trek Into Darkness.name: Star Trek Into Darkness
Star Trek Into Darkness.plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

Bedazzled.name: Bedazzled
Bedazzled.plot: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

Big Fish.name: Big Fish
Big Fish.plot: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

Without Limits.name: Without Limits
Without Limits.plot: The life of renowned runner Steve Prefontaine and his relationship with legendary coach Bill Bowerman.

The Monuments Men.name: The Monuments Men
The Monuments Men.plot: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from German thieves and return them to their owners.

Field of Dreams.name: Field of Dreams
Field of Dreams.plot: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

Batman & Robin.name: Batman & Robin
Batman & Robin.plot: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

Hoodwinked!.name: Hoodwinked!
Hoodwinked!.plot: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

Gattaca.name: Gattaca
Gattaca.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

Edward Scissorhands.name: Edward Scissorhands
Edward Scissorhands.plot: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

Thelma & Louise.name: Thelma & Louise
Thelma & Louise.plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two women escape for the crimes they committed.

Noel.name: Noel
Noel.plot: Five New Yorkers come together on Christmas Eve, seeking a miracle.

Wilde.name: Wilde
Wilde.plot: The turmoil in poet/playwright Oscar Wilde's life after he discovers his homosexuality.

Wayne's World.name: Wayne's World
Wayne's World.plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

Somewhere in Time.name: Somewhere in Time
Somewhere in Time.plot: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

The Rookie.name: The Rookie
The Rookie.plot: A veteran detective is assigned a rookie partner after his previous partner is killed by a car theft gang. He is determined to apprehend those responsible for his friend's death but his new partner isn't really up to the task.

Stranger than Fiction.name: Stranger than Fiction
Stranger than Fiction.plot: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds his mundane Chicago life to be the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire existence, from his work to his love life to his death.

Beastly.name: Beastly
Beastly.plot: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

Despicable Me.name: Despicable Me
Despicable Me.plot: Gru, a criminal mastermind, adopts three orphans as pawns to carry out the biggest heist in history. His life takes an unexpected turn when the little girls see the evildoer as their potential father.

Unaccompanied Minors.name: Unaccompanied Minors
Unaccompanied Minors.plot: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.

Mars Attacks!.name: Mars Attacks!
Mars Attacks!.plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

Space Jam.name: Space Jam
Space Jam.plot: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

Mr. & Mrs. Smith.name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Mr. & Mrs. Smith.plot: A couple who have been married for three years are shocked to learn that their marriage is not legally valid.

Serenity.name: Serenity
Serenity.plot: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

17 Again.name: 17 Again
17 Again.plot: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

13 Going on 30.name: 13 Going on 30
13 Going on 30.plot: Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.

A Mighty Wind.name: A Mighty Wind
A Mighty Wind.plot: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

White Chicks.name: White Chicks
White Chicks.plot: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson sisters from a kidnapping plot.

Batman Forever.name: Batman Forever
Batman Forever.plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

How to Train Your Dragon.name: How to Train Your Dragon
How to Train Your Dragon.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

Spider-Man.name: Spider-Man
Spider-Man.plot: When a new villain threatens New York City, Peter Parker and Spider-Man's worlds collide. To save the city and those he loves, he must rise up and be greater.

Hugo.name: Hugo
Hugo.plot: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

Tooth Fairy.name: Tooth Fairy
Tooth Fairy.plot: A little boy gets more than he bargained for when he tries to wait up and catch the Tooth Fairy in the act.

Scott Pilgrim vs. the World.name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
Scott Pilgrim vs. the World.plot: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

The Prestige.name: The Prestige
The Prestige.plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Taken.name: Taken
Taken.plot: Six friends come together to play "The Game" as a celebration of Nick's birthday. After a few rounds of they get separated while following a black van. Three stop in an alley so that Nick can relieve. His friends are forced into the lost black van by two druges. The other car of friends are informed by the kidnappers that if they want to see them again they have to do exactly what they say. It is revealed that the kidnappers are a modern day Jack the Ripper duo, stalking the streets, picking up prostitutes whom they murder and mutilate. These killer/kidnappers alarmed for being followed, frame these guys. It is the mission of the remaining friends to dispose of the body to retrieve their friends. The characters realize as the night goes on that they are trapped in a nightmare from which there is no escape? The cryptically calculated ending will finish off the audience's mental roller-coaster ride bringing the movie full circle.

Thunderball.name: Thunderball
Thunderball.plot: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

To Have and Have Not.name: To Have and Have Not
To Have and Have Not.plot: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

The Pursuit of Happyness.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
The Pursuit of Happyness.plot: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

The Curious Case of Benjamin Button.name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
The Curious Case of Benjamin Button.plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

The Right Stuff.name: The Right Stuff
The Right Stuff.plot: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

Hell's Angels.name: Hell's Angels
Hell's Angels.plot: Brothers Monte and Ray leave Oxford to join the Royal Flying Corps. Ray loves Helen; Helen enjoys an affair with Monte; before they leave on their mission over Germany they find her in still another man's arms.

The Perfect Game.name: The Perfect Game
The Perfect Game.plot: Based on a true story, a group of boys from Monterrey, Mexico who became the first non-U.S. team to win the Little League World Series.

I Am Legend.name: I Am Legend
I Am Legend.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

Playing for Keeps.name: Playing for Keeps
Playing for Keeps.plot: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.

The Lake House.name: The Lake House
The Lake House.plot: A lonely doctor who once occupied an unusual lakeside house begins to exchange love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

Jaws 2.name: Jaws 2
Jaws 2.plot: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

The Pelican Brief.name: The Pelican Brief
The Pelican Brief.plot: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

Under the Tuscan Sun.name: Under the Tuscan Sun
Under the Tuscan Sun.plot: Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old San Francisco writer, gets a divorce that leaves her with terminal writer's block and depression. Later, she decides to buy a house in Tuscany in order to change her life.

The Client.name: The Client
The Client.plot: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

Jurassic Park.name: Jurassic Park
Jurassic Park.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Cars.name: Cars
Cars.plot: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

2010.plot: A joint USA-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H.A.L. 9000 computer.

Pride & Prejudice.name: Pride & Prejudice
Pride & Prejudice.plot: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Catch Me If You Can.name: Catch Me If You Can
Catch Me If You Can.plot: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

Old Yeller.name: Old Yeller
Old Yeller.plot: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

Repo Chick.name: Repo Chick
Repo Chick.plot: As a repo chick, wealthy bad-girl Pixxi and her entourage get mixed up in a devious kidnapping plot that threatens to wipe out the city of Los Angeles.

A View to a Kill.name: A View to a Kill
A View to a Kill.plot: The recovery of a microchip from the body of a fellow British secret agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist scheming to cause massive destruction.

Shanghai Knights.name: Shanghai Knights
Shanghai Knights.plot: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

Red 2.name: Red 2
Red 2.plot: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

Yours, Mine & Ours.name: Yours, Mine & Ours
Yours, Mine & Ours.plot: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widowed handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of his 8 and her 10 children.

Major League II.name: Major League II
Major League II.plot: The Cleveland Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the team's new owner Roger Dorn threaten to tear the team apart.

Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome.name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome.plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post-apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

Die Another Day.name: Die Another Day
Die Another Day.plot: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

For a Few Dollars More.name: For a Few Dollars More
For a Few Dollars More.plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a gang of outlaws led by a psychotic Mexican bandit, who is plotting an audacious bank robbery.

Runaway Bride.name: Runaway Bride
Runaway Bride.plot: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiancés at the altar.

Ghostbusters II.name: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters II.plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

Zoolander 2.name: Zoolander 2
Zoolander 2.plot: Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.

Ocean's Twelve.name: Ocean's Twelve
Ocean's Twelve.plot: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

Grown Ups 2.name: Grown Ups 2
Grown Ups 2.plot: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and four hundred costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

The Dark Knight Rises.name: The Dark Knight Rises
The Dark Knight Rises.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Despicable Me 2.name: Despicable Me 2
Despicable Me 2.plot: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, he has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

TMNT.name: TMNT
TMNT.plot: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the Ninja Turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

The Chronicles of Riddick.name: The Chronicles of Riddick
The Chronicles of Riddick.plot: The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

Happy Feet Two.name: Happy Feet Two
Happy Feet Two.plot: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

How to Train Your Dragon 2.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
How to Train Your Dragon 2.plot: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

The Smurfs 2.name: The Smurfs 2
The Smurfs 2.plot: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been abducted by Gargamel, since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation, creatures called "The Naughties", into real Smurfs.

Taken 2.name: Taken 2
Taken 2.plot: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

The Mummy Returns.name: The Mummy Returns
The Mummy Returns.plot: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

Quantum of Solace.name: Quantum of Solace
Quantum of Solace.plot: James Bond tries to stop an organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

Casino Royale.name: Casino Royale
Casino Royale.plot: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

The Jungle Book 2.name: The Jungle Book 2
The Jungle Book 2.plot: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

Crocodile Dundee.name: Crocodile Dundee
Crocodile Dundee.plot: American reporter Sue Charlton travels to the Australian outback to meet eccentric poacher Mick "Crocodile" Dundee and invites him to New York City, where he comes face-to-face with the complexities of modern life. Can this bushman adapt?

Why Did I Get Married?.name: Why Did I Get Married?
Why Did I Get Married?.plot: The big-screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

The Karate Kid.name: The Karate Kid
The Karate Kid.plot: Recently relocated from NJ to LA, Daniel becomes the target of a gang of Cobra Kai dojo students. When Mr. Miyagi saves him with expert Karate skills, Daniel convinces him to teach him to defend himself, and put his bullies in their place.

RED.name: RED
RED.plot: One pictorial evidence, two lookalike suspects and just 48 hours are all the cops have to solve a murder case.

Monty Python and the Holy Grail.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Monty Python and the Holy Grail.plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

Fast & Furious.name: Fast & Furious
Fast & Furious.plot: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

Yours, Mine and Ours.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
Yours, Mine and Ours.plot: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

Nanny McPhee.name: Nanny McPhee
Nanny McPhee.plot: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

Clash of the Titans.name: Clash of the Titans
Clash of the Titans.plot: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

George of the Jungle.name: George of the Jungle
George of the Jungle.plot: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

Meet the Parents.name: Meet the Parents
Meet the Parents.plot: A man goes to meet his girlfriend's parent's....but that is when trouble starts.

Ocean's Eleven.name: Ocean's Eleven
Ocean's Eleven.plot: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

Arthur and the Invisibles.name: Arthur and the Invisibles
Arthur and the Invisibles.plot: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Pitch Black.name: Pitch Black
Pitch Black.plot: A transport ship crashes and leaves its crew stranded on a desert planet inhabited by bloodthirsty creatures that come out during an eclipse.

Happy Feet.name: Happy Feet
Happy Feet.plot: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

Oz the Great and Powerful.name: Oz the Great and Powerful
Oz the Great and Powerful.plot: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

Mean Girls.name: Mean Girls
Mean Girls.plot: Cady Heron is a hit with the Plastics, an A-list girl clique at her new school. But everything changes when she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

The Mummy.name: The Mummy
The Mummy.plot: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia and terrors that defy human comprehension.

Real Women Have Curves.name: Real Women Have Curves
Real Women Have Curves.plot: In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory.

A Better Life.name: A Better Life
A Better Life.plot: A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.

Inside Llewyn Davis.name: Inside Llewyn Davis
Inside Llewyn Davis.plot: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

My Fellow Americans.name: My Fellow Americans
My Fellow Americans.plot: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!.name: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!
Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!.plot: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

The Newton Boys.name: The Newton Boys
The Newton Boys.plot: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

Monster-in-Law.name: Monster-in-Law
Monster-in-Law.plot: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

Mad City.name: Mad City
Mad City.plot: A distraught man inadvertently takes a group of children hostage in a museum while a hungry, seasoned reporter tries to resurrect his career covering the story.

Nine.name: Nine
Nine.plot: 9 friends take a camping trip into the woods, only to find they are not alone.

Small Time Crooks.name: Small Time Crooks
Small Time Crooks.plot: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.

Cast Away.name: Cast Away
Cast Away.plot: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Saving Mr. Banks.name: Saving Mr. Banks
Saving Mr. Banks.plot: Author P.L. Travers reflects on her childhood after reluctantly meeting with Walt Disney, who seeks to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the big screen.

The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie.name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie.plot: SpongeBob takes leave from Bikini Bottom in order to track down, with Patrick, King Neptune's stolen crown.

The Next Three Days.name: The Next Three Days
The Next Three Days.plot: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

The Ring Two.name: The Ring Two
The Ring Two.plot: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

Seven Pounds.name: Seven Pounds
Seven Pounds.plot: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

Coyote Ugly.name: Coyote Ugly
Coyote Ugly.plot: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Inception.name: Inception
Inception.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Radio Days.name: Radio Days
Radio Days.plot: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

Waterworld.name: Waterworld
Waterworld.plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

Wild Hogs.name: Wild Hogs
Wild Hogs.plot: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.

The Curse of the Jade Scorpion.name: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion.plot: An insurance investigator and an efficiency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

War of the Worlds.name: War of the Worlds
War of the Worlds.plot: Martian's have landed on earth and the earth is in a panic millions of cities and citizens are annihilated so we fight back.

The Vow.name: The Vow
The Vow.plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

The Village.name: The Village
The Village.plot: Can you keep a secret? I haven't heard anyone for a long time until they arrived. They came for help and they broke the rules. I tried to warn them but it was too late. Little did they know. The party is over. Who will survive?

City of Ember.name: City of Ember
City of Ember.plot: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

Posse.name: Posse
Posse.plot: An unscrupulous politico marshal and his deputies chase a gang of train robbers whose leader proves that every man has his price.

Tower Heist.name: Tower Heist
Tower Heist.plot: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

Keeping the Faith.name: Keeping the Faith
Keeping the Faith.plot: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

Torn Curtain.name: Torn Curtain
Torn Curtain.plot: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

Happy Gilmore.name: Happy Gilmore
Happy Gilmore.plot: After his grandmothers house is repossessed by the IRS, bad tempered hockey player takes his talents to golf to earn the big bucks and get his grandmothers house back.

Speed Racer.name: Speed Racer
Speed Racer.plot: Young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

Whatever Works.name: Whatever Works
Whatever Works.plot: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcé from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

New York Stories.name: New York Stories
New York Stories.plot: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12-year-old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

What Women Want.name: What Women Want
What Women Want.plot: A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

Corpse Bride.name: Corpse Bride
Corpse Bride.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

Dark Shadows.name: Dark Shadows
Dark Shadows.plot: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

Alice in Wonderland.name: Alice in Wonderland
Alice in Wonderland.plot: This newest version of the classic Alice in Wonderland features a modern Alice, discovering Wonderland in an animated environment. Directed with art and style, our story follows Lewis Carroll's original - with a lot of humor and irreverence. Check out Alice in this funny and surprising adaptation.

This Means War.name: This Means War
This Means War.plot: C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle on each other when they discover they are dating the same woman.

The Hudsucker Proxy.name: The Hudsucker Proxy
The Hudsucker Proxy.plot: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

The Fog.name: The Fog
The Fog.plot: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

Mirror Mirror.name: Mirror Mirror
Mirror Mirror.plot: Set against the vast New Mexico Wilderness, Mirror-Mirror is a mystical story revealing a young businesswoman's awakening as she liberates herself from her fears.

The Horse Whisperer.name: The Horse Whisperer
The Horse Whisperer.plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

The Age of Innocence.name: The Age of Innocence
The Age of Innocence.plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

The Tempest.name: The Tempest
The Tempest.plot: Prospero, Duke of Milan, usurped and exiled by his own brother, holds sway over an enchanted island. He is comforted by his daughter Miranda and served by his spirit Ariel and his deformed slave Caliban. When Prospero raises a storm to wreck this perfidious brother and his confederates on the island, his long contemplated revenge at last seems within reach.

The Andromeda Strain.name: The Andromeda Strain
The Andromeda Strain.plot: Top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what killed the citizens of a small town and how the deadly contagion can be stopped.

White Oleander.name: White Oleander
White Oleander.plot: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

Coraline.name: Coraline
Coraline.plot: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, an 11-year-old Coraline discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life. In order to stay in the fantasy, she must make a frighteningly real sacrifice.

Where the Wild Things Are.name: Where the Wild Things Are
Where the Wild Things Are.plot: Yearning for escape and adventure, a young boy runs away from home and sails to an island filled with creatures that take him in as their king.

The Devil Wears Prada.name: The Devil Wears Prada
The Devil Wears Prada.plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

My Sister's Keeper.name: My Sister's Keeper
My Sister's Keeper.plot: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

Water for Elephants.name: Water for Elephants
Water for Elephants.plot: Jacob takes a job as an animal caretaker in a traveling circus. There he meets Marlena, a beautiful circus performer. Their shared compassion for a special elephant Rosie leads to love, but Marlena's cruel husband stands in their way.

Wedding Crashers.name: Wedding Crashers
Wedding Crashers.plot: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Seven Samurai.name: Seven Samurai
Seven Samurai.plot: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

Saving Face.name: Saving Face
Saving Face.plot: A gay Chinese-American and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

House at the End of the Street.name: House at the End of the Street
House at the End of the Street.plot: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

Akeelah and the Bee.name: Akeelah and the Bee
Akeelah and the Bee.plot: Akeelah, a young gifted girl, comes from a dysfunctional family and is on the verge of quitting school. She discovers that she has a high aptitude for spellings and enters a spelling bee contest.

Poltergeist III.name: Poltergeist III
Poltergeist III.plot: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a high-rise building, where the supernatural forces haunting her make their return.

Tremors.name: Tremors
Tremors.plot: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

The Last Dragon.name: The Last Dragon
The Last Dragon.plot: In New York City, a young man searches for a Master to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the Glow.

The Sea Inside.name: The Sea Inside
The Sea Inside.plot: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 28-year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

Good Deeds.name: Good Deeds
Good Deeds.plot: Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.

Malibu's Most Wanted.name: Malibu's Most Wanted
Malibu's Most Wanted.plot: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.

The Skulls.name: The Skulls
The Skulls.plot: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

A Night at the Roxbury.name: A Night at the Roxbury
A Night at the Roxbury.plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

Conan the Destroyer.name: Conan the Destroyer
Conan the Destroyer.plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

I Can Do Bad All by Myself.name: I Can Do Bad All by Myself
I Can Do Bad All by Myself.plot: When Madea catches sixteen-year-old Jennifer and her two younger brothers looting her home, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

The Brothers Bloom.name: The Brothers Bloom
The Brothers Bloom.plot: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Connie and Carla.name: Connie and Carla
Connie and Carla.plot: A mob mix-up in Chicago sends two chanteuses screaming for L.A., where they score a perfect gig: posing as drag queens on the dinner theater/cabaret circuit. Things get extra-weird when a guy falls for one of the girls.

Quigley Down Under.name: Quigley Down Under
Quigley Down Under.plot: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

Lakeview Terrace.name: Lakeview Terrace
Lakeview Terrace.plot: A troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.

Beyond the Sea.name: Beyond the Sea
Beyond the Sea.plot: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin and specifically his relationship with wife Sandra Dee.

Love Ranch.name: Love Ranch
Love Ranch.plot: A drama revolving around a married couple who opened the first legal brothel in Nevada.

The Box.name: The Box
The Box.plot: With the press of a button, a wooden box bestows riches and death.

The Losers.name: The Losers
The Losers.plot: A CIA special forces team is betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

The NeverEnding Story.name: The NeverEnding Story
The NeverEnding Story.plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

The Wedding Planner.name: The Wedding Planner
The Wedding Planner.plot: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

Wicker Park.name: Wicker Park
Wicker Park.plot: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

Snow Dogs.name: Snow Dogs
Snow Dogs.plot: Sled dogs and St. Bernards in training in snowy New Hamshire and Idaho.

Warriors of Virtue.name: Warriors of Virtue
Warriors of Virtue.plot: A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.

Sweet Home Alabama.name: Sweet Home Alabama
Sweet Home Alabama.plot: A young woman who has reinvented herself as a New York City socialite must return home to Alabama to obtain a divorce from her husband after seven years of separation.

New York Minute.name: New York Minute
New York Minute.plot: Two sisters who just can't get along have to travel to New York City together and find themselves on numerous misadventures in order to accomplish their goals.

Colombiana.name: Colombiana
Colombiana.plot: A young girl in Bogotá witnesses her parents' murder and grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

Mickey Blue Eyes.name: Mickey Blue Eyes
Mickey Blue Eyes.plot: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a Mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

Unleashed.name: Unleashed
Unleashed.plot: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

Babylon A.D..name: Babylon A.D.
Babylon A.D..plot: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

Anaconda.name: Anaconda
Anaconda.plot: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.plot: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

The Nutty Professor.name: The Nutty Professor
The Nutty Professor.plot: A timid chemistry teacher discovers a magical potion that can transform him into a suave and handsome womanizer.

S.W.A.T..name: S.W.A.T.
S.W.A.T..plot: The story centers on the Chinese Special Police Unit, from their hard training to their first mission.

Fool's Gold.name: Fool's Gold
Fool's Gold.plot: The son of an Army friend is about the join an outlaw gang. Hoppy prevents this and brings the gang to justice.

Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
Unbreakable.plot: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

The Haunting.name: The Haunting
The Haunting.plot: A young family moves into a new house, unaware of the property's dark past. Things unexplained start happening, till they unleash an evil force that determines their ultimate fate.

Flubber.name: Flubber
Flubber.plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Jumper.name: Jumper
Jumper.plot: A young man with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

The Three Musketeers.name: The Three Musketeers
The Three Musketeers.plot: France, 1625, reign of Louis XIII. In a period tyrannized by Cardinal Richelieu, the only ones who have the means to face him and to defeat his guards are the real Musketeers. Athos, Porthos, and Aramis meet the brave and loyal young D'Artagnan. From that moment, with great heroism, generosity and brotherhood, begins a great adventure, full of dangers and surprises and, of course, love.

The Alamo.name: The Alamo
The Alamo.plot: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

The Croods.name: The Croods
The Croods.plot: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

Turbo.name: Turbo
Turbo.plot: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

Hitch.name: Hitch
Hitch.plot: Summer 1962. In the office of a Hollywood film studio. A corpse. A Frenchman being interrogated. The start... or the end of a misunderstanding. The authors Alain Riou and Stéphane Boulan revisit one of the most famous encounters in the cinema history when Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut met. What could the Master of Suspense and the young leader of the Nouvelle Vague possibly discuss?

Twixt.name: Twixt
Twixt.plot: A struggling horror writer visiting a small town on a book tour gets caught up in a murder mystery involving a young girl. That night in a dream, he is approached by a mysterious young ghost named V.

Larry Crowne.name: Larry Crowne
Larry Crowne.plot: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

The Incredible Burt Wonderstone.name: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
The Incredible Burt Wonderstone.plot: A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.

We Bought a Zoo.name: We Bought a Zoo
We Bought a Zoo.plot: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

In Good Company.name: In Good Company
In Good Company.plot: A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.

The Adventures of Pluto Nash.name: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
The Adventures of Pluto Nash.plot: In the future, a man struggles to keep his lunar nightclub out of the hands of the Mafia.

Last Vegas.name: Last Vegas
Last Vegas.plot: Billy, Paddy, Archie and Sam have been best friends since childhood. When Billy proposes to his much-younger girlfriend, they go to Vegas to relive their glory days. However, the decades have changed Sin City and tested their friendship.

Rango.name: Rango
Rango.plot: The frame story is narrated by a white father to his son. He explains that man's closest relative in nature is the orangutan, which translates literally as "man of the forest." He then tells the story of Ali and his son Bin, natives of Sumatra, who hunt in a jungle village. Ali wants to shoot a tiger, but the orangutans Tua and his baby Rango get in the way, and Rango is almost grabbed by the tiger. While Ali prepares a tiger trap, the orangutans enter Ali's hut and feast on the stored goods. Dozens of orangutans join them, ransacking the hut. When Ali and Bin return to discover the havoc, Ali captures Rango and puts him on a chain. Later, Ali saves Tua from a black panther. In the night, a tiger enters the camp, and Rango warns Bin in time for him to shoot and scare the tiger away. At dawn, Tua comes for Rango and eats in the hut, while Bin tends the water buffaloes. After the tiger kills a deer, the orangutans scream warnings to each other and flee. Two male tigers approach and chase Bin, Rango and Tua. The tiger kills Rango, but the water buffalo fights the tiger and kills him.

SpaceCamp.name: SpaceCamp
SpaceCamp.plot: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

Couples Retreat.name: Couples Retreat
Couples Retreat.plot: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

10 Things I Hate About You.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
10 Things I Hate About You.plot: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.

National Treasure.name: National Treasure
National Treasure.plot: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

Mrs. Doubtfire.name: Mrs. Doubtfire
Mrs. Doubtfire.plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Antz.name: Antz
Antz.plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

The Dark Crystal.name: The Dark Crystal
The Dark Crystal.plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

The Wedding Date.name: The Wedding Date
The Wedding Date.plot: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

Year One.name: Year One
Year One.plot: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

Waiting....name: Waiting...
Waiting....plot: Young employees at ShenaniganZ restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

Reign of Fire.name: Reign of Fire
Reign of Fire.plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

Lilo & Stitch.name: Lilo & Stitch
Lilo & Stitch.plot: Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.

The Italian Job.name: The Italian Job
The Italian Job.plot: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

Ferris Bueller's Day Off.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Ferris Bueller's Day Off.plot: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off, to the chagrin of his Dean, who'll do anything to stop him.

Imagine That.name: Imagine That
Imagine That.plot: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

Super 8.name: Super 8
Super 8.plot: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

Night at the Museum.name: Night at the Museum
Night at the Museum.plot: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

Along Came Polly.name: Along Came Polly
Along Came Polly.plot: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

Paycheck.name: Paycheck
Paycheck.plot: What seemed like a breezy idea that would net an engineer millions of dollars ends up leaving him on the run for his life and trying to piece together why he's being chased.

The Other Guys.name: The Other Guys
The Other Guys.plot: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

The Other Side of Heaven.name: The Other Side of Heaven
The Other Side of Heaven.plot: John Groberg, a farm kid from Idaho Falls, crosses an ocean to become a missionary in the remote and exotic Tongan islands during the 1950s.

Step Up.name: Step Up
Step Up.plot: Tyler receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

Fantastic Mr. Fox.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
Fantastic Mr. Fox.plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

What Happens in Vegas.name: What Happens in Vegas
What Happens in Vegas.plot: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

The Good Dinosaur.name: The Good Dinosaur
The Good Dinosaur.plot: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

As Good as It Gets.name: As Good as It Gets
As Good as It Gets.plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

Sweet November.name: Sweet November
Sweet November.plot: A woman lures emotionally crippled men into affairs, then helps them repair their lives.

You, Me and Dupree.name: You, Me and Dupree
You, Me and Dupree.plot: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

Head of State.name: Head of State
Head of State.plot: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

The Adjustment Bureau.name: The Adjustment Bureau
The Adjustment Bureau.plot: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

Movie 43.name: Movie 43
Movie 43.plot: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

Home Fries.name: Home Fries
Home Fries.plot: Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.

Music and Lyrics.name: Music and Lyrics
Music and Lyrics.plot: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

Titan A.E..name: Titan A.E.
Titan A.E..plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Riding in Cars with Boys.name: Riding in Cars with Boys
Riding in Cars with Boys.plot: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

The Bourne Legacy.name: The Bourne Legacy
The Bourne Legacy.plot: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

Ice Age.name: Ice Age
Ice Age.plot: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

Walk the Line.name: Walk the Line
Walk the Line.plot: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

Liar Liar.name: Liar Liar
Liar Liar.plot: A pathological liar-lawyer finds his career turned upside down when he inexplicably cannot physically lie for 24 whole hours.

Serving Sara.name: Serving Sara
Serving Sara.plot: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

Masked and Anonymous.name: Masked and Anonymous
Masked and Anonymous.plot: A singer, whose career has gone on a downward spiral, is forced to make a comeback to the performance stage for a benefit concert.

America's Sweethearts.name: America's Sweethearts
America's Sweethearts.plot: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

The Rocker.name: The Rocker
The Rocker.plot: In the 1980s, a drummer is abandoned by his band just before they become rock superstars. Twenty years later, the drummer sees his second chance at stardom arise when he is asked to perform with his teenage nephew's high school rock band.

Pitch Perfect.name: Pitch Perfect
Pitch Perfect.plot: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Maid in Manhattan.name: Maid in Manhattan
Maid in Manhattan.plot: Frustrated that her acting career is not as challenging as her college years, Brooke Fields (portraying herself) takes a break from Hollywood by staying with distant family friends in New York City. Before her arrival, the Latin maid casually enters Jack the father's bed and sleeps with him while his oblivious wife Jeanette is in the very next room talking to him. The rich family is bankrupt and so Jeanette plans to get her son Rick married to the promising actress Brooke. She sets up a dinner but her porn actress daughter Jill is late after the family's handyman complies to practice a scene with her. When she finally arrives, Brooke already left to talk with Jeanette's niece Mark, whose mother Billie also counts on him marrying Brooke. Jeanette, who gives up on the dinner in frustration, tells the handyman to sleep with her or else get fired, only to end up firing him anyway for bad performance. But at night, it is the older Jack with whom Brooke fantasizes about sleeping. Even more so, the following day it is Jill who takes Brooke to a spa's hot tub and hits on her with success. Rick and Mark show up afterward. Brooke seems to like Rick, so Mark heads back in defeat to his mother Billie. His overbearing mother takes advantage of his feelings of defeat with women to sleep with him herself. After Rick's Latin maid teases his sexual inexperience, Rick reveals his suspicion about her having an affair with his father. Nevertheless, he says he likes her and also respects their privacy, so he wouldn't tell her off to his mother. This makes the Latin maid change her mind about his maturity and she sleeps with him too. Later on, he gets more intimate with Brooke and she decides to sleep with him as well. He then comes clean about the plan to marry her. Brooke immediately dumps him and leaves NYC in her limo. She has the driver stop spontaneously for a hitchhiker, who is amazed when she pulls down his pants and lets him find himself on the receiving end of a celebrity blow-job, before she throws him out unceremoniously.

I Want Someone to Eat Cheese With.name: I Want Someone to Eat Cheese With
I Want Someone to Eat Cheese With.plot: About a man who has trouble with his job, trouble with women, and uses food to deal with it all.

Monsters vs. Aliens.name: Monsters vs. Aliens
Monsters vs. Aliens.plot: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

Spice World.name: Spice World
Spice World.plot: World-famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double-decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Lucky You.name: Lucky You
Lucky You.plot: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

The Bad Seed.name: The Bad Seed
The Bad Seed.plot: Rhoda Penmark seems like your average, sweet eight-year-old girl. After her rival at school dies in mysterious circumstances at the school picnic, her mother starts to suspect that Rhoda was responsible.

The Darkest Hour.name: The Darkest Hour
The Darkest Hour.plot: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

The Island.name: The Island
The Island.plot: THE ISLAND Is a film created primarily to showcase the best of Nigerian culture and to give viewers an in-depth, enjoyable cultural experience whilst celebrating the efforts of the Nigerian military force. THE ISLAND is a fiction which creates a perception of corruption in the nation's security which intent of challenging patriotism amidst corrupt influences

Dead Poets Society.name: Dead Poets Society
Dead Poets Society.plot: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

The Island of Dr. Moreau.name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
The Island of Dr. Moreau.plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs.plot: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

Unknown.name: Unknown
Unknown.plot: A famous book author who is now a professor at a local college gets offered a life-changing opportunity to turn his book based on COVID-19 into a virtual experience that allows people to go back to the year 2020. The author and his cousin, along with four students and three colleagues, all take a virtual trip back to the apex of the pandemic.

The Princess Diaries.name: The Princess Diaries
The Princess Diaries.plot: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

I Am Number Four.name: I Am Number Four
I Am Number Four.plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

One for the Money.name: One for the Money
One for the Money.plot: Jeannie consults the Picture Book of Sexual Love before pleasing her partners.

Don 2.name: Don 2
Don 2.plot: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

Utsav.name: Utsav
Utsav.plot: Based on the circa 2nd century BCE to 2nd Century CE, Sanskrit play "Daridra-Charudatta" by the famous Indian playwright Bhasa, "Utsav" faithfully follows Bhasa's story-line. Vasantasena, a courtesan who dances at the King Palaka's court hides in Charudatta's house while running away from the amorous attentions of the king's brother-in-law. She falls in love with Charudatta, though he is married and penniless. They have an affair. Meanwhile, the rightful heir to the throne - King Palaka's brother - escapes from prison. While he is being pursued by the king's troops, Charudatta helps him. The king's brother-in-law strangles Vasantasena when she refuses to submit to him and leaves her for dead. When Charudatta tries to have her jewels pawned, he is arrested for her murder. What happens to him and the other characters constitutes the final part of the film.

The Breakfast Club.name: The Breakfast Club
The Breakfast Club.plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Incident at Loch Ness.name: Incident at Loch Ness
Incident at Loch Ness.plot: A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.

Remember Me, My Love.name: Remember Me, My Love
Remember Me, My Love.plot: The members of a comfortable Italian family each struggle with their own secret issues and dilemmas.

The Wendell Baker Story.name: The Wendell Baker Story
The Wendell Baker Story.plot: Luke Wilson plays a good-hearted ex-con who gets a job in a retirement hotel. Three elderly residents help him win back his girlfriend as he lends them a hand in fighting hotel corruption.

Gunless.name: Gunless
Gunless.plot: A hardened American gunslinger is repeatedly thwarted in his attempts to mount a showdown in a friendly town in Canada where no one seems to understand or appreciate the brutal code of the American Wild West.

Just Wright.name: Just Wright
Just Wright.plot: A physical therapist falls for the basketball player she is helping recover from a career-threatening injury.

Just Married.name: Just Married
Just Married.plot: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

A Guy Thing.name: A Guy Thing
A Guy Thing.plot: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

BloodRayne.name: BloodRayne
BloodRayne.plot: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

There Be Dragons.name: There Be Dragons
There Be Dragons.plot: Arising out of the horror of the Spanish Civil War, a candidate for canonization is investigated by a journalist who discovers his own estranged father had a deep, dark and devastating connection to the saint's life.

Snowpiercer.name: Snowpiercer
Snowpiercer.plot: In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges.

Multiplicity.name: Multiplicity
Multiplicity.plot: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

Vertical Limit.name: Vertical Limit
Vertical Limit.plot: A climber must rescue his sister on the peak of K2, the second highest mountain in the world .

The Secret Life of Walter Mitty.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
The Secret Life of Walter Mitty.plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.

Asterix at the Olympic Games.name: Asterix at the Olympic Games
Asterix at the Olympic Games.plot: The Roman Brutus plans to marry Irina, the princess of Greece, but the Gaul Lovesix wants to prevent this from happening. To get her attention, his strategy is to win the Olympics, with the help of Asterix and Obelix.

Nanking.name: Nanking
Nanking.plot: Described by Japanese sources of the time as a record of the Chinese city and the history of the "Sino-Japanese Affair" up to the present. A propaganda picture which naturally is very critical of the Chinese government prior to the Japanese Occupation, and which focuses on the Japanese troops stationed there. Of particular note is a memorial to a fallen Japanese soldier. Contemporary sense filmed in December 1937 and January 1938.

The Salon.name: The Salon
The Salon.plot: A beauty-shop owner finds romance as she struggles to save her business.

Wild Target.name: Wild Target
Wild Target.plot: A hit-man tries to retire but a beautiful thief may change his plans.

Welcome to Mooseport.name: Welcome to Mooseport
Welcome to Mooseport.plot: A US president who has retired after two terms in office returns to his hometown of Mooseport, Maine and decides to run for Mayor against another local candidate.

Marvin's Room.name: Marvin's Room
Marvin's Room.plot: After seventeen years, a fiercely independent woman and her rebellious son return home and together they turn the family she left behind upside down.

Crazy, Stupid, Love..name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
Crazy, Stupid, Love..plot: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

Home for the Holidays.name: Home for the Holidays
Home for the Holidays.plot: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

The Ghost Writer.name: The Ghost Writer
The Ghost Writer.plot: A ghost writer, hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

Purple Violets.name: Purple Violets
Purple Violets.plot: Patti Petalson (Blair) struggles with the pressure of becoming the next important American writer.

That Thing You Do!.name: That Thing You Do!
That Thing You Do!.plot: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

Snow White and the Huntsman.name: Snow White and the Huntsman
Snow White and the Huntsman.plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

What's the Worst That Could Happen?.name: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
What's the Worst That Could Happen?.plot: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

The Core.name: The Core
The Core.plot: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

Shallow Hal.name: Shallow Hal
Shallow Hal.plot: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.

The Spanish Prisoner.name: The Spanish Prisoner
The Spanish Prisoner.plot: An employee who develops a lucrative secret process for his corporation is tempted to betray the company when higher ups attempt to take the process from him. Dastardly intrigue ensues.

Johnson Family Vacation.name: Johnson Family Vacation
Johnson Family Vacation.plot: Buckle up for the wildest road trip of the year. A comedy adventure about a misfit family trying to survive outrageous obstacles (including one another) on a cross-country trek to their annual family reunion.

Date Night.name: Date Night
Date Night.plot: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

The Omega Code.name: The Omega Code
The Omega Code.plot: SPOILER: A rabbi in Jerusalem develops software that can unlock prophecies in the Torah. He's murdered and the software stolen. A powerful man uses it to gain world domination.

You Again.name: You Again
You Again.plot: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

The River Why.name: The River Why
The River Why.plot: A young man abandons his family for a solitary life of fly-fishing. His goal was to find his own way in the fishing world and thereby find himself and love.

Inside Out.name: Inside Out
Inside Out.plot: An agoraphobic must give up his sheltered life and venture outside after a series of personal and financial problems.

The Painted Veil.name: The Painted Veil
The Painted Veil.plot: Dr Walter gets married to the beautiful Kitty but soon finds out that she is cheating on him. Battling his way through problems, he heads to China to fight a dreaded disease spread in a small village.

Someone Like You.name: Someone Like You
Someone Like You.plot: After the tragic loss of his best friend, a grieving young architect launches a search for her secret twin sister.

A Walk to Remember.name: A Walk to Remember
A Walk to Remember.plot: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

Saw.name: Saw
Saw.plot: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game.

Gone Baby Gone.name: Gone Baby Gone
