Gone Baby Gone.plot: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

The Deep End of the Ocean.name: The Deep End of the Ocean
The Deep End of the Ocean.plot: A family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son, is kidnapped and then found nine years later living in the same town where his family had just moved.

Sholay.name: Sholay
Sholay.plot: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

The Open Road.name: The Open Road
The Open Road.plot: An action film following two escaped criminals who double-cross a drug lord.

The Swindle.name: The Swindle
The Swindle.plot: Dude and Tom set up a marriage scam to fleece LA beauties. More mullets and silicone than you can imagine. In the end, old mentor Bill fleeces both of them.

The Blue Butterfly.name: The Blue Butterfly
The Blue Butterfly.plot: A dramatic adventure about courage, redemption and love being filmed in the rain forests of Costa Rica, and in Montreal.

The Return.name: The Return
The Return.plot: A young Albanian immigrant and his French fiance decide to pay a surprise visit to his native village. Their surprise turns sour when his family learns the true reasons behind their son's return.

The Bodyguard.name: The Bodyguard
The Bodyguard.plot: A hapless bodyguard is fired from his client's son for the death of his clients father. The son is then hunted by assassins who do not want him to inherit his fathers company.

The Bounty Hunter.name: The Bounty Hunter
The Bounty Hunter.plot: An ex-cop turned bounty hunter shows up in a small town looking for a man who's jumped bail. However, the real reason he's there is to avenge his old friend, an Indian who lived in the area and was murdered by the local sheriff, who is trying to get the Indians to sell their land cheaply so an oil company can move in and take over the land, which they believe sits on top of large reserves of oil.

The Beastmaster.name: The Beastmaster
The Beastmaster.plot: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

Cheats.name: Cheats
Cheats.plot: A group of friends cheat their way through high school.

Johns.name: Johns
Johns.plot: It's the day before Christmas, the day before John's 21st birthday. He's a prostitute on Santa Monica Blvd in L.A., and he wants to spend that night and the next day at the posh Park Plaza Hotel. He's ripped off a local drug dealer to pay the bill, but as he's sleeping that morning, someone steals his shoes right off his feet, with the money in them. Meanwhile, Donner, a lad new to the streets, wants John to leave the city with him for Camelot, a theme park in Branson, MO, where they'll work as lifeguards. John spends the day trying to hustle the money for the hotel, avoid Jimmy the Warlock, keep his girl friend placated, and figure out how to deal with Donner's friendship.

The Muse.name: The Muse
The Muse.plot: A one-hit-wonder musician battles writers block and a strange inspirational force at a secluded lake house.

Yellow Submarine.name: Yellow Submarine
Yellow Submarine.plot: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

The Girl on the Train.name: The Girl on the Train
The Girl on the Train.plot: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

Alien.name: Alien
Alien.plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin.

David and Goliath.name: David and Goliath
David and Goliath.plot: This epic movie filmed in North Africa and London follows young shepherd David as he takes on the mighty warrior Goliath against all odds.

Witless Protection.name: Witless Protection
Witless Protection.plot: When a small-town sheriff witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping, his effort to save the beautiful damsel in distress sets him down a wild path of comic mishap.

Wet Hot American Summer.name: Wet Hot American Summer
Wet Hot American Summer.plot: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

Royal Kill.name: Royal Kill
Royal Kill.plot: When a female assassin is sent to the US to kill the last living heir to the modern day Himalayan Kingdom, royal solider is also sent to protect her. When he is face to face with the assassin his duty to the Kingdom becomes compromised. As they battle, secrets are uncovered and the line between good and evil is erased. Only one mission can be completed and only one person can survive.

Below Zero.name: Below Zero
Below Zero.plot: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

The Lazarus Effect.name: The Lazarus Effect
The Lazarus Effect.plot: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Click.name: Click
Click.plot: A photographer and his girlfriend enter a nightmarish world after they run over a woman.

Heathers.name: Heathers
Heathers.plot: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count.

The Book of Life.name: The Book of Life
The Book of Life.plot: A war is waged in Heaven by one of the Angels named Lucifer. He decided to rebel against God and separate himself from the rest of the Angels by leaving Heaven and roaming the earth.

The Only Good Indian.name: The Only Good Indian
The Only Good Indian.plot: Set in Kansas during the early 1900s, a teen-aged Native American boy (newcomer Winter Fox Frank) is taken from his family and forced to attend a distant Indian "training" school to assimilate into White society. When he escapes to return to his family, Sam Franklin (Wes Studi), a bounty hunter of Cherokee descent, is hired to find and return him to the institution. Franklin, a former Indian scout for the U.S. Army, has renounced his Native heritage and has adopted the White Man's way of life, believing it's the only way for Indians to survive. Along the way, a tragic incident spurs Franklin's longtime nemesis, the famous "Indian Fighter" Sheriff Henry McCoy (J. Kenneth Campbell), to pursue both Franklin and the boy.

The Violent Kind.name: The Violent Kind
The Violent Kind.plot: One night at a secluded farmhouse deep in the Northern California woods, a small group of hardened young bikers and their girlfriends are tormented when one of the girls becomes savagely possessed and a gang of "Rockabillies" seemingly from the 1950's descends upon them to collect what is growing inside her.

The Ramen Girl.name: The Ramen Girl
The Ramen Girl.plot: An American woman is stranded in Tokyo after breaking up with her boyfriend. Searching for direction in life, she trains to be a râmen chef under a tyrannical Japanese master.

The Mysterians.name: The Mysterians
The Mysterians.plot: Shortly after a giant robot destroys a village, aliens from outer space arrive offering friendship. Will the people of Earth tie these two events together?

Wake of Death.name: Wake of Death
Wake of Death.plot: After his wife is brutally murdered, club enforcer Ben Archer wages war against the Chinese triads.

Kurbaan.name: Kurbaan
Kurbaan.plot: A woman finds that her neighbors are terrorists, and her husband is not who he claims to be.

Wolfhound.name: Wolfhound
Wolfhound.plot: Doomed to die, he managed to survive, and now his mission is to avenge the annihilation of his tribe. He is the great warrior who calls himself Volkodav, and he is the last man from the tribe of Serie Psi (Grey Hounds). After escaping certain death, Volkodav (accompanied by Neletuchaya Mysh) is on a mission to kill Ludoed, who is responsible for what happened to Serie Psi.

The Goodbye Girl.name: The Goodbye Girl
The Goodbye Girl.plot: A six year old girl seems to predict (or cause?) a series of deaths whilst praying. Is it just coincidence - or is something more sinister at work? And as the body count rises how will one of her family react when they hear the little girl forecast their own death?

Stormy Monday.name: Stormy Monday
Stormy Monday.plot: A crooked American businessman tries to push the shady influential owner of a nightclub in Newcastle, England to sell him the club. The club's new employee and the American's ex lover fall in love and inadvertently stir the pot.

Sayonara.name: Sayonara
Sayonara.plot: A US Air Force major in Kobe confronts his own opposition to marriages between American servicemen and Japanese women when he falls for a beautiful performer.

The Wedding Song.name: The Wedding Song
The Wedding Song.plot: The Nazi occupation of Tunisia strains the bonds of friendship between a Muslim woman and a Sephardic Jewish woman who are both preparing for their marriages.

The Reflecting Skin.name: The Reflecting Skin
The Reflecting Skin.plot: In the 1950s, a young boy living with his troublesome family in rural USA fantasizes that a neighboring widow is actually a vampire, responsible for a number of disappearances in the area.

Teddy Scares.name: Teddy Scares
Teddy Scares.plot: Cyrus annoys all his companions with his new friend Toasty the toaster, so they decide to get rid of it.

Visiting Hours.name: Visiting Hours
Visiting Hours.plot: A deranged, misogynistic killer assaults a journalist. When he discovers that she survived the attack, he follows her to the hospital to finish her off.

Nine Months.name: Nine Months
Nine Months.plot: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

Undertow.name: Undertow
Undertow.plot: A young Catholic Girl-in-training meets a strange Boy on the beach in the sand. He likes sharks, she likes saints, but secretly, they both have a fear of flying.

The Pathfinder.name: The Pathfinder
The Pathfinder.plot: Pathfinder, a white man raised by the Mohican Indians, joins forces with the British army to avenge himself on the Mingo warriors and the French, who have brought death and pillage to his people. He takes on a mission to retrieve secret plans from within the French fort at St. Vicente.

The Merry Gentleman.name: The Merry Gentleman
The Merry Gentleman.plot: A woman leaves an abusive husband to start a new life in Chicago, where she befriends a man undergoing an emotional crisis, who she does not know is a professional killer, and a detective, who is investigating the hit man.

Open Grave.name: Open Grave
Open Grave.plot: A man wakes up with no memory in a pit full of dead bodies in the wilderness and must determine if the murderer is one of the strangers who rescued him, or if he himself is the killer.

Shadowboxer.name: Shadowboxer
Shadowboxer.plot: When an assassin is diagnosed with terminal cancer, she decides to carry out one final killing, assisted by her lover and stepson, Mikey.

Paper Moon.name: Paper Moon
Paper Moon.plot: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Heaven Help Us.name: Heaven Help Us
Heaven Help Us.plot: A new transfer student to St. Basil's Boys' Prep School tries to fit in while romantically pursuing a troubled young girl.

The Pool Boys.name: The Pool Boys
The Pool Boys.plot: A pool boy and a gardener turn an empty mansion into a home for women in the world's oldest profession.

Nell.name: Nell
Nell.plot: Nell, a bitter vengeful old woman seeks revenge on her neighbour, Brid Doyle, for stealing her true love, Michael, many years ago. When Michael dies, Nell feels free to launch her attack. Her revenge is sought in the lowest fashion imaginable, using Brid's own son, Sonny. She uses his weakness to her advantage, capitalising on his misfortune, to drive him into dangerous and deadly actions. The cycle of retribution continues...

Without a Clue.name: Without a Clue
Without a Clue.plot: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.

The Great Silence.name: The Great Silence
The Great Silence.plot: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

Viva Zapata!.name: Viva Zapata!
Viva Zapata!.plot: The story of Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, who led a rebellion against the corrupt, oppressive dictatorship of President Porfirio Díaz in the early 20th century.

Wild Bill.name: Wild Bill
Wild Bill.plot: A street-toughened parolee finds his two boys abandoned by their mum and fending for themselves. Time to step up, or not.

Peace, Love & Misunderstanding.name: Peace, Love & Misunderstanding
Peace, Love & Misunderstanding.plot: An uptight New York City lawyer takes her two teenagers to her hippie mother's farmhouse upstate for a family vacation.

Miss Bala.name: Miss Bala
Miss Bala.plot: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength.

Cherrybomb.name: Cherrybomb
Cherrybomb.plot: Three teenagers go on a wild weekend of drink, drugs, shop-lifting and stealing cars that quickly spins beyond their control.

Jude.name: Jude
Jude.plot: In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

One Fall.name: One Fall
One Fall.plot: The story of a man who gains healing powers after he survives a 200-foot fall.

Matching Jack.name: Matching Jack
Matching Jack.plot: A woman struggles with her son's illness and her husband's infidelity, but, after a chance encounter with an Irish sailor and his son, her life is turned upside down in a love story that defies explanation and breaks all the rules.

White Nights.name: White Nights
White Nights.plot: A humble clerk courts a woman who awaits her lover's return night after night.

Erskineville Kings.name: Erskineville Kings
Erskineville Kings.plot: Barky, 25, lost soul, left home two years ago to escape his abusive father leaving behind everything in the world that was important to him; now that his father's dead, he thinks it's safe to come home.

The Governess.name: The Governess
The Governess.plot: In this sensuous romance, Minnie Driver stars as a governess who is hired into a remote Scottish household and strongly affects all those she comes into contact with.

The Return of a Man Called Horse.name: The Return of a Man Called Horse
The Return of a Man Called Horse.plot: The English gentleman known as Horse, returns to the American west to save his adopted Indian tribe from extinction.

Thunderheart.name: Thunderheart
Thunderheart.plot: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

Henry & June.name: Henry & June
Henry & June.plot: Anaïs Nin meets American writer Henry Miller in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening, which includes Henry and his wife June.

The Powerpuff Girls Movie.name: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
The Powerpuff Girls Movie.plot: After destroying the city of Townsville in a game of tag, a trio of super-powered little girls must redeem themselves by stopping a vengeful monkey's plot for world domination.

Welcome to Sarajevo.name: Welcome to Sarajevo
Welcome to Sarajevo.plot: American and British journalists Flynn and Michael Henderson, along with their respective news teams, meet at the beginning of the Bosnian war in Sarajevo. During their reports, the group find an orphanage run by the devoted Mrs. Savic near the frontline. Feeling sympathy, Henderson decides to take one of the children, Emira, illegally back to England.

Waking Madison.name: Waking Madison
Waking Madison.plot: A woman suffering from multiple personality disorder tries to piece back together her life.

Junkhearts.name: Junkhearts
Junkhearts.plot: Ex-soldier Frank is haunted by a violent past. He lives alone, drowning his nightmares with alcohol. Christine, on the surface smart and successful, tackles life as a single working mother by immersing herself in drugs, parties, and sex. Lynette, a young rough-sleeper, watches Christine stumble out of a club while she sits in the cold waiting for loose change to fall into her lap; her luck seems to change when she meets Frank, who--despite his misgivings--offers her a place to stay.

Blood and Bone.name: Blood and Bone
Blood and Bone.plot: In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.

Vamperifica.name: Vamperifica
Vamperifica.plot: A clueless, flamboyant college kid discovers that the soul of a great vampire king resides within him. Now he must choose between his friends and his destiny.

The Substitute.name: The Substitute
The Substitute.plot: Shale's Mercenary team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes a substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

White Lightning.name: White Lightning
White Lightning.plot: The Red Devils, a professional ice hockey team, owned by Jack Monohan (Steve Brodie), is in the midst of a long losing streak, due to bribes being accepted from gamblers by the star player. When the team is joined by cocky Mike Connors (Stanley Clements), a boyhood friend of Jack's, they begin to regain their former winning ways. Mike becomes a star who cannot be stopped, but is disliked by his teammates becuase of his selfish play. Jack tries to keek Mike away from his sister Margaret (Barbara Bestar), who is in love with him, which leads to a bloody fight between the two men. The angry Mike accepts a bribe from gambler Rocky Gilbratar (Lyle Talbot) to throw the big final game. But during the game, an appeal from a young boy who idolizes him, Davey (Duncan Richardson), sets Mike on the right road, and his unselfish play helps win the game.

The Good Mother.name: The Good Mother
The Good Mother.plot: A divorced mother may lose custody of her young daughter to her ex-husband after he learns that the little girl crawled into bed with the mother and her boyfriend.

The Best of Everything.name: The Best of Everything
The Best of Everything.plot: An expose of the lives and loves of Madison Avenue working girls and their higher ups.

The Samaritan.name: The Samaritan
The Samaritan.plot: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.

Hair Show.name: Hair Show
Hair Show.plot: Peaches, a hair stylist from Baltimore, and her estranged sister, Angela, the owner of an upscale salon in Beverly Hills, get reacquainted when Peaches decides to attend a celebration for Angela in LA. The reunion is bittersweet and worsens when Angela finds out that Peaches is on the run from the IRS and has only a few days to pay $50,000 in back taxes. After some hilarious moments and passionate exchanges, the two sisters join forces to fight off a pesky rival salon owner Marcella and save Peaches from her troubles by competing for a lucrative cash prize and bragging rights at the city's annual hair show. BEAUTY SHOP proves that blood and family run thicker than water.

Vampire's Kiss.name: Vampire's Kiss
Vampire's Kiss.plot: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.

Working Girl.name: Working Girl
Working Girl.plot: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

The Way Back Home.name: The Way Back Home
The Way Back Home.plot: Life affirming spiritual drama about love and loss set in the lush surroundings of Central Florida. Spencer Krane has returned to the town where he was raised. It is the news that his grandmother has suffered a debilitating stroke that prompts his visit. What starts as a simple visit home becomes so much more. It becomes a journey of consequence.

The Football Factory.name: The Football Factory
The Football Factory.plot: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

The Purple Rose of Cairo.name: The Purple Rose of Cairo
The Purple Rose of Cairo.plot: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

Cloak & Dagger.name: Cloak & Dagger
Cloak & Dagger.plot: A young boy and his imaginary friend end up on the run while in possession of a top-secret spy gadget.

The Preacher's Wife.name: The Preacher's Wife
The Preacher's Wife.plot: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

The Situation.name: The Situation
The Situation.plot: The story of an American journalist, a CIA operative, and an Iraqi photographer against the backdrop of the bloody war in Iraq.

Tigerland.name: Tigerland
Tigerland.plot: A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.

The Wild Life.name: The Wild Life
The Wild Life.plot: A high-school wrestler parties with his buddy at a swinging-singles apartment complex.

The Six Wives of Henry Lefay.name: The Six Wives of Henry Lefay
The Six Wives of Henry Lefay.plot: An estranged daughter inadvertently reconnects with her carefree dad after his unexpected death brings together his six very different former lovers.

Zoot Suit.name: Zoot Suit
Zoot Suit.plot: When barrio leader Henry Reyna and his friends are unjustly convicted on circumstantial evidence, activist lawyers Alice Bloomfield and George Shearer fight the blatant racially motivated miscarriage of justice to win them their freedom.

Unlawful Entry.name: Unlawful Entry
Unlawful Entry.plot: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends up befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

Goya's Ghosts.name: Goya's Ghosts
Goya's Ghosts.plot: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

Vulgar.name: Vulgar
Vulgar.plot: A man who performs as a children's birthday party clown tries to piece his life back together after being gang-raped.

Childstar.name: Childstar
Childstar.plot: An experimental filmmaker takes a job as a driver for a foul-mouthed child actor and his ambitious stage mother.

The Gospel.name: The Gospel
The Gospel.plot: This is a story about a successful young R&B singer that has an unlikely homecoming when his father, the bishop, becomes ill.

Waiting for Forever.name: Waiting for Forever
Waiting for Forever.plot: A Hollywood-set romantic tale of a guy who is content to live his life without a job yet with the love of his life, a young actress.

AKA.name: AKA
AKA.plot: A steely special ops agent finds his morality put to the test when he infiltrates a crime syndicate and unexpectedly bonds with the boss's young son.

The Flying Scotsman.name: The Flying Scotsman
The Flying Scotsman.plot: A young fireman on the Flying Scotsman train falls in love with the beautiful daughter of the driver who is about to retire. The young fireman has replaced another named Crow who was sacked for drinking on the job and is planning to wreck the express on the driver's last trip.

Vampyres.name: Vampyres
Vampyres.plot: Deep in the rural English countryside, two tempting daughters of Erebus, the woeful wraith-like phantoms Fran and Miriam, prey on the innocent and the foolishly brave to tread alone.

In the Mouth of Madness.name: In the Mouth of Madness
In the Mouth of Madness.plot: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

On a Clear Day.name: On a Clear Day
On a Clear Day.plot: Frank determines to salvage his self-esteem and tackle his demons by attempting the ultimate test of endurance - swimming the English Channel.

My Girl 2.name: My Girl 2
My Girl 2.plot: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.

Chromophobia.name: Chromophobia
Chromophobia.plot: Marcus Aylesbury has his fair share of dilemmas and secrets in his family. His wife can't tell the difference between a shrink and a shop and his eight-year-old son Orlando spray paints his rabbit's name on the walls to get attention.

RocketMan.name: RocketMan
RocketMan.plot: A musical fantasy about the fantastical human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

Who's Harry Crumb?.name: Who's Harry Crumb?
Who's Harry Crumb?.plot: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

Uncommon Valor.name: Uncommon Valor
Uncommon Valor.plot: Raymond Massey narrates this short documentary film produced by the U.S. Treasury Department. Depicted is the battle of Iwo Jima in World War II, with the famous flag-raising atop Mount Suribachi by U.S. Marines and sailors. From the acclaimed photograph of the raising taken by Joe Rosenthal, sculptor Felix W. de Weldon creates a three-dimensional sculpture model, which then serves as the prototype for a larger statue which is installed at Quantico, Virginia, Marine Barracks. But de Weldon had a more ambitious plan, and with donations from citizens and Marines, he creates a 78-foot tall version of the statue and sees it installed at Arlington National Cemetery, where it stands as a memorial to all Marines who have died in the service of their country. In conclusion, actor and Marine Corps officer Tyrone Power makes an appeal for viewers to buy U.S. Savings Bonds.

The Tripper.name: The Tripper
The Tripper.plot: A Ronald Reagan-obsessed serial killer targets a bunch of hippies who are heading to a weekend-long concert.

Wilder Napalm.name: Wilder Napalm
Wilder Napalm.plot: Two brothers with the secret power of starting fires with their minds, reunite after years apart, only to find conflict with their differing lifestyles.

The People I've Slept With.name: The People I've Slept With
The People I've Slept With.plot: A promiscuous woman tries to find out who got her pregnant so she can get married and live a normal life.

Thick as Thieves.name: Thick as Thieves
Thick as Thieves.plot: Kidnapping, shootouts, explosions...girlfriends. It's just another day in this house when Dave (Bob Ferguson) unleashes his crew to take down a man from his past named "Kincaid" (B.R. Smith). But when the job goes south it's up to an outsider named Rob (James Ladd) to save their skins. Brought together at the wrong place at the right time, Rob and Holsten (Brandon Michaels) form a bond thick as thieves. But joining the rest of the crew (Kelli Smith & Terri Frye) may be more than Rob bargained for. Evading romance, bar-fights, jealous boyfriends, and being kidnapped can be dangerous to your health. When Dave's lair is infiltrated, the team has to clean house and track down their friend. In the end, someone has to take the fall. The only question is who?

Will Penny.name: Will Penny
Will Penny.plot: Aging cowboy Will Penny gets a line camp job on a large cattle spread and finds his isolated cabin is already occupied by an abandoned woman traveler and her young son.

Surviving Picasso.name: Surviving Picasso
Surviving Picasso.plot: The passionate Merchant Ivory drama tells the story of Françoise Gilot (Natascha McElhone), the only lover of Pablo Picasso (Sir Anthony Hopkins) who was strong enough to withstand his ferocious cruelty, and move on with her life.

Green Card.name: Green Card
Green Card.plot: A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.

Wishmaster.name: Wishmaster
Wishmaster.plot: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

I'm Here.name: I'm Here
I'm Here.plot: Jenna, a thirteen year-old bullying victim, is brought to the brink after getting beat-up, and decides to end her life, but her Golden Retriever, Maizey, has other plans.

Perfect Sense.name: Perfect Sense
Perfect Sense.plot: At a time in need of humanitarian innovation, one man, Dr. Albert Hofmann, determined to ease the pain of mankind toiled endlessly in search of a cure for migraines. With his only assistant, Maxwell, by his side, the two worked fruitlessly for five years. Finally, April 19, 1943 the day of the 25th experiment, their hard work and perseverance paid off. In his directorial debut, writer/director Chris McInroy weaves together the events of that momentous day. The day a substance was invented that would change the brainwaves of mankind forever. A substance that would not only cure migraines but would open the doors of perception for generations to come.

The Contract.name: The Contract
The Contract.plot: A beautiful young woman is trained by her father in the art of professional assassination. When her father is killed, she is forced to choose between the violent world she knows or the peaceful life she desires.

Twilight of the Ice Nymphs.name: Twilight of the Ice Nymphs
Twilight of the Ice Nymphs.plot: Peter Glahn is released after years of incarceration as a political prisoner and is now returning to his homeland, the mythical Mandragora where the sun never sets. On board the ship home, he meets the mysterious Juliana Kossel who vanishes after stealing his heart. Once he arrives on the island, he goes to the family ostrich farm run by his sister Amelia. He finds Amelia living with a farmhand named Cain Ball who fears that Peter's return will endanger the agreement he made with Amelia that will see him inherit the farm. Amelia has since fallen for the vain Dr. Isaac Solti who controls the island and has a hold on both Zephyr Eccles, the widow of a local fisherman, and Juliana, Peter's dream girl from the ship. Solti's true obsession is a recently discovered statue of Venus that possesses strange powers. All the characters meet at Solti's lab where the sexual tensions erupt.

Wheelmen.name: Wheelmen
Wheelmen.plot: A ragtag group of misfit limo drivers find themselves embroiled in a plot to assassinate the Vice President of the United States.

Wolfen.name: Wolfen
Wolfen.plot: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

Close My Eyes.name: Close My Eyes
Close My Eyes.plot: An estranged brother and sister begin an intense sexual relationship, behind the curtain of their otherwise normal working-class lives.

Brewster's Millions.name: Brewster's Millions
Brewster's Millions.plot: In order to inherit $7,000,000, an ex-soldier must spend $1,000,000 in two months' time.

Scent of a Woman.name: Scent of a Woman
Scent of a Woman.plot: A young private is assigned to accompany a blind captain. It soon becomes clear that they are both complex personalities.

Stand Up Guys.name: Stand Up Guys
Stand Up Guys.plot: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

Serpico.name: Serpico
Serpico.plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

The Recruit.name: The Recruit
The Recruit.plot: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

Wild Child.name: Wild Child
Wild Child.plot: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

Psychic Experiment.name: Psychic Experiment
Psychic Experiment.plot: An idyllic, small, self-sufficient community. On the surface, it seems like the perfect neighborhood. Everything you could possibly need is within walking distance. But the pastoral exterior conceals a dark past and an even darker secret. As a group of individuals (each with their own ties and agendas with the town and each other) converge on the enclave, strange things begin to happen. Very strange things. Strange enough to test (and then break) the very fabric of reality itself.

The Pompatus of Love.name: The Pompatus of Love
The Pompatus of Love.plot: Four guys sit around drinking beer and talking, trying to figure out the meaning of "the pompatus of love" (from the Steve Miller song "Joker") and analyzing their relationships with women.

Near Dark.name: Near Dark
Near Dark.plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

Yuva.name: Yuva
Yuva.plot: Michael, Arjun and Lallan, three men from three different strata of society, cross paths one morning in Calcutta and change one another's lives forever.

The Understudy.name: The Understudy
The Understudy.plot: The story of an underdog - a failed husband, a failing father, a failing actor, and the impossible choice he's going to have to make between stealing the show and stealing another man's wife.

Labor Pains.name: Labor Pains
Labor Pains.plot: A young woman pretends to be pregnant in order to avoid being fired from her job. When that gets her special treatment by everyone involved in her life, she tries to keep up the lie for nine months.

The Stone Angel.name: The Stone Angel
The Stone Angel.plot: A 90-year-old woman, rapidly losing her memory and knowing that sooner or later her life will be over, returns to the Manitoba farmhouse she grew up in to try and make peace with her dysfunctional family.

Twelve.name: Twelve
Twelve.plot: A young boy, with help from his family, lets nothing stand between him and his dream to play in the twelve-year-old world series.

Slacker.name: Slacker
Slacker.plot: A day in the life of Austin, Texas as the camera roams from place to place and provides a brief look at the overeducated, the social misfits, the outcasts and the oddballs.

Yesterday Was a Lie.name: Yesterday Was a Lie
Yesterday Was a Lie.plot: Hoyle, a girl with a sharp mind and a weakness for bourbon, finds herself on the trail of a reclusive genius. But her work takes a series of unforeseen twists as events around her grow increasingly fragmented... disconnected... surreal. With an ethereal lounge singer and her loyal partner as her only allies, Hoyle is plunged into a dark world of intrigue and earth-shattering cosmological secrets. Haunted by an ever-present shadow whom she is destined to face, Hoyle discovers that the most powerful force in the universe -- the power to bend reality, the power to know the truth -- lies within the depths of the human heart.

3.plot: Ram and Janani are high school sweethearts who eventually get married. However, Janani is mystified when Ram commits suicide all of a sudden and she tries to find out the truth behind his death.

Compliance.name: Compliance
Compliance.plot: A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.

Good Kill.name: Good Kill
Good Kill.plot: A family man begins to question the ethics of his job as a drone pilot.

Treachery.name: Treachery
Treachery.plot: An estranged father and son are re-united at a wedding party. However, a thunderstorm traps them in a cabin, forcing the family to reveal deeper secrets.

And Then Came Love.name: And Then Came Love
And Then Came Love.plot: Julie, a successful magazine columnist, opens Pandora's Box and seeks out the anonymous sperm donor who fathered her young son.

Zombie Hunter.name: Zombie Hunter
Zombie Hunter.plot: When a street drug turns junkies into an army of zombies, a man named Hunter finds himself with nothing but a beat-up car and a trunk full of guns and booze, until he stumbles across a small band of survivors.

ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction.name: ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction
ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction.plot: Life is wonderful for the people in the quiet, island town of Port Gamble....until a zombie virus outbreak.

Wristcutters: A Love Story.name: Wristcutters: A Love Story
Wristcutters: A Love Story.plot: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

The Skeleton Twins.name: The Skeleton Twins
The Skeleton Twins.plot: Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

Wind Walkers.name: Wind Walkers
Wind Walkers.plot: With one of their own missing, a group of friends travel to the remote Florida everglades where they discover that an ancient, malevolent curse is tracking them.

Grace Unplugged.name: Grace Unplugged
Grace Unplugged.plot: Grace Trey is a phenomenal singer. But at the tender age of eighteen, after she gets the music break of a lifetime and is thrust into the "real world" - her faith is put to the test.

Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Sto.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Sto.plot: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

We Are Your Friends.name: We Are Your Friends
We Are Your Friends.plot: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior.name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior.plot: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community get rid of a horde of bandits.

Do You Believe?.name: Do You Believe?
Do You Believe?.plot: A group of teenage friends spend the evening telling stories - only to find the stories are all too real.

Unnatural.name: Unnatural
Unnatural.plot: A morally ambiguous corporation experiments with genetic modification resulting in the creation of a man hunting creature. When it escapes, a group of unsuspecting cabin dwellers become its prey in a horrifying game of cat and mouse.

Tusk.name: Tusk
Tusk.plot: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Slow West.name: Slow West
Slow West.plot: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

The Purge.name: The Purge
The Purge.plot: A wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

Waking Ned Devine.name: Waking Ned Devine
Waking Ned Devine.plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

Whiplash.name: Whiplash
Whiplash.plot: A struggling artist becomes a New York City prizefighter in an attempt to win the affection of the ring promoter's night club singing sister.

Trust.name: Trust
Trust.plot: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

Zipper.name: Zipper
Zipper.plot: A successful family man with a blossoming political career loses all sense of morality when he becomes addicted to using an escort agency.

Yoga Hosers.name: Yoga Hosers
Yoga Hosers.plot: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.

The Egyptian.name: The Egyptian
The Egyptian.plot: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a genial physician and is eventually appointed at the Pharaoh's court where he witnesses palace intrigues and learns dangerous royal secrets.

Dallas Buyers Club.name: Dallas Buyers Club
Dallas Buyers Club.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

Bats.name: Bats
Bats.plot: Following a nuclear power plant meltdown, a nearby village known as Nosferatu Village, became radiated, and subsequently abandoned for more than a decade. The year is 1984, and the public are now permitted to return, and a small group come back to their family home to discover a radiated bat living in their attic. The family must survive the night to escape, but the monster has other plans as they soon begin to find themselves infected with a deadly plague that will kill them if the beast doesn't. Waiting for sun to rise, they must figure a way to survive the night, battling against the creature.

Losin' It.name: Losin' It
Losin' It.plot: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

500 Days of Summer.name: 500 Days of Summer
500 Days of Summer.plot: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

The Neon Demon.name: The Neon Demon
The Neon Demon.plot: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

Black November.name: Black November
Black November.plot: Inspired by true events, an oil-rich Nigerian community wages war against an oil corporation to protect their land from being destroyed. Rebels kidnap an American oil executive and demand that his corporation end the destruction.

50/50.plot: Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

The Wailing.name: The Wailing
The Wailing.plot: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

Re-Kill.name: Re-Kill
Re-Kill.plot: It's been 5 years since the Re-Animates outbreak that wiped out 85% of the world's population. Within a few cities, the Re-Animates have been segregated into "zones" and are policed by the R-Division of the QUASI S.W.A.T. Unit.

Kung Pow: Enter the Fist.name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
Kung Pow: Enter the Fist.plot: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parents' death.

The Purge: Election Year.name: The Purge: Election Year
The Purge: Election Year.plot: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

Woman in Gold.name: Woman in Gold
Woman in Gold.plot: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover artwork she believes rightfully belongs to her family.

Dirty Grandpa.name: Dirty Grandpa
Dirty Grandpa.plot: Right before his wedding, an uptight corporate lawyer is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope.name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Top Five.name: Top Five
Top Five.plot: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality television star fiancée talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her television show.

Ace Ventura: Pet Detective.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
Ace Ventura: Pet Detective.plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

Ernest & Celestine.name: Ernest & Celestine
Ernest & Celestine.plot: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course.name: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course
The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course.plot: The Crocodile Hunter mistakes some CIA agents for poachers and sets out to stop them from capturing a wily croc which, unbeknownst to him, has swallowed a tracking drone.

The Shallows.name: The Shallows
The Shallows.plot: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

The Lucky Ones.name: The Lucky Ones
The Lucky Ones.plot: Three different soldiers - a woman and two men - return from war and facing the peaceful life's problems of each other.

The Theory of Everything.name: The Theory of Everything
The Theory of Everything.plot: Stephen Hawking gets unprecedented success in the field of physics despite being diagnosed with motor neuron disease at the age of 21. He defeats awful odds as his first wife Jane aids him loyally.

Snitch.name: Snitch
Snitch.plot: A woman knows too much about a jewelry heist.

The Imitation Game.name: The Imitation Game
The Imitation Game.plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

The Homesman.name: The Homesman
The Homesman.plot: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.

The Young Messiah.name: The Young Messiah
The Young Messiah.plot: Tells the story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth. Told from his childhood perspective, it follows young Jesus as he grows into his religious identity.

They.name: They
They.plot: A British couple raises their child gender-open.

Wolves.name: Wolves
Wolves.plot: A boy is trying to find out about his family history and stumbles upon a town of lycans.

Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ign.name: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ign.plot: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

Star Trek III: The Search for Spock.name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Star Trek III: The Search for Spock.plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

Neighbors.name: Neighbors
Neighbors.plot: A sinister vulture takes advantage of two roosters who hate each other by selling weapons to them so they can kill each other.

Won't Back Down.name: Won't Back Down
Won't Back Down.plot: Two determined mothers­, one a teacher, look to transform their children's failing inner city school. Facing a powerful and entrenched bureaucracy, they risk everything to make a difference in the education and future of their children.

Fight Valley.name: Fight Valley
Fight Valley.plot: A young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring. Her sister Windsor begins training under a respected ex-fighter as she searches for the killer.

Thir13en Ghosts.name: Thir13en Ghosts
Thir13en Ghosts.plot: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves his house, fortune, and his prized collection of ghosts.

By the Sea.name: By the Sea
By the Sea.plot: A Terrytoons animated short. A beach romance between a mouse and a cat is interrupted by an octopus who drags the lady into the sea. The lifeguard must save the lady from the beast.

Triple 9.name: Triple 9
Triple 9.plot: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

The Man Who Knew Too Little.name: The Man Who Knew Too Little
The Man Who Knew Too Little.plot: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

Doubt.name: Doubt
Doubt.plot: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

Bad Moms.name: Bad Moms
Bad Moms.plot: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

12 Years a Slave.name: 12 Years a Slave
12 Years a Slave.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free Black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

The Conjuring.name: The Conjuring
The Conjuring.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

eXistenZ.name: eXistenZ
eXistenZ.plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas B.name: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas B.plot: Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless hero's quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic...

Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strike.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strike.plot: After the Rebel Alliance are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Jane Got a Gun.name: Jane Got a Gun
Jane Got a Gun.plot: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home.name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home.plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

The Gambler.name: The Gambler
The Gambler.plot: Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy.plot: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

Ride Along.name: Ride Along
Ride Along.plot: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed.name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed.plot: The Mystery Inc. gang must save Coolsville from an attack of their past monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to take down the gang.

A Walk Among the Tombstones.name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
A Walk Among the Tombstones.plot: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

The 40-Year-Old Virgin.name: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
The 40-Year-Old Virgin.plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

Wild Card.name: Wild Card
Wild Card.plot: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

Wing Commander.name: Wing Commander
Wing Commander.plot: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

Sicario.name: Sicario
Sicario.plot: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

The Nut Job.name: The Nut Job
The Nut Job.plot: An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.

Without a Paddle.name: Without a Paddle
Without a Paddle.plot: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

Se7en.name: Se7en
Se7en.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

The Grand Budapest Hotel.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
The Grand Budapest Hotel.plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet.name: The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet
The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet.plot: A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithsonian Institute.

Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Je.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Je.plot: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Wimbledon.name: Wimbledon
Wimbledon.plot: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising.name: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising.plot: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity that lived there before, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.

Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me.name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me.plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

The Hangover.name: The Hangover
The Hangover.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

Aloha.name: Aloha
Aloha.plot: In the South Seas, a half-caste island girl refuses to follow tradition and marry a fellow islander, instead falling in love with a white man and heir to an American fortune.

We're the Millers.name: We're the Millers
We're the Millers.plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

Star Trek: Generations.name: Star Trek: Generations
Star Trek: Generations.plot: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

The Gunman.name: The Gunman
The Gunman.plot: Dan Forester, a small town New Mexico newspaper editor, spots an outlaw wanted for murder. He sends word to Whip Wilson, a Texas lawman anxious to make an arrest. When Wilson arrives, he discovers the town is ruled by an outlaw gang running a protection racket and the town's sheriff seemingly unable to cope with the situation. Worse, the local lawman refuses to cooperate with Wilson to bring the fugitive Whip seeks to justice. With Dan's help, Whip sets out to break-up the outlaw gang and arrest the brains behind the criminal enterprise so he can bring his fugitive back to the Lone Star state to stand trial.

Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant.name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant.plot: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak, becoming a creature of the night.

Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close.name: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close.plot: A nine-year-old amateur inventor, Francophile, and pacifist searches New York City for the lock that matches a mysterious key left behind by his father, who died in the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.

Sex Tape.name: Sex Tape
Sex Tape.plot: A married couple wake up to discover that the sex tape they made the evening before has gone missing, leading to a frantic search for its whereabouts.

Bridge of Spies.name: Bridge of Spies
Bridge of Spies.plot: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

American Hustle.name: American Hustle
American Hustle.plot: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.

Animal Kingdom: Let's go Ape.name: Animal Kingdom: Let's go Ape
Animal Kingdom: Let's go Ape.plot: The outcast son of a primate King learns about being a monkey.

Underworld: Evolution.name: Underworld: Evolution
Underworld: Evolution.plot: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

Prisoners.name: Prisoners
Prisoners.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement.name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement.plot: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

The Infiltrator.name: The Infiltrator
The Infiltrator.plot: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

Taken 3.name: Taken 3
Taken 3.plot: Accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed, Bryan Mills goes on the run and brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.

3:10 to Yuma.name: 3:10 to Yuma
3:10 to Yuma.plot: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Traffic.name: Traffic
Traffic.plot: The lives of some different people get intertwined when a girl is in urgent need of a heart transplant with the only heart donor being many miles of traffic away.

Run All Night.name: Run All Night
Run All Night.plot: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire.plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

22 Jump Street.name: 22 Jump Street
22 Jump Street.plot: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

The Twilight Saga: New Moon.name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
The Twilight Saga: New Moon.plot: After Edward leaves because of an incident involving Bella, Jacob Black becomes her best friend. But what Bella doesn't realize is that Jacob also has a secret that will change their lives suddenly.

Kill Bill: Vol. 2.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
Kill Bill: Vol. 2.plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

Kill Bill: Vol. 1.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Kill Bill: Vol. 1.plot: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Captain Phillips.name: Captain Phillips
Captain Phillips.plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

American Sniper.name: American Sniper
American Sniper.plot: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones.name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones.plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

The Last Castle.name: The Last Castle
The Last Castle.plot: A court-martialed General rallies together twelve hundred inmates to rise against a corrupt and sadistic warden.

Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas.name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas.plot: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

xXx: State of the Union.name: xXx: State of the Union
xXx: State of the Union.plot: Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.

Star Trek: Nemesis.name: Star Trek: Nemesis
Star Trek: Nemesis.plot: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.

The Lego Movie.name: The Lego Movie
The Lego Movie.plot: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

Under Siege 2: Dark Territory.name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
Under Siege 2: Dark Territory.plot: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

The Hateful Eight.name: The Hateful Eight
The Hateful Eight.plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Austin Powers in Goldmember.name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
Austin Powers in Goldmember.plot: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

Zathura: A Space Adventure.name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Zathura: A Space Adventure.plot: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

The X Files.name: The X Files
The X Files.plot: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

Ted 2.name: Ted 2
Ted 2.plot: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

The Twilight Saga: Eclipse.name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
The Twilight Saga: Eclipse.plot: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

Underworld: Awakening.name: Underworld: Awakening
Underworld: Awakening.plot: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

xXx.name: xXx
xXx.plot: The US government recruits extreme sports athlete Xander Cage to infiltrate a Russian criminal ring, which is plotting the destruction of the world.

Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bo.name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bo.plot: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

The Rock.name: The Rock
The Rock.plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

The Lost World: Jurassic Park.name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
The Lost World: Jurassic Park.plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2.plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

Journey 2: The Mysterious Island.name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
Journey 2: The Mysterious Island.plot: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

Looney Tunes: Back in Action.name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
Looney Tunes: Back in Action.plot: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

Mission: Impossible.name: Mission: Impossible
Mission: Impossible.plot: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.plot: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Lara Croft: Tomb Raider.name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
Lara Croft: Tomb Raider.plot: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Terminator 2: Judgment Day.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Terminator 2: Judgment Day.plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.plot: WARRIOR is an action-packed, character-driven tale of heroes and villains, love and hate, war and faith, truth and deceit. A 1700-year-old epic story based on actual events, embellished with a hint of myth, legend and imagination.

The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

300: Rise of an Empire.name: 300: Rise of an Empire
300: Rise of an Empire.plot: Greek general Themistocles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

The Huntsman: Winter's War.name: The Huntsman: Winter's War
The Huntsman: Winter's War.plot: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menac.name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menac.plot: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Cl.name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Cl.plot: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the.name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the.plot: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi pursues a new threat, while Anakin Skywalker is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot to rule the galaxy.

Elysium.name: Elysium
Elysium.plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Mission: Impossible II.name: Mission: Impossible II
Mission: Impossible II.plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows.name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows.plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1.plot: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of t.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of t.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Megamind.name: Megamind
Megamind.plot: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

The Hunger Games: Catching Fire.name: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
The Hunger Games: Catching Fire.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

Penguins of Madagascar.name: Penguins of Madagascar
Penguins of Madagascar.plot: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part.name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part.plot: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

Captain America: The First Avenger.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
Captain America: The First Avenger.plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

Gods of Egypt.name: Gods of Egypt
Gods of Egypt.plot: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol.name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol.plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

Mission: Impossible III.name: Mission: Impossible III
Mission: Impossible III.plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation.name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation.plot: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

Mad Max: Fury Road.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
Mad Max: Fury Road.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

Thor: The Dark World.name: Thor: The Dark World
Thor: The Dark World.plot: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

X-Men Origins: Wolverine.name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
X-Men Origins: Wolverine.plot: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2.plot: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

X-Men: First Class.name: X-Men: First Class
X-Men: First Class.plot: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey.name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey.plot: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Interstellar.name: Interstellar
Interstellar.plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Guardians of the Galaxy.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
Guardians of the Galaxy.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines.name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines.plot: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

Independence Day: Resurgence.name: Independence Day: Resurgence
Independence Day: Resurgence.plot: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

Big Hero 6.name: Big Hero 6
Big Hero 6.plot: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Dawn of the Planet of the Apes.name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Dawn of the Planet of the Apes.plot: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

Edge of Tomorrow.name: Edge of Tomorrow
Edge of Tomorrow.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

X-Men: Apocalypse.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
X-Men: Apocalypse.plot: In the 1980s, the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive by bringing destruction to the world.

Jupiter Ascending.name: Jupiter Ascending
Jupiter Ascending.plot: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.

Transformers: Dark of the Moon.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Transformers: Dark of the Moon.plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

Pacific Rim.name: Pacific Rim
Pacific Rim.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time.plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Jack the Giant Slayer.name: Jack the Giant Slayer
Jack the Giant Slayer.plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

X-Men: Days of Future Past.name: X-Men: Days of Future Past
X-Men: Days of Future Past.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Furious 7.name: Furious 7
