Furious 7.plot: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

TRON: Legacy.name: TRON: Legacy
TRON: Legacy.plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

Transformers: Age of Extinction.name: Transformers: Age of Extinction
Transformers: Age of Extinction.plot: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen.plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

X-Men: The Last Stand.name: X-Men: The Last Stand
X-Men: The Last Stand.plot: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Grey becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

Captain America: Civil War.name: Captain America: Civil War
Captain America: Civil War.plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug.name: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain, their homeland, from the dragon Smaug.

The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armie.name: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armie.plot: Bilbo Baggins and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Ti.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Ti.plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Che.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Che.plot: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.plot: Batman is manipulated by Lex Luthor to fear Superman. Superman´s existence is meanwhile dividing the world and he is framed for murder during an international crisis. The heroes clash and force the neutral Wonder Woman to reemerge.

Avengers: Age of Ultron.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Avengers: Age of Ultron.plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End.plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

Manhattan Murder Mystery.name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
Manhattan Murder Mystery.plot: Middle-aged New York married couple Larry and Carol Lipton suspect foul play when their neighbor Paul House's wife Lillian suddenly drops dead.

Take the Money and Run.name: Take the Money and Run
Take the Money and Run.plot: The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.

What's Up, Tiger Lily?.name: What's Up, Tiger Lily?
What's Up, Tiger Lily?.plot: Woody Allen re-dubs the Japanese spy film Kokusai himitsu keisatsu: Kagi no kagi (1965), turning it into a comedy about an agent pursuing the world's greatest egg salad recipe.

Motives.name: Motives
Motives.plot: An African boy comes to India to study; gets involved with the wrong people, and is set up - and murdered.

Turner & Hooch.name: Turner & Hooch
Turner & Hooch.plot: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

The Truth About Charlie.name: The Truth About Charlie
The Truth About Charlie.plot: A woman returns from holiday to find her husband has been murdered, and several groups of people are pressuring her to unravel the mystery of his true identity and activities during his final days.

One from the Heart.name: One from the Heart
One from the Heart.plot: A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?

Art School Confidential.name: Art School Confidential
Art School Confidential.plot: Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.

Night of the Demons.name: Night of the Demons
Night of the Demons.plot: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

Zapped!.name: Zapped!
Zapped!.plot: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

Manny & Lo.name: Manny & Lo
Manny & Lo.plot: A pregnant teen and her younger sister run away from foster homes and kidnap a woman whom they believe can help with the pregnancy.

A Love Song for Bobby Long.name: A Love Song for Bobby Long
A Love Song for Bobby Long.plot: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

The Perfect Score.name: The Perfect Score
The Perfect Score.plot: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

Village of the Giants.name: Village of the Giants
Village of the Giants.plot: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.

Weird Science.name: Weird Science
Weird Science.plot: Two high-school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, who promptly turns their lives upside-down.

The Seduction of Joe Tynan.name: The Seduction of Joe Tynan
The Seduction of Joe Tynan.plot: Respected liberal Senator Joe Tynan is asked to lead the opposition to a Supreme Court appointment. It means losing an old friend and fudging principles to make the necessary deals, as well as further straining his already part-time family life. But it could be a big boost to his career, so he takes it on. Helping him prepare the case is pretty southern researcher Karen Traynor, and their developing relationship further complicates and compromises his life.

Turn the River.name: Turn the River
Turn the River.plot: A pool shark takes the ultimate gamble when she kidnaps her own son and flees her ex-husband.

The Underneath.name: The Underneath
The Underneath.plot: A young newlywed couple find themselves trapped in a network of underground caves. With her husband injured, the new bride is forced to find her way back to the surface in order to save his life. In the process, they discover a terrifying truth about the "underneath", they are not alone. Something evil is hunting them.

The Sand Pebbles.name: The Sand Pebbles
The Sand Pebbles.plot: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

Twins of Evil.name: Twins of Evil
Twins of Evil.plot: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Frieda, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

The Stuff.name: The Stuff
The Stuff.plot: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

The Panic in Needle Park.name: The Panic in Needle Park
The Panic in Needle Park.plot: Follows the lives of heroin addicts who frequent "Needle Park" in New York City.

We Don't Live Here Anymore.name: We Don't Live Here Anymore
We Don't Live Here Anymore.plot: An indiscretion between two close friends tears down their respective marriages.

The Young Lions.name: The Young Lions
The Young Lions.plot: The lives of three young men, a German and two Americans, during WWII.

The Gazebo.name: The Gazebo
The Gazebo.plot: TV writer Elliott Nash buries something under the new gazebo in his suburban backyard. But the nervous man can't let it rest there.

The First Men in the Moon.name: The First Men in the Moon
The First Men in the Moon.plot: The inventor of a space sphere flies to the moon and is marooned by a crooked financier.

Yuvvraaj.name: Yuvvraaj
Yuvvraaj.plot: Two estranged brothers must learn to work together to claim their rightful share of an inheritance left solely to their eldest sibling.

Undercover Blues.name: Undercover Blues
Undercover Blues.plot: A spy couple on maternity leave in New Orleans, entertained by a mugger named Muerte, is called in when Novacek steals explosives.

Something Wild.name: Something Wild
Something Wild.plot: A young rape victim tries desperately to pick up the pieces of her life, only to find herself at the mercy of a would-be rescuer.

In the Electric Mist.name: In the Electric Mist
In the Electric Mist.plot: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.

Tune in Tomorrow.name: Tune in Tomorrow
Tune in Tomorrow.plot: A carnival setting illustrates the superiority of the radio medium for American business, with an eye on a future of economic prosperity.

The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.plot: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

The Wind and the Lion.name: The Wind and the Lion
The Wind and the Lion.plot: A Berber chieftain triggers an international incident, drawing the involvement of Theodore Roosevelt, when he kidnaps an American widow and her children in 1900s Morocco.

Alex in Wonderland.name: Alex in Wonderland
Alex in Wonderland.plot: Bohemian Alex Morrison has just finished directing his first feature-length movie. In its previews, the movie is considered a critical, artistic, and surefire commercial success, so Alex seemingly has his choice of what his next project will be. Alex has a few ideas, like a biopic of Lenny Bruce or a movie about a black uprising in Los Angeles. As he makes the rounds of both the Hollywood community and European movie centers for ideas, he fantasizes about movie scenarios of his everyday situations, influenced by his movie idols, some of whom he actually meets, like Italian director Federico Fellini and French actress Jeanne Moreau. He's also wondering what to do about his personal life: does it make sense for him to "move up" with his wife Beth and their two daughters from their middle-class lifestyle? If so, filmmaking must not only achieve his main purpose of saying something meaningful, but also must be commercially successful. But must the need for commercial success ultimately take artistic control out of his hands?

Only Angels Have Wings.name: Only Angels Have Wings
Only Angels Have Wings.plot: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air-freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract, as a traveling American showgirl stops in town.

The Return of Swamp Thing.name: The Return of Swamp Thing
The Return of Swamp Thing.plot: In this tongue-in-cheek sequel, the benevolent bog creature falls for the vegetarian, plant-loving daughter of the evil scientist who created him.

Two Hands.name: Two Hands
Two Hands.plot: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.

Yelling to the Sky.name: Yelling to the Sky
Yelling to the Sky.plot: As her family falls apart, 17-year-old Sweetness O'Hara is left to fend for herself in a neighborhood where her survival is uncertain.

Winged Creatures.name: Winged Creatures
Winged Creatures.plot: A group of strangers form a unique relationship with each other after surviving a random shooting at a Los Angeles diner.

The Towering Inferno.name: The Towering Inferno
The Towering Inferno.plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

Things Behind the Sun.name: Things Behind the Sun
Things Behind the Sun.plot: A young music journalist's dark memories are awakened when he goes to interview a female rock singer, and both are forced to confront troubling secrets from their pasts.

Logorama.name: Logorama
Logorama.plot: Police chase an armed criminal in a version of Los Angeles comprised entirely of corporate logos.

The Truth About Cats & Dogs.name: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
The Truth About Cats & Dogs.plot: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

Gray Lady Down.name: Gray Lady Down
Gray Lady Down.plot: A Navy Captain uses his experimental Snark to reach a nuclear submarine stuck on an ocean ledge.

True Legend.name: True Legend
True Legend.plot: China, 1861: After rescuing the Qing prince from rebels, General Su retires to start a martial arts school. His foster brother betrays him and Su barely survives. Su has a new enemy to defeat.

Timecode.name: Timecode
Timecode.plot: Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.

Panther.name: Panther
Panther.plot: A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.

Texas Killing Fields.name: Texas Killing Fields
Texas Killing Fields.plot: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

Foxcatcher.name: Foxcatcher
Foxcatcher.plot: U.S. Olympic wrestling champions and brothers Mark Schultz and Dave Schultz join "Team Foxcatcher", led by eccentric multi-millionaire John du Pont, as they train for the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, but John's self-destructive behavior threatens to consume them all.

The Hot Flashes.name: The Hot Flashes
The Hot Flashes.plot: A group of middle aged women play basketball and prove a point.

Dead Man.name: Dead Man
Dead Man.plot: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange Native American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

What About Bob?.name: What About Bob?
What About Bob?.plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

Man About Town.name: Man About Town
Man About Town.plot: A top Hollywood talent agent's cushy existence is threatened when he discovers that his wife is cheating on him and that a reporter has swiped his journal to bring him down.

What's Up, Doc?.name: What's Up, Doc?
What's Up, Doc?.plot: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

The Way We Were.name: The Way We Were
The Way We Were.plot: During post-WWII McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that genuine friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

Night Falls on Manhattan.name: Night Falls on Manhattan
Night Falls on Manhattan.plot: A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.

When a Man Loves a Woman.name: When a Man Loves a Woman
When a Man Loves a Woman.plot: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

My First Mister.name: My First Mister
My First Mister.plot: A 17-year-old girl has a troubled relationship with a 49-year-old man.

Vatel.name: Vatel
Vatel.plot: Vatel is the cook of Prince Condé. When the prince invites Louis XIV to hunt, he has to give lavish banquets in order to fall in his favor. But when Vatel falls in love with the king's mistress, love and duty come into conflict.

Wolf Girl.name: Wolf Girl
Wolf Girl.plot: Tara Talbot (Victoria Sanchez) is afflicted with the rare genetic condition known as hypertrichosis - she is covered head to toe in hair. She lives her life in Harley Dune's (Tim Curry's) Travelling Freak Show, on display as the "Terrifying Wolf Girl", but underneath she is just a teenage girl who longs to be normal.

The Secret of Moonacre.name: The Secret of Moonacre
The Secret of Moonacre.plot: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.

A Fish Called Wanda.name: A Fish Called Wanda
A Fish Called Wanda.plot: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool a very proper barrister.

Thunderpants.name: Thunderpants
Thunderpants.plot: An 11-year-old boy's amazing ability to break wind leads him first to fame and then to death row, before it helps him to fulfill his ambition of becoming an astronaut.

Peep World.name: Peep World
Peep World.plot: Four siblings implode after the release of a book written about them.

Take This Waltz.name: Take This Waltz
Take This Waltz.plot: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.

Sleepless in Seattle.name: Sleepless in Seattle
Sleepless in Seattle.plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

Rockshow.name: Rockshow
Rockshow.plot: In 1975 and 1976 Paul McCartney and Wings undertook the epic Wings over the World tour, the largest scale tour they would ever undertake as a band. From this tour came both the legendary "Wings over America" triple live album and the concert film "Rockshow". Although filmed on this tour at the enormous Kingdome in Seattle, "Rockshow", originally a cut down version of the concert, was not premiered until November 1980 in New York and April 1981 in London. It was released on Betamax and later on laserdisc. Now for the first time the complete full length concert is being made available fully restored from the original 35mm film and with restored & remastered sound, including a 5.1 mix for the first time. This is Paul McCartney and Wings live on stage in a concert that is destined to live forever!

The Secret of My Success.name: The Secret of My Success
The Secret of My Success.plot: Fast climbing Arthur Tate rose to his fame, wealth and respectability quickly from a beginning as a naive constable His rise was also due to 3 women: dressmaker Violet Lawson, Lily, the Baroness von Lukenberg, and movie producer Marigold Marado, His rise was also due to Mrs. Tate, who always seemed to have an extra bit of information which would make her suggest to the people that her son Arthur be provided a position where he could do more good. Perhaps Mrs. Tate had a grander plan for herself.

The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things.name: The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things
The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things.plot: Seven-year-old Jeremiah is pulled from his foster home and thrown into a troubled life on the road with his teenage mother, Sarah.

Reality Bites.name: Reality Bites
Reality Bites.plot: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Generation X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

The Music Never Stopped.name: The Music Never Stopped
The Music Never Stopped.plot: Tale of a father who struggles to bond with his estranged son Gabriel, after Gabriel suffers from a brain tumor that prevents him from forming new memories. With Gabriel unable to shed the beliefs and interests that caused their physical and emotional distance, Henry must learn to embrace his son's choices and try to connect with him through music.

Cronos.name: Cronos
Cronos.plot: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

Zookeeper.name: Zookeeper
Zookeeper.plot: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

The Sandlot.name: The Sandlot
The Sandlot.plot: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

True Crime.name: True Crime
True Crime.plot: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

Two If by Sea.name: Two If by Sea
Two If by Sea.plot: A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract, and manage to evade the police. The sale takes place four days later on an island, but things don't go as planned.

The Ref.name: The Ref
The Ref.plot: A cat burglar is forced to take a bickering, dysfunctional family hostage on Christmas Eve.

The Man Who Could Cheat Death.name: The Man Who Could Cheat Death
The Man Who Could Cheat Death.plot: A centenarian artist and scientist in 1890 Paris maintains his youth and health by periodically replacing a gland with that of a living person.

The Wicker Man.name: The Wicker Man
The Wicker Man.plot: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

The Skull.name: The Skull
The Skull.plot: The Skulls is a dream come true. But Luke soon comes to realize just how powerful The Skulls organization really is -- and that the truth, like success, comes at a very high price.

Drop Dead Fred.name: Drop Dead Fred
Drop Dead Fred.plot: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

Whispers in the Dark.name: Whispers in the Dark
Whispers in the Dark.plot: Eve tells her shrink, Ann, about kinky sex with a man. Ann learns that it's the same man, she's been seeing lately. Eve finds out and explodes. A murder follows.

The Returned.name: The Returned
The Returned.plot: In a post-zombie world, where the infected live normal lives, their retroviral drug is running out.

Hero.name: Hero
Hero.plot: The film follows the story of An Jung-geun, a Korean-independence activist who assassinated Ito Hirobumi, the first Prime Minister of Japan and Resident-General of Korea in 1909.

Under the Skin.name: Under the Skin
Under the Skin.plot: A woman explores her sexuality to cope with the passing of her mother, leading her to profound revelations about herself and the people closest to her.

Zodiac.name: Zodiac
Zodiac.plot: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

Boomerang.name: Boomerang
Boomerang.plot: A moving story centered around a blind man and a girl with a troubled past.

Winter's Bone.name: Winter's Bone
Winter's Bone.plot: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

The Dead Pool.name: The Dead Pool
The Dead Pool.plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder various San Francisco celebrities, with himself being one of the targets.

Underworld.name: Underworld
Underworld.plot: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.

Trapped.name: Trapped
Trapped.plot: A man struggles to survive after he unintentionally locks himself up in a high rise devoid of food, water and electricity.

Mr. Popper's Penguins.name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
Mr. Popper's Penguins.plot: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

The Longest Ride.name: The Longest Ride
The Longest Ride.plot: Sophia and Luke make an unexpected and fateful connection with Ira, a 90-years old man, when they save him from a car crash. Ira's memories of his own decades-long romance with his beloved wife deeply inspire the young couple.

Terror Train.name: Terror Train
Terror Train.plot: It follows a college student as she boards a party train for Halloween, and ends up fighting for her life when a mysterious assailant begins killing the people one-by-one.

2001: A Space Odyssey.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
2001: A Space Odyssey.plot: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

Legend.name: Legend
Legend.plot: A young woman wants to become an X-rated star, but her father secretly plans another life for her.

The Martian.name: The Martian
The Martian.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

Room.name: Room
Room.plot: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

Allegiant.name: Allegiant
Allegiant.plot: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

1982.plot: During the 1982 invasion of Lebanon, an 11-year-old boy tries to tell a classmate about his crush on her while their teachers try to hide their fear of the conflict.

Gone Girl.name: Gone Girl
Gone Girl.plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

The Blood of My Brother.name: The Blood of My Brother
The Blood of My Brother.plot: While volunteering to guard the ancient mosque in Kadhimiya, Ra'ad, an Iraqi portrait photographer, is shot and killed by an American patrol. His brother Ibrahim dreams of revenge.

The Sicilian.name: The Sicilian
The Sicilian.plot: Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

The Whistler.name: The Whistler
The Whistler.plot: When a no-good band of thugs enter a quiet small town to unleash their terror, nothing could prepare them for the wrath of a gentle giant who would defend the honor of his one true love to the end of his life, and beyond.

Where We Belong.name: Where We Belong
Where We Belong.plot: WHERE WE BELONG is a story about a downtown street hustler DRONE who leads a disobedient group of young men engaging in juvenile delinquency and violence that was left behind by their guardian CHIEF. Drone as a new leader makes different encounters to find money for survival where he got arrested. His set free with the help an uptown girl JULIAN whom they later develop affection. As time passes, he decides to drop the drug business aside for good and focus living a positive life as boxer. In the path of success to his dream as an International Boxing Champion, things worsen when his former boss FACE blackmails him by abducting ghetto brother BUGGIE with interest of using him transport drugs outside the country. He beats odds offering his African Title Match prize to liberate the brother and later transformed his ghetto family.

Where'd You Go, Bernadette.name: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
Where'd You Go, Bernadette.plot: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

Can You Keep a Secret?.name: Can You Keep a Secret?
Can You Keep a Secret?.plot: Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. At least, she thought he was a stranger...Until she later meets Jack, her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her. Based on the blockbuster NYT bestseller.

The Rosie Project.name: The Rosie Project
The Rosie Project.plot: An unlucky-in-love university professor creates an elaborate questionnaire in an effort to find a wife and meets an unconventional woman who doesn't match any of his "requirements", but might be the perfect woman for him.

Wonder.name: Wonder
Wonder.plot: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

The Husband's Secret.name: The Husband's Secret
The Husband's Secret.plot: The lives of three women all come crumbling down after one of the women discovers a secret letter written by her husband.

Hawaii.name: Hawaii
Hawaii.plot: Martin seeks for a temporary job at Eugenio's house. When they recognize to be childhood friends, Eugenio offers him work for the summer. A power and desire game starts and their relationship grows beyond their friendship.

Island.name: Island
Island.plot: A man lost at sea washes up on an island.

Jane Eyre.name: Jane Eyre
Jane Eyre.plot: Jane Eyre, an orphan, is raised in a harsh charity school. She becomes a teacher and is hired as a governess at Thornfield Hall by housekeeper Mrs. Fairfax. The plot revolves around her experiences there.

The Great Gatsby.name: The Great Gatsby
The Great Gatsby.plot: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

The River.name: The River
The River.plot: This documentary short film looks at the devastating and costly problems, including seasonal flooding and erosion of precious topsoil, associated with the Mississippi River system and promotes more Federal projects to remedy the situation.

The Storyteller.name: The Storyteller
The Storyteller.plot: The love of an enchanted young girl brings wonder and healing to a broken family.

Providence.name: Providence
Providence.plot: Rachel Cartwright and Mitchell Little both grow up in the small town of Providence, Tennessee. Their paths keep crossing and at one point it looks like they'll finally get together. But the opportunity slips away and they go their separate ways. It takes a tragedy many years later before they're reunited.

Deep.name: Deep
Deep.plot: Four insomniac med school students are lured into a neuroscience experiment that spirals out of control and must find a way out before it's too late.

The Siren.name: The Siren
The Siren.plot: A man searches the lake for the monster that murdered his husband, while that monster falls in love with an unsuspecting visitor.

Shirley.name: Shirley
Shirley.plot: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

Attachments.name: Attachments
Attachments.plot: One millennial I.T. nerd plus one computer illiterate senior citizen, equals one unlikely attachment. Eileen Roth is a widow who needs to learn how to use a computer in order to communicate with her beloved grand-daughter in this funny love story.

The Firm.name: The Firm
The Firm.plot: A man's neighbor asks him via intercom whether he will accompany her for a morning swim. He says he will. His neighbor waits outside. He soon discovers that love has as much to do with timing as with desire.

In Our Time.name: In Our Time
In Our Time.plot: A young woman traveling to Poland with her employer meets a count, and they fall in love as World War II begins.

Ariel.name: Ariel
Ariel.plot: A Finnish man goes to the city to find a job after the mine where he worked is closed and his father commits suicide.

Velocity.name: Velocity
Velocity.plot: Lance King is the newest arrival to the MotoGP Championship racing series. His team is owned by a racing legend but is struggling to remain competitive against the deep-pocketed manufacturer teams. They search for money from new sponsors to no avail until someone approaches them and buys the team. The new team owner, Anna Zykov, is an intelligent and well prepared beautiful young woman who's father owns the Russian oil company, Venture Petroleum. Her arrival boosts the team in the MotoGP standings and Anna and Lance become a hot and glamorous couple within the paddock and out of it. Totally unbeknownst to Anna, her father also happens to be the head of the Russian Mafia. When he is arrested and all of his assets are frozen, Anna, Lance and his brother, Cameron, go to Moscow to "borrow" the cash out of her father's safe to keep the team going. Although racing motorcycles at the highest level in the world is a big part of the story, "Velocity" is much more than just a movie about the MotoGP scene. "VELOCITY" is the first dramatic feature film to be allowed inside the world of MotoGP racing . It is endorsed and produced in cooperation with Dorna Sports SL, the rights holder to the sport that 5.1 Billion people per year watch on television and attend during seventeen different events on five continents.

Romeo and Juliet.name: Romeo and Juliet
Romeo and Juliet.plot: In this animated version of Shakespeare's classic play, Romeo and Juliet's fateful lives are changed forever after they marry each other in a whirlwind of romance against the wishes of their feuding families.

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.plot: When 17 year old Sarah's father commits suicide, she and her mother move to a new home in the country. Soon, Sarah realises that the house has a mysterious past and that her new start may not be as idealistic as planned.

Virgin.name: Virgin
Virgin.plot: A local legend involving visions of the Virgin Mary sets the backdrop for Scott's pursuit of true love.

Requiem.name: Requiem
Requiem.plot: Live performance of the Tim Keyes composition "Requiem" by the Tim Keyes Consort. Featured soloists; baritone Gary Gavula, tenor Justin Connors, alto Mary Chobrda Edgar, and soprano Victoria Lotkowitcz. Conducted by Tim Keyes.

Paradise Lost.name: Paradise Lost
Paradise Lost.plot: What happens when 8 reality show contestants and a small crew get stranded on a deserted island? At first it's all fun and games. But when one turns out to be a killer hellbent on revenge surviving the night seems less and less possible.

Hunger.name: Hunger
Hunger.plot: Five strangers struggle when a madman imprisons them in an underground dungeon in this nail-biting horror.

The Raven.name: The Raven
The Raven.plot: A brilliant surgeon with a morbid obsession for instruments of torture grows dangerously obsessed with a young socialite whose life he's saved.

Zoo.name: Zoo
Zoo.plot: A couple try to save their marriage during a zombie apocalypse.

The Passage.name: The Passage
genre: The New York Times Best Seller list
The Passage.plot: During World War II, a Basque shepherd is approached by the underground, who wants him to lead a scientist and his family across the Pyrenees while being pursued by a sadistic German.

Easy.name: Easy
Easy.plot: A young woman's search for love and affection brings her nothing but trouble.

Paint It Black.name: Paint It Black
Paint It Black.plot: A serial killer covers his victims in modeling clay, and a local sculptor is accused of the crimes.

The Shadows.name: The Shadows
The Shadows.plot: Wunderkind horror novelist Stephen Grimes is hard at work coming up with new ways to kill people when, on a late-night drive, he hits a young man and rushes him to the hospital. A tentative friendship between the two men erupts into a heated affair. Stephen is soon trapped in a dangerous plot, as Emett and Emett's friends reveal a sinister side that could be a storyline from one of his own novels.

Women.name: Women
Women.plot: A small town detective investigates into a Sociology professor when a mutilated body is found and women have gone missing from his class.

Frostbite.name: Frostbite
Frostbite.plot: A schizophrenic teen who must prove a killer yeti urban legend is a hoax after coming face to face with a costumed yeti.

Tortilla Flat.name: Tortilla Flat
Tortilla Flat.plot: Danny, a poor northern Californian Mexican-American, inherits two houses from his grandfather and is quickly taken advantage of by his vagabond friends.

Shadowland.name: Shadowland
Shadowland.plot: They sought sanctuary. They found him. 'An ex-serviceman is forced to seek refuge for his team and the family in their charge in rural Scotland, with devastating consequences'

Delirium.name: Delirium
Delirium.plot: Emily has mysteriously returned home to her mother and stepfather, after being missing for over a year - and something came with her.

Rebecca.name: Rebecca
Rebecca.plot: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

Waiting.name: Waiting
Waiting.plot: Clare is an artist who agrees to bear a child for another couple. The plot follows Clare as a series of friends gather, as the birth draws near. It also shows the interests each seems to take in the event. As we see the characters and their relationships develop, Clare begins to have second thoughts about giving up her baby. Her mixed emotions are further confused by the arrival of an old boyfriend who wants to marry her. What will she decide to do?

X.name: X
X.plot: A veteran call girl and a runaway prostitute witness a murder and must evade the killer as he chases them through Sydney.

You.name: You
You.plot: 'The gun is mine, the bullets are yours, I did the killing, it's your children who died.' When the right to bear arms is abused; as society, what is right and wrong must be questioned.

Annihilation.name: Annihilation
Annihilation.plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.plot: Charlie, a young boy from an impoverished family, and four other kids win a tour of an amazing chocolate factory run by an imaginative chocolatier, Willy Wonka, and his staff of Oompa-Loompas.

Chain Reaction.name: Chain Reaction
Chain Reaction.plot: A film about how the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic is affecting small businesses and what they are doing to stay open and safe. Talking with business owners from the small town of Camden, Maine, we get information about the challenges that they have navigated past and how they have adapted to running businesses in a pandemic.

The Black Stallion.name: The Black Stallion
The Black Stallion.plot: After being shipwrecked with a magnificent horse off the coast of Africa in the 1940s, a boy bonds with the stallion, and trains him to race after their rescue.

Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.plot: Alice (Fiona Fullerton) falls down a rabbit hole and into a magical dream world populated by surreal characters and bewildering adventures. It's a journey of self-discovery for Alice as she searches for a way out of Wonderland and encounters many bizarre creatures such as the White Rabbit (Michael Crawford), the March Hare (Peter Sellers), the Queen of Hearts (Dame Flora Robson), and the Dormouse (Dudley Moore). Musical highlights include the inspiring song "The Me I Never Knew".

The Narrows.name: The Narrows
The Narrows.plot: 19-year-old Brooklyn boy Mike tries to balance a scholarship to NYU and his sophisticated Italian neighborhood roots, as well as an eager-to-marry girlfriend, a proud father and a less lawful transport job. After Tim McLoughlin's novel.

Macbeth.name: Macbeth
Macbeth.plot: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

The Taming of the Shrew.name: The Taming of the Shrew
The Taming of the Shrew.plot: In sixteenth century Padua, Hortensio loves Bianca, the youngest daughter of Baptista. But Baptista will not allow the two to get married until his eldest daughter, the extremely headstrong Katherine, is betrothed. This task seems impossible because of Katherine's shrewish demeanor. They believe their prayers have been answered with the arrival from Verona of the lusty Petruchio, whose father has just passed, leaving him to travel the world and marry. Having not yet met her, Petruchio agrees to court Katherine when he is told of her beauty and wit. Petruchio is even more excited at the prospect of marrying this wildcat of a woman after meeting her. Katherine will have none of it, even if it means her sister's spinsterhood, but has no choice but to marry him. Beyond the fact of the marriage itself, Katherine is even more irked by Petruchio's less than conventional behavior at the ceremony and post ceremony bridal feast. Each starts to play what they consider sly games of oneupsmanship with each other to gain the upper hand in the marriage.

A Midsummer Night's Dream.name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
A Midsummer Night's Dream.plot: Two couples and a troupe of actors have an encounter with some mischievous fairies in the forest.

The Winter's Tale.name: The Winter's Tale
The Winter's Tale.plot: Cheek by Jowl's adaptation of the Shakespearean play "The Winter's Tale". Determined that his wife has been unfaithful, King Leontes goes down a path of tyranny- exiling friends, courtiers, and even family.

The Merchant of Venice.name: The Merchant of Venice
The Merchant of Venice.plot: The year is 1938 and the world is on the brink of war. During this time, in the city of Venice, a young gentleman named Bassanio desires a guarantor for a loan of three thousand ducats to court the wealthy heiress of Belmont, Portia. He approaches his friend Antonio the merchant to be his guarantor. However, Antonio's recent ventures have left him short of money. Nevertheless, Antonio accepts Bassanio's request. They meet with the moneylender Shylock, who despises Antonio, due to his discrimination of Jews and his support of the Nazi political party. Shylock agrees to a short-term loan, grasping at an opportunity to exact his revenge upon Antonio and expresses that should the debt not be paid on time, the forfeit will be a pound of Antonio's flesh. Antonio smugly agrees to the bond, firmly believing that he will have treble the money that Shylock asks for in return before the debt expires. But all does not sail smoothly. Younity Theatre present Shakespeare's renowned tragic comedy in a light that showcases the dark and anti-semitic themes surrounding this famed story.

Rogues.name: Rogues
Rogues.plot: The result of an old-CIA-mind-control experiment gone bad, Felice Quick is on the loose and headed for Sam Blacker.

The Subterraneans.name: The Subterraneans
The Subterraneans.plot: A love story between two misunderstood new bohemians who don't even understand themselves.

The Outsiders.name: The Outsiders
The Outsiders.plot: In a small Oklahoma town in 1964, the rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, heats up when one gang member accidentally kills a member of the other.

The Time Machine.name: The Time Machine
The Time Machine.plot: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Persuasion.name: Persuasion
Persuasion.plot: A woman faces the return of her past in this modern adaptation of the Jane Austen novel Persuasion.

Hush, Hush.name: Hush, Hush
Hush, Hush.plot: Based on the New York Times best-selling book franchise series.

Gone with the Wind.name: Gone with the Wind
Gone with the Wind.plot: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Roses Are Red.name: Roses Are Red
Roses Are Red.plot: A paroled convict who bears a striking resemblance to the local District Attorney is hired by the mob to impersonate him, while the real District Attorney is kidnapped and held captive at a secret location.

The Hound of the Baskervilles.name: The Hound of the Baskervilles
The Hound of the Baskervilles.plot: After the mysterious death of Sir Charles Baskerville, Sherlock Holmes is called in to solve the mystery.

The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes.name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes.plot: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

A Study in Scarlet.name: A Study in Scarlet
A Study in Scarlet.plot: A ritual of transformation and awakening within the walls of the only existing original 'diorama' building in London. Followed by a celebration of the body and mind. The admission of sexual awakening and freedom. A tribute to the works of Georges Bataille. Filmed at The Bloomsbury Theatre, London, UK.

Winnie-the-Pooh.name: Winnie-the-Pooh
Winnie-the-Pooh.plot: Adapted word-for-word from A.A. Milne's masterpiece, Winnie-the-Pooh helps his friends Eeyore, Piglet, Owl, and Christopher Robin in their 100-Acre-Wood home.

Graceling.name: Graceling
Graceling.plot: A smart, beautiful young woman lives in a world where select people born with an extreme skill -- called a Grace -- are feared and exploited.

The Wonderful Wizard of Oz.name: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
The Wonderful Wizard of Oz.plot: Travel with Dorothy and Toto across the land of Oz in L. Frank Baum's American classic. Help the Scarecrow get his brains, the Tin Woodman his heart, and the poor Cowardly Lion just a little bit of courage!

Breaking Dawn.name: Breaking Dawn
Breaking Dawn.plot: In Germany of the late 1930's, a Jewish boy and a "Gentile" girl see their friendship threatended by the ever-growing antisemitism. A tragic incident changes both of their lives. The ensuing drama culminates in the infamous "Night of broken glass" on November 9th, 1938.

The Lord of the Rings.name: The Lord of the Rings
The Lord of the Rings.plot: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Inferno.name: Inferno
Inferno.plot: A fire chief (Gunn) is investigating the cause of a string of blazes that threaten to destroy her small town, while at the same time dealing with her teen daughter's rebelliousness.

The Return of the King.name: The Return of the King
The Return of the King.plot: A young farmer is visited by strangers from a nearby kingdom with an urgent message. His ambitions and future will be redefined if he summons the courage to accept his new identity.

In the Night Kitchen.name: In the Night Kitchen
In the Night Kitchen.plot: Sendak's classic comic fantasy of Mickey's adventures in the night kitchen tells us how we get our morning cake.

The Old Curiosity Shop.name: The Old Curiosity Shop
The Old Curiosity Shop.plot: A kindly shop owner whose overwhelming gambling debts allow a greedy landlord to seize his shop of dusty treasures. Evicted and with no way to pay his debts, he and his granddaughter flee.

Bleak House.name: Bleak House
Bleak House.plot: A Lady is suspected of killing a blackmailing lawyer who learned of her child by an earlier marriage to a criminal.

The Twits.name: The Twits
The Twits.plot: A pair of wicked pranksters plan an elaborate heist along with their crew of highly-trained animals.

The War of the Worlds.name: The War of the Worlds
The War of the Worlds.plot: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

Black Beauty.name: Black Beauty
Black Beauty.plot: An ancient prophesy has been told about a powerful and evil horse named Alta that will one day rise and take over the animal kingdom. But, the prophesy also speaks of an ordinary young horse capable of stopping the nightmare and restoring peace. That horse's name is Black Beauty. But will he succeed in defeating the mighty Alta? Saddle up and join the action in Black Beauty.

The Call of the Wild.name: The Call of the Wild
The Call of the Wild.plot: A house dog is abducted and brought to the north as a sled dog.

Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

Vampire Academy.name: Vampire Academy
Vampire Academy.plot: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

A Series of Unfortunate Events.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
A Series of Unfortunate Events.plot: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Germinal.name: Germinal
Germinal.plot: In mid-nineteenth-century northern France, a coal mining town's workers are exploited by the mine's owner. One day, they decide to go on strike, and the authorities repress them.

Tomorrow, When the War Began.name: Tomorrow, When the War Began
Tomorrow, When the War Began.plot: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely teenagers band together to fight.

The Truth.name: The Truth
The Truth.plot: When a glamorous upper-class couple is taken hostage in their mansion by a vicious and mysterious intruder, a simple home invasion robbery turns into something much - Much more complicated.

White Night.name: White Night
White Night.plot: A pawnbroker is found murdered in a remote town. Police suspect that he was murdered by an acquaintance, as even the most experienced investigator on the case could identify no signs of resistance. Three people come under suspicion but all of them have perfect alibis and the investigation comes to a standstill. One year later, one of them is found dead and the original murder case becomes even more mysterious. Almost fifteen years pass and the lead inspector, now approaching retirement, reflects on the only case he could not solve in an otherwise successful career. Haunted by a sense of responsibility and guilt that he caused suffering by letting the murder case go unsolved, he decides to re-investigate. His persistent search brings attention to the long forgotten case and reveals a hidden relationship between the victim's son and the neighborhood woman's daughter. As their love grows, more crimes happen. As their sin grows, the inspector's chase comes closer to them.

Awakened.name: Awakened
Awakened.plot: When newspaper reporter Jacob Harker loses his job, he and his wife Haley must move into a small rental house owned by Webster Cain. As they move in, Jacob discovers a discarded audio recording of 1960s blues singer Carol James. Captivated by the voice on the recording, Jacob conducts an investigation into Carol James' life and death. Through his pursuit, Jacob becomes haunted by an evil spirit. While the spirit seductively persuades Jacob, drawing him deeper and deeper into its own malicious plot, the spirit attacks and terrorizes Haley, creating both fear and distrust in the Harker home. Haley recognizes her husband less each day. How can a marriage survive such an attack of deception and evil? Can the faith of one help restore the condition of another?

Burned.name: Burned
Burned.plot: A young Latter-day Saint woman struggles to find her place in the world under the abuse of the person she most adores: her father. She must question family, faith, love, and the definition of a "woman's role".

Tempted.name: Tempted
Tempted.plot: A wealthy man married to a beautiful younger woman puts her fidelity to the test.

The Last Battle.name: The Last Battle
The Last Battle.plot: In a post-apocalyptic future where no one is able to speak, the few remaining humans fight over resources in order to survive.

Club Dead.name: Club Dead
Club Dead.plot: After many a nights of failed attempts, a group of friends obsessed with Hollywood's hottest night spot finally make it in with the help of their new friend Judy. The hot music, beautiful people and open bar lead the gang to believe this will be the best night of their lives. But, it doesn't take long until they discover that Club Dead has a dark secret- it's run by the undead and those that get in aren't meant to come out "alive"! Judy discovers why she was chosen- Madame has a unique destiny in mind for the pure young beauty. When Judy and her friends discover the truth, chaos ensues as the group is desperate to find a way out of... Club Dead.

Dead to the World.name: Dead to the World
Dead to the World.plot: Set amidst the grim world of a Sydney boxing gym, one woman must fight for both honour and tradition whilst another woman is poised to destroy all in the pursuit of greed.

Much Ado About Nothing.name: Much Ado About Nothing
Much Ado About Nothing.plot: Much Ado About Nothing contrasts the happiness of lovers Claudio and Hero, and the cynicism of sparring partners Beatrice and Benedick, who are united in their scorn for love.

Voyager.name: Voyager
Voyager.plot: April 1957: Rational engineer Faber's plane crashes in Mexico. He learns that he became a dad in 1938. He takes a ship from NYC to France and meets cute, young Sabeth. Fate?

Evermore.name: Evermore
Evermore.plot: EVERMORE is an adolescent thriller about the battle between science and nature throughout the eyes of troubled teenager called Jade.

The Throne of Fire.name: The Throne of Fire
The Throne of Fire.plot: A mighty hero battles the son of Satan and his evil witch ally to save a kingdom from being taken over by the duo.

City of Lost Souls.name: City of Lost Souls
City of Lost Souls.plot: A film about the teeming flip side of life in Berlin centered on eccentric characters of almost every imaginable sexual orientation, or disorientation.

Shiver.name: Shiver
Shiver.plot: Wendy Alden, a young secretary in Portland lacking in self- confidence becomes victim of a savage killer who has claimed the lives of a number of other women. Somehow Wendy finds the resources of courage to fight back and escape.

Marked.name: Marked
Marked.plot: A group of Ghost Hunters discover a powerful force that puts one of their members in great danger.

Uglies.name: Uglies
Uglies.plot: A world in which a compulsory operation wipes out physical differences and makes everyone pretty.

City of Glass.name: City of Glass
City of Glass.plot: While attending their respective parent's funeral in London, two strangers discover their parent's secret love affair spanning across three decades and two continents. (Chinese with English subtitles).

A Wrinkle in Time.name: A Wrinkle in Time
A Wrinkle in Time.plot: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

Ender's Game.name: Ender's Game
Ender's Game.plot: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

Northern Lights.name: Northern Lights
Northern Lights.plot: Visit to Stockholm, Sweden and the Gotha Canal.

Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.plot: Harry Potter lives his second year at Hogwarts with Ron and Hermione when a message on the wall announces that the legendary Chamber of Secrets has been opened. The trio soon realize that, to save the school, it will take a lot of courage.

Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoeni.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoeni.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.plot: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.plot: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

Divergent.name: Divergent
Divergent.plot: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

Desolation Angels.name: Desolation Angels
Desolation Angels.plot: Returning home from a trip to visit his mother, Nick discovers that a good friend of his, Sid, has apparently raped his girlfriend, Mary. More concerned with his own wounded pride than with Mary's lingering feelings of guilt, pain and betrayal, Nick vows revenge.

Wide Sargasso Sea.name: Wide Sargasso Sea
Wide Sargasso Sea.plot: In 1840s Jamaica, a young female landowner marries an Englishman to keep her property. Their love blossoms, but she hides a childhood secret about her mother that threatens their relationship.

On the Road.name: On the Road
On the Road.plot: An intimate look at life on the road for the band Wolf Alice as they tour Great Britain.

Passion.name: Passion
Passion.plot: 'Passion' is the story of Jack Passion, a man who has defied social convention and become an ambassador for the sport of competitive beard growing. Through good times and bad, he has pushed on to become the two time world beard champion. He shares this inspirational story with us and guides us through his world in a 6 minute narrative doc. He considers what his world has become due to his beard and contemplates the thought of a world without.

Afterlife.name: Afterlife
Afterlife.plot: A heavily neurotic young man starts to see his father's ghost, and while he helps the spirit cross to the otherworld, something happens that they could never achieve in their common life: they finally understand each other.

Two Years Before the Mast.name: Two Years Before the Mast
Two Years Before the Mast.plot: The playboy son of a wealthy shipping magnate discovers at first hand the desperate privations suffered by the crew of one of his father's ships after he is unwillingly press-ganged aboard.

Track of the Cat.name: Track of the Cat
Track of the Cat.plot: Around the turn of the 20th century, during a harsh northern California winter, members of a ranching family are squabbling among themselves while the two oldest sons go hunting for a panther that is killing their livestock.

Z for Zachariah.name: Z for Zachariah
Z for Zachariah.plot: In the wake of a disaster that wipes out most of civilization, two men and a young woman find themselves in an emotionally charged love triangle as the last known survivors.

Miles to Go.name: Miles to Go
Miles to Go.plot: A writer from Los Angeles, who doesn't believe that relationships can last for him, struggles to mend his most recent failed relationship.

Little Lord Fauntleroy.name: Little Lord Fauntleroy
Little Lord Fauntleroy.plot: An American boy turns out to be the long-lost heir of a British fortune. He is sent to live with the cold and unsentimental lord who oversees the trust.

Incendiary.name: Incendiary
Incendiary.plot: A woman's life is forever changed when tragedy strikes at a soccer match.

The Moon Is Down.name: The Moon Is Down
The Moon Is Down.plot: During the Nazi occupation of Norway, a small Norwegian village struggles to cope with the invaders and some locals choose collaboration while others prefer armed resistance.

The Great Gilly Hopkins.name: The Great Gilly Hopkins
The Great Gilly Hopkins.plot: 12-year-old wisecracking Gilly Hopkins finds herself shuffled from foster home to foster home until she meets Maime Trotter.

Loser.name: Loser
Loser.plot: 23 year old Jame Dean Ray is a small time drug dealer bent on self destruction. The product of a broken home, Jimmy refuses help from those around him and spends his final hours hanging out and selling drugs with of course and occasional robbery.

Wish You Well.name: Wish You Well
Wish You Well.plot: A young girl and her brother come of age at their great-grandmother's house in Virginia during the 1940s.

Sometimes a Great Notion.name: Sometimes a Great Notion
Sometimes a Great Notion.plot: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

Lord Jim.name: Lord Jim
Lord Jim.plot: After being discredited as a coward, a 19th century seaman lives for only one purpose: to redeem himself.

The Weight of Water.name: The Weight of Water
The Weight of Water.plot: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.

Wise Blood.name: Wise Blood
Wise Blood.plot: Fresh out of the army, Hazel Motes attempts to open the first Church Without Christ in the small town of Taulkinham.

Labyrinths.name: Labyrinths
Labyrinths.plot: After just losing her six year old daughter in a hit & run, Marion is overwhelmed with grief and despair. Looking for solace from anyone who will listen, she finds George, an equally troubled individual and the two attempt to heal. Through George, and her neighbor Dawn, her choices, decisions, all begin to fall into place. However, she is unaware that George, the love of her life, is also the drunk driver who killed her daughter. When George decides he has to tell Marion the truth, Marion must make the most important decision of her life. The question is, for her, will it be the right one.

Child of God.name: Child of God
Child of God.plot: A dispossessed, violent man's disastrous attempt to exist outside the social order.

We the Living.name: We the Living
We the Living.plot: The time is the Russian Revolution. The place is a country burdened with fear - the midnight knock at the door, the bread hidden against famine, the haunted eyes of the fleeing, the grublike fat of the appeasers and oppressors. In a bitter struggle of the individual against the collective, three people stand forth with the mark of the unconquered in their bearing: Kira, who wants to be a builder, and the two men who love her - Leo, an aristocrat, and Andrei, a Communist. In their tensely dramatic story, Ayn Rand shows what the theories of Communism mean in practice. We the Living is not a story of politics but of the men and women who have to struggle for existence behind the Red banners and slogans. It is a picture of what dictatorship - of any kind - does to human beings, what kind of men are able to survive, and which of them remain as the ultimate winners. What happens to the defiant ones? What happens to those who succumb? Who are the winners in this conflict? Against a vivid panorama of political revolution and personal revolt, Ayn Rand offers an answer that challenges the modern conscience.

The Puppet Masters.name: The Puppet Masters
The Puppet Masters.plot: The Midwest USA is invaded by stingray-shaped alien slugs that ride on people's backs and control their minds in order to spread their dominion. Government agency reps Sam Givens, Andrew Nivens, and Mary Sefton must stop the aliens.

The Lords of Discipline.name: The Lords of Discipline
The Lords of Discipline.plot: In 1960s America, a black cadet is allowed acceptance into a seemingly prestigious military academy, unleashing a barrage of corruption within the system that another cadet is willing to expose.

Nicholas Nickleby.name: Nicholas Nickleby
Nicholas Nickleby.plot: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

The Chocolate War.name: The Chocolate War
The Chocolate War.plot: The Vigils are a gang of students at Trinity Catholic School... part of the tradition. They control the other boys by intimidation and the threat of violence.

The Sinner.name: The Sinner
The Sinner.plot: Marina passes from a dysfunctional family to love with an unsuccessful artist. But he is going blind due to a brain tumor.

The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt.name: The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt
The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt.plot: A look at the formative years of the 26th President of the United States, from his transformation from a privileged New York politician to commander of the Rough Riders during the Spanish-American War.

The Stars My Destination.name: The Stars My Destination
The Stars My Destination.plot: A retired Russian soldier Eiji Onodera (Keishi Suenaga) was going to his hometown in Japan. But on his way, he was caught and given a new mission by his ex-colleague Vadim Dadikov (Gohnosuke Tokuda). Onodera and his father would never be free unless he completes the secret mission. He and the Sergeant Zinaida Zasyekina (Satoko Enmei) go to Hokkaido to monitor an ex-officer of Japan Self-Defense Forces (JSDF), Toshio Honda (Taiyo Sawa). Honda has killed 27 people including his colleagues, and is hiding in a mountain with a mysterious beauty, Risa (Riho Yoshioka).

Theodore Rex.name: Theodore Rex
Theodore Rex.plot: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.

The Gathering.name: The Gathering
The Gathering.plot: Over 40 living legends and contemporary masters of vaquero horsemanship traveled from nine western states, along with their 60 beautiful horses. They traveled to the private sanctuary of a unique ranch nestled in New Cuyama, CA, to ensure that the graceful and mesmerizing equine partnership, rooted in the traditions and heritage of the 1700's in Santa Barbara, would endure and be documented in an unprecedented and historically significant gathering.

The Magus.name: The Magus
The Magus.plot: A teacher on a Greek island becomes involved in bizarre mind-games with the island's magus (magician) and a beautiful young woman.

The Prince.name: The Prince
The Prince.plot: All the world's a stage and Jen and Sam have learned the hard way, being trapped in a Shakespearean multiverse. On their quest to discover the doorway back to reality they notice something unusual about Henry 'Hotspur' Percy

When the Wind Blows.name: When the Wind Blows
When the Wind Blows.plot: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

The Trumpet of the Swan.name: The Trumpet of the Swan
The Trumpet of the Swan.plot: It's a high-flying adventure when Louie, a mute trumpeter swan, is given the gift of a trumpet, and finds his voice.

Out of the Dust.name: Out of the Dust
Out of the Dust.plot: John Evans tells his grandson about the exciting days of '75 in the West. At Fort Sheridan, Captain Evans fights the Indians of the plains, while his wife Martha grows bored of the monotonous life at the fort. One day, while Evans is helping to rescue a wagon train surrounded by Indians, Martha elopes with trapper Brett Arnold. When Evans returns, he resigns from the army and takes his young son Jimmie to Montana, where he becomes a ranch foreman. Martha, who immediately became disgusted with the drunken Arnold and jumped from their stagecoach during their elopement, now sings in dance halls to earn a living. A year later, when Evans -- who has kept away from women -- and Jimmie are in Red Butte for trading, Jimmie's dog runs into a saloon. Jimmie follows and finds his mother. After Evans thrashes Arnold, who also has found Martha, Jimmie reunites his parents.

The Illustrated Man.name: The Illustrated Man
The Illustrated Man.plot: In 1930s, a psychotic drifter who's after the mystery woman who covered his whole body in illustrations that foresee distant future shows three of them (The Veldt, The Long Rain and The Last Night of the World) to a mesmerized traveler.

Without Remorse.name: Without Remorse
Without Remorse.plot: An elite Navy SEAL goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

On Beauty.name: On Beauty
On Beauty.plot: ON BEAUTY follows fashion photographer Rick Guidotti, who left the fashion world when he grew frustrated with having to work within the restrictive parameters of the industry's standard of beauty.

Stuart Little.name: Stuart Little
Stuart Little.plot: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Tender Is the Night.name: Tender Is the Night
Tender Is the Night.plot: A Psychiatrist and his life with a patient he helped to recover.

The Prince and the Pauper.name: The Prince and the Pauper
The Prince and the Pauper.plot: Two boys, one a prince and one a poor boy, change places.

Lullaby.name: Lullaby
Lullaby.plot: Thirty years later, a series of murders surface, and haunts a NY City Detective, who planned the deaths on his twin brother. An investigator discovers the NYC Detective is the murderer living a dual personality of his twin brother.

The Surgeon.name: The Surgeon
The Surgeon.plot: THE SURGEON is a psychological thriller-horror feature film set in the dark London winter. The film centres on a performance artist with a scarred body and mind, Suzie, who soon finds herself drawn into a sado-masochistic triangular love affair.

The Partner.name: The Partner
The Partner.plot: A tax avoidance scheme by a film producer leads to murder and the theft of £300,000.

World Without End.name: World Without End
World Without End.plot: Astronauts returning from a voyage to Mars are caught in a time warp and are propelled into a post-Apocalyptic Earth populated by mutants.

A Separate Peace.name: A Separate Peace
A Separate Peace.plot: Two roomates at a prep school in New England during World War II come to grips with the war, jealousy and betrayal. Based on a novel by John Knowles.

Tuck Everlasting.name: Tuck Everlasting
Tuck Everlasting.plot: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

The Phantom Tollbooth.name: The Phantom Tollbooth
The Phantom Tollbooth.plot: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

Madame Bovary.name: Madame Bovary
Madame Bovary.plot: Bored in her marriage to a country doctor and stifled by life in a small town, the restless Emma Bovary pursues her dreams of passion and excitement, whatever they may cost.

The Virgin Suicides.name: The Virgin Suicides
The Virgin Suicides.plot: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

The Velveteen Rabbit.name: The Velveteen Rabbit
The Velveteen Rabbit.plot: A lonely boy wins over his distant father and strict grandmother with help from a brave velveteen rabbit whose one wish is to become a real rabbit someday.

A Little Princess.name: A Little Princess
A Little Princess.plot: Sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

Cloud Atlas.name: Cloud Atlas
Cloud Atlas.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

The Lincoln Lawyer.name: The Lincoln Lawyer
The Lincoln Lawyer.plot: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

The Hiding Place.name: The Hiding Place
The Hiding Place.plot: Corrie Ten Boom and her family risk everything to hide Jewish refugees by the hundreds, and they ultimately face the consequences when they are discovered.

The Clan of the Cave Bear.name: The Clan of the Cave Bear
The Clan of the Cave Bear.plot: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

In the Woods.name: In the Woods
In the Woods.plot: In The Woods is a recorded diary of monsters living in an urban forest. Max, one enthusiastic showrunner monster boy, takes us on a tour while his best friend P. records everything. As the team demonstrates to us how it is like to be a monster, we watch their unscripted story.

Mansfield Park.name: Mansfield Park
Mansfield Park.plot: Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.

The Historian.name: The Historian
The Historian.plot: A history professor flees a painful personal tragedy, taking a job at a new university, where he struggles with a contentious department chair, student apathy, and new relationships that challenge his worldview.

Things Fall Apart.name: Things Fall Apart
Things Fall Apart.plot: Part mumblecore drama, part surreal horror film, 'Things Fall Apart' when a strange, mysterious artifact is shared at a dinner party causing a group of old friends to question their loyalties and finally, their sanity.

Bel Canto.name: Bel Canto
Bel Canto.plot: A world-renowned opera singer becomes trapped in a hostage situation when she's invited to perform for a wealthy industrialist in South America.

The Tell-Tale Heart.name: The Tell-Tale Heart
The Tell-Tale Heart.plot: A slaves memories of repressed abuse at the hands of his master fuels him to murder.

A Farewell to Arms.name: A Farewell to Arms
A Farewell to Arms.plot: An English nurse and an American ambulance driver on the Italian front during World War 1 fall in love, but the horrors surrounding them challenge their romance to the limit.

For Whom the Bell Tolls.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
For Whom the Bell Tolls.plot: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

The Lorax.name: The Lorax
The Lorax.plot: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

The Crucible.name: The Crucible
The Crucible.plot: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

Island of the Blue Dolphins.name: Island of the Blue Dolphins
Island of the Blue Dolphins.plot: The story of a Native American girl, abandoned on a tiny island, who is protected by a wild dog.

The Namesake.name: The Namesake
The Namesake.plot: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

White Fang.name: White Fang
White Fang.plot: Grey Beaver is reluctantly trades his loyal wolf-dog, White Fang, in exchange for gold. The dog's new owner is an evil man who cages and torments White Fang so as to transform him into a hateful fighting dog.

The BFG.name: The BFG
The BFG.plot: A young orphan girl, Sophie, gets taken away to a faraway land populated by Giants and Dreams.

Stargirl.name: Stargirl
Stargirl.plot: An unassuming high schooler finds himself inexplicably drawn to the free-spirited new girl, whose unconventional ways change how they see themselves--and each other.

Oliver Twist.name: Oliver Twist
Oliver Twist.plot: Four friends weave a tangled web of lust, betrayal and blackmail.

Beloved.name: Beloved
Beloved.plot: A slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman.

Naked.name: Naked
Naked.plot: The 25-year-old Danish porn star Denise K. travels back to L.A., where she hopes to make a comeback. Denise is the oldest resident of the agent's house, where she spends her days in the company of 10 others during the film shoot. The house, which is located in the middle of a residential neighborhood, is also the center for live streaming, where customers can contact the models over the internet.

Where the Red Fern Grows.name: Where the Red Fern Grows
Where the Red Fern Grows.plot: Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.

The Graveyard Book.name: The Graveyard Book
The Graveyard Book.plot: The story of a boy whose parents are killed is adopted by the occupants of a graveyard and raised by them.

Heart of Darkness.name: Heart of Darkness
Heart of Darkness.plot: A police officer in Rio de Janeiro is assigned on a dangerous mission to search through the outskirts of the city to find Captain Kurtz, a famous policeman who went missing under mysterious circumstances.

Watership Down.name: Watership Down
Watership Down.plot: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Snow Flower and the Secret Fan.name: Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
Snow Flower and the Secret Fan.plot: A story set in nineteenth-century China and focusing on the life-long friendship between two girls who develop their own secret code as a way to contend with the rigid social norms imposed on women.

The Nightingale.name: The Nightingale
The Nightingale.plot: The story of an elderly man and his granddaughter who walk together through China with a bird in a cage.

Ella Enchanted.name: Ella Enchanted
Ella Enchanted.plot: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

The Cat in the Hat.name: The Cat in the Hat
